quote: Face the truth or the truth will face you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: Challenging the truth is like playing tennis against the wall! The defeat is inevitable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: The whispering of the truth is stronger than the thunderstorm of the untruth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: With faith, you may get stuck in a very big lie and may lose the truth forever; but with doubt, you can always reach the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: Max Lucado says that ‘A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.’ That is true and a man who wants to find out the truth must also do the same thing!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: Truths are immortal, my dear friend; they are immortal like God! What we call a falsity is like a fruit; it has a certain number of days; it is bound to decay. Whereas, what we call truth is like gold; days, months, even centuries can hide gold, can overlook it but they can never make it decay.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: It is not right to walk alone on the golden road of truth! Enlighten as many people as you can and walk with them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: On the path to truth, you can’t see many people; truth’s way is calm and quiet. Look around you, friend! Are there too many people on the path you walk? If there are, question your path! Get away from the crowds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: Every moment of existence is a volcano full of truth! Every single moment is ready to explode, may be now, may be two minutes or may be two years later! Truths are ready to erupt! Every single moment is ready to erupt! Be silent; wait for the eruptions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: truth

quote: He who challenges the God in his dying bed is indisputably the most courageous man, but not the cleverest one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: god

quote: Our spiritual history is the history of God-ventriloquists! The truth is that the voice of God is the voice of cunning Man, the ventriloquist's voice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: god

quote: The world will be brighter and wiser without religions, but it will surely be darker and more hopeless without God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: god

quote: God generously helps to those who try to do their best without asking God’s help!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: god

quote: If everyone bows in front of your wisdom, your greatest wisdom will be to tell them not to bow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom

quote: Without living the most chaotic internal storms, you can’t get the calmness of the wisdom! Wisdom is the child of the storm.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom

quote: On the road to wisdom, behave like a raven and observe everything carefully!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom

quote: When the wisdom speaks, be quite and listen! When the stupidity speaks, stand up and leave!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom

quote: Create a wisdom and share it with others; in return, don’t wait for anything, not even a simple thanks, because expecting something in return does not belong to the wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom

quote: To enter the land of wisdom, firstly start changing the angles you look at the things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: angle-quotes, angles, different-angels, land-of-wisdom, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers, wisdom

quote: When you attain the highest wisdom, you will disappear physically because people will start seeing only your ideas and thinking about only your wisdom; you will die physically and you will turn into an empty chair full of universe simply!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disappear, empty-chair, ideas, ideas-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

quote: You look somewhere else, then you see something different and so your journey for wisdom starts! Wise man’s mind is the mind looking at everywhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different, different-perspective, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, look, looking-at, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, mind-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wise-man, wise-man-quotations, wise-man-quotes

quote: Keep reading! Keep travelling! Keep thinking! And finally you will be there, in the Land of Wisdom where the mind has the power of an eagle’s eye!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eagle-eyes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, land-of-wisdom, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, reading, reading-books, reading-for-life, reading-thinking, thinking, thinking-quotes, travelling, travelling-life, travelling-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-inspirational, wisdom-quote, wisdom-quotes, wisdom-wise, wisdom-words

quote: To attain the wisdom of every season, you must live all the seasons!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, season, season-quotations, seasons, seasons-quotations, seasons-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quote, wisdom-quotes, wisdom-words

quote: Even the wisdom of the wisest depends on the accumulated wisdom of the past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: accumulated, accumulated-knowledge, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wisest, wisest-man, wisest-people

quote: There are paths above the paths, the paths of the birds! There are paths above the paths of the birds, the paths of the clouds! And there are paths above the paths of the clouds, the paths of the planets! When you are travelling on a path, never forget that there are higher paths, there are higher wisdoms over your head!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: higher-wisdom, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, paths, paths-of-life, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom

quote: Whatever happens when the seed meets the soil, the same thing happens when you meet the wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, seed, seed-quotations, seed-quotes, seeds, soil, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotations, wisdom-quotes

quote: Wisdom is not a mysterious universe where your mind enters but it is a mysterious universe which enters your mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind-quotations, mind-quote, mind-quotes, mysterious, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotations, wisdom-quote, wisdom-quotes

quote: Let your walk be wisely so that you can inspire others to walk wisely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, inspiration, inspiration-quotes, inspire, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, walk, walk-quotes, walking, wisdom, wise, wise-quotations, wise-quotes, wisely

quote: You will never attain wisdom without walking on different streets, without talking to different people, without reading different books, in short, without meeting with the things different in every aspect!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aspect, attain-wisdom, difference, different, different-aspects, different-perspective, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotations, wisdom-quotes

quote: Old people have wisdom but not energy; young people have energy but not wisdom; energy and wisdom must be in the same body to create a much better civilisation! To do this, we will either give energy to the old or we will give wisdom to the young and for now the latter seems a more plausible action!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: better-civilisation, children, civilisation, civilisations, energy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, old, old-people, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wisdom, wisdom-quotations, wisdom-quotes, wise, young-people

quote: To be happy in absolute terms, along with our happiness, all the world must be happy so that we don’t have to worry for anyone!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness

quote: In a beautiful morning, walking barefoot to the work through the green fields with the company of the singing birds... and there you shall meet the real happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness

quote: You will not find happiness till you find your peaceful corner in life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: corner, finding-happiness, happiness, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, peaceful-corner, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you know the art of finding some things in a quite empty street, then you know the art of happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, art-of-happiness, empty-streets, happiness, happiness-life, happiness-quotations, happiness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, street, street-quotations, street-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You can never catch real happiness without making others happy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness, happiness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, others, others-quotes, real-happiness, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Happy people is a great hope to all the unhappy people because a path of success can always be used by the people who couldn’t find such a path yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness, happiness-life, happiness-quotes, happy, happy-people, hope, hope-quotations, hope-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path-of-success, paths, success, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unhappy, unhappy-people

quote: The heaven of a grasshopper is the wheat field; the heaven of man is the same place, the very earth itself where we get our food and build our happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: grasshopper, grasshopper-jungle, grasshoppers, happiness, happiness-quotes, heaven, heaven-on-earth, heaven-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The unhappy people of the known paths must certainly try the unknown paths in their search of happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness, happy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, known, known-paths, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, paths, paths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unhappy, unhappy-people, unhappy-quotes, unknown, unknown-paths

quote: In the middle of the night, there is always less hope; in the dawn of the morning, there is always more hope!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hope

quote: Have you lost your hope? Have you remained inside the fog? Don’t worry; even if you can’t find it, a new hope will come and find you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hope

quote: Human mind is the only real hope for the future of humanity! Have faith in human mind which is the only instrument who can protect you in this savage universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: faith, have-faith, have-faith-in-science, hope, hope-quotations, hope-quotes, human-mind, human-mind-quotations, human-mind-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, savage, science, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: A homeless with hope is in a better situation than a hopeless with home!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: home, homeless, homeless-quotes, hope, hopeless, hopeless-quotes, hopelessness, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you can defeat your own calamity, you will be a hope for others and thus you can defeat the calamity of others too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: calamity, defeat, hope, hope-quotations, hope-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Seek for the endless life in the world, because with death, there remains neither the seeker nor the sought! The other world is altogether an illusion! Stop deceiving yourself; seek for the endless life in the world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: death

quote: I have lost my faith, but I gained the truth! It is not important at all to lose your candle as long as you find a torch!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: faith

quote: You must let other people to challenge your truths; you must let them to question your faith and the reason for this is very simple: Your truths might be very wrong; your faith might be very mistaken. Don’t be a castle; you need bridges surrounding you, not walls! And remember that walls belong only to cowards!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bridges, bridges-not-walls, bridges-quotes, cowards, criticisims, criticism, faith, faith-quotations, faith-quote, faith-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mistaken, truths, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wall-of-fear, wall-of-separation, wall-quotations, wall-quotes, walls, wrong, wrongs, wrongs-and-rights

quote: Religion does not belong to God it belongs to the human reaction against mortality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: Religion is the servant of the vanishing; science, of the existence! Disappearance belongs to the chaos and the Devil; existence, to the God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: For God’s sake, take the religion out of your life or all kind of absurdities will take the reason out of your life! Keep God, get rid of religion! God, Love and Science; the Magnificent Trinity! All you need is these three things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: To quit religion is to start walking in the space! Don’t be afraid, you don’t fall into the void, because you can hold onto God and science!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: Religion is not a bridge between God and Man it is the Great Wall of China between them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: Time will come and some people will be proud of themselves that they have never believed in any religion! This honour will be belonging to the clever people of the society only! For the others, merely the deep shame will remain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: Petronius says that ‘Mundus vult decipi - The world wants to be deceived.’ That is very true, otherwise there wouldn’t exist any religion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: La religion n'est pas un pont entre Dieu et l'homme, c'est une Grande Muraille de Chine entre eux!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religion

quote: We must thank to all the failed people in the history as they showed us the true way to success!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: success

quote: On the road to success, even little stones may cause you fall down! If you are not serious and careful, forget about reaching your target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: success

quote: A primitive education can only create primitive generations! An outdated mentality will produce merely an outdated minds! The door of the future is closed for such archaic residuals from the pre-modern time of social evolution!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: archaic, education, education-quotes, educational-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, outdated, primitive, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Never trust the captain who has never taken any education from the School of Storms!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: captain, education, murat-ildan-quotations, storms, trust

quote: When we feel ourselves very weak, life will look immensely powerful and ruthless! The extent of our power is the key factor in determining how powerful life is! The stronger we are the weaker the life will be!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-lesson, life-lesson-quote, life-lesson-quotes, life-lessons, life-lessons-quotes, life-lessons-wisdom, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, our-power, power, power-quotations, power-quote, power-quotes, strenght, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, weak

quote: They say life is a test and this is a ridiculous idea! There is neither examination nor examinant! You encounter problems in life either because you are stupid or your path just crosses with the problems’ path by luck! Nobody is sending you problems to test you! Stay loose and chuck out the irrational idea of ‘test’ at once!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exam, examinant, examination, exams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-is-a-test, life-lessons, life-philosophy, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, life-quotes-inspirational-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, problems, test, tests, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: In moments when you feel that life is unbearably heavy, surrender yourself to the circumstances for a while! When life hits you hard and makes you fall down, take a rest on the ground for a while! Momentaneous non-resistance will give you time to gather your strength!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: heavy-burden, heavy-burdens, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-advice, life-and-living, life-lessons, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nonresistance, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Life is sometimes to be a monkey with a monkey, to be a dog with a dog, a bird with a bird, water with water, tree with tree! It is a great wisdom to interiorize the mind of others, in other words, to make their spirit our own spirit!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: empathy, empathy-for-others, empathy-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, interiorize, life, life-lesson, life-lessons, life-lessons-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: With the same habit of mind, even if you live thousands of lives, all will be the same! Get a different habit of mind to get a different life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: attitude-of-mind, change, change-quotes, habit-of-mind, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-lessons, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, mind-quotations, mind-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you concentrate on the road too much, you will miss the view and when you do the opposite, you will miss the road! Life is an art of catching both the road and the view!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: catch, concentrate, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-lessons, life-philosophy, life-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, road, roads, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, view

quote: Your life will be simplified when you choose inaction when no action is required and choose action when action is required!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: action, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, inaction, life-lessons, life-q, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, simple-life, simplify, simplify-your-life, simplifying, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Catch the life with the agility of a dog trying to get a hold of the flying Frisbee!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: agility, catching-life, dog, frisbee, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-lessons, life-philosophy, life-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Life is offering you infinite paths! To get stuck in one path is nothing but shallowness! Go deep, discover other lanes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discover, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-and-living, life-lessons, life-philosophy, life-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, paths, paths-of-life, paths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If only you could fully grasp how valuable, how limited and how unique every moment of your life is, you would never stand as still as a statue even a single moment because action is real living!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: action, action-quotes, grasp, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-lessons, limited, limited-time, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moments, moments-of-life, moments-quotes, time, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unique, uniqueness, valuable

quote: This whole life is an art of knowing when to sit and when to stand up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, art-of-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-lessons, life-quotations, life-quote, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, life-quotes-inspirational-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sit, stand-up, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The best thing about existence is that any moment in time can be a point of beginning to anything! In other words, every moment of our life holds a key for the unknown or the closed doors of new paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-thing, best-things-in-life, closed-doors, doors, existence, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-lessons, life-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moment, new-beginning, new-beginning-quote, new-beginning-quotes, new-beginnings, new-beginnings-quotations, new-paths, paths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Trust not tomorrow! Whatever you are planning, today is the best day to act!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: act, action, action-quote, action-quotes, best-day, best-day-of-life, best-day-of-your-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, time, tomorrow, tomorrow-quotes, tomorrows, trust, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: No moment is more valuable than this moment because no moment is alive outside this moment any moment other than this moment is either dead or hasn’t born yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moment, moment-quote, moment-quotes, moments, this-moment, this-moment-is-your-life, time, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, very-moment

quote: The more you exaggerate, the more you will look funny!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exaggerate, exaggerated, exaggeration, exaggerations, funny, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, look-funny, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Whether we like it or not, one day science will take God from us! This will be especially a great destruction for the weak minds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: Man! What are you? Who are you? Just a shadow in this universe! You always forget this and the truth will always remind you what you really are! Do you want to be a real thing, not just a shadow? Improve your science ten thousand times; improve your science hundred thousand times! If you can’t improve your science, you will remain as a miserable shadow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: There are two kinds of science: The black science and the white science. The science of weapon production is the black one. Working in this category of science is a great betrayal to humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: Amicus scientia est amicus Deus: Friend of science is the friend of God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: He who has spent billions on churches, on mosques and on every kind of sanctuaries is guilty of not giving that money to the science! The path of sanctuary does not lead to God; the path of the faith does not lead to God; only the path of science leads to God! The bridge between man and the unknown God is not worshipping but it is science, only the science!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: The sun rises from the two places: From the East and also from where the Science rises!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: Mysticism is colourful and alluring, but if you are after the truth, science is the best path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: What have you done for science today? Stop doing things for God! He doesn't need anything. Do something for science, for God's sake!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: All man must live in Machu Picchu for some time! Over there, you will be closer to the universe and you will realise how trivial you are in this chaotic cosmos. Science is the only power which will make you bigger and significant in this universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: science

quote: Let me summarise our delicate position in this universe: Our every word can be our last word; our every look can be our last look! Our every moment can be our last moment! Are we happy about this fragile situation? No! Are we going to deceive ourselves with some childish stories, in other words with religion? No! Then what are we going to do? We will change this desperate situation, we will strike this chaotic universe with human mind, with high intelligence, in short with science! Humanity’s ultimate objective is to reshape this dangerous universe so that no threat will ever remain for our existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: delicate, disasters, existence, existence-of-man, existence-quotations, existence-quote, existence-quotes, human-mind, human-mind-quotations, human-mind-quotes, humanity, humanity-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, natural-disaster, natural-disasters, our-existence, science, science-and-change, science-and-religion, science-quotation, science-quotes, space, space-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, ultimate-objective, universe, universe-gigantic-power, universe-messages, universe-quotations, universe-quote, universe-quotes

quote: What is salvation for humans? The answer is simple: Salvation is to perpetuate our existence via science!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence, existence-quotes, human-salvation, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, perpetuate, perpetuate-quotes, salvation, salvation-quotes, science, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Mars will not be our new home; it will be our new hotel! Because for a new place to be our own home, we need to see the things we used to see: An autumn lake, a bird singing in the misty morning or even desert camels walking in the sunset!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, journey-to-mars, mars, mars-mission, mars-one, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nasa, nasa-mars, planet-mars, planets, science, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you want to reduce the rats, use the cats! If you want to reduce the fools, use the books!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: books

quote: Some looks are heavier than the thickest books because they carry the saddest stories of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: books, glance, glances, heavy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, look, looks, looks-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sad-look, saddest, stories-of-life, thick, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you have carefully examined hundred people you met in your life journey, it means that you have read hundred different books! Every person you know is a book; world is full of walking books; some are boring, some are marvellous, some are weak, some are powerful, but they are all useful because they all carry different experiences of different paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: books, different, experiences, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-journey, life-journey-quotes, life-journeys, meet, meeting-people, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, people, people-we-met, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: For those who challenge the great dangers fearlessly, let us remind this realistic probability: Fear can save your life and courage may kill you; thus sometimes fear is a reasonable path to continue your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: courage-quotes, dangers, fear, fear-quotations, fear-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: The ugliest government is the one which is spreading fear to its own people! The finest government is the one which encourages its own people to criticize the government harshly.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: criticism, criticize, criticize-government, criticized, encourage, fear, government, government-quotations, government-quotes, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: One of the most stupid things in life is not to enter the door which is wide open just because of the fear that this door will be shut and going back will be impossible! Have some courage, because even a harvest mouse leaves his hole to discover new places!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discover, discovery, discovery-quotes, door, door-quotations, door-quotes, fear, harvest-mouse, hole, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, impossible, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mouse, rat, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wide-open

quote: If you harden the soil, the seed cannot grow; if you harden your heart, the love cannot grow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: harden, heart, heart-quotations, heart-quotes, hearts, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, love, love-quotations, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-saying, love-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, seed, seeds, seeds-quotes, soil, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Moments of love and compassion are the only immortal moments in human being’s life! We humans are mortals with immortal moments!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion, compassion-quotations, compassion-quotes, human-beings, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, immortal, immortal-moments, love, love-quotations, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-saying, love-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moments, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What if the door you love is locked and cannot be open? The answer is very simple: Find another door!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: door, door-quotations, door-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, love, love-quotations, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-saying, love-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There are two kinds of diamonds in this world: The diamond itself and the eyes full of love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: diamond, diamond-quotes, diamonds, eyes, eyes-full-of, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, love, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If there is a very strong love behind you that you can lean against to it, nothing can ever shake you very strongly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lean, lean-against, leaning, love-quotations, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-saying, love-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, shake, strong-love, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The stupid are always in a tendency to create enemies; on the other hand the clever are always in a tendency to create friendships! Make friends with anything or anybody possible, in short, be clever!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: friendship, friendship-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, make-friends, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, stupid, stupid-people, stupid-quotes, stupidity, tendency, tendency-quotes, the-clever, the-stupid, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A soulless city creates soulless people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cities, city, city-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, people, soulless, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Here is a tragicomic reality of all the regimes: People work hard to feed their thief politicians, their thief kings and thief queens or their thief presidents! And therefore the tragicomic reality of all the times is this: There can exist no thieves without the support of people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, kings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, people, presidents, queens, regime, regime-quotes, regimes, support-of-people, thief, thief-quotes, thieves, tragicomedy, tragicomic, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: History shows us that people often make mistakes, they give wrong decisions, they vote for the wrong persons! And history also shows us that in the end they pay a heavy price for it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dictator-quotes, dictators, dictatorship, elections, elections-2016, elections2016, history, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mistake, mistakes, pay-for-it, people, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, voters, voters-and-voting, voting

quote: The war against the war is the only war that shall give you a great honour and a real peace!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: war

quote: Wars are the strongest evidence for the claim that man is still a wild animal.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: war

quote: Are there anything more dishonourable and more coward than not marching in front of the army after taking the decision of war as a politician? Sending others for dying but keeping himself in safety is the affair of the low man only!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: war

quote: Every time a war ends, under a beautiful sun, on the face of a crying child; I see a rainbow of hope over the innocent teardrops.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: war

quote: The luckiest generation in a country is always the one which has never went through any war in their lifetimes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: antiwar, antiwar-movement, antiwar-quotations, antiwar-quotes, generation, generation-quotes, generations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lucky-generation, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, war, war-quotations, war-quote, war-quotes, wars

quote: Yes, there are plenty of politicians who are liars, there is no doubt about this! But some of them are not only liars but also serial killers because they deliberately send people to the wars!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-war, anti-war-movement, anti-war-quotes, bad-politicians, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, liars, liars-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, serial-killer, serial-killers, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, war, war-quotes

quote: In the matter of war, ask this question to yourself and to your own fellow country men: Have you ever seen any politician in your country without legs, without arms, without eyes after war? No! You can’t see such a thing because honourless politicians always stay in the safe ports while they send others to the zone of death!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-war, anti-war-movement, anti-war-quotes, death, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-logic, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, war, war-quotations, war-quote, war-quotes

quote: There isn’t a viler creature on earth than a politician who sends the children of others to the war but not his own children!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-war, anti-war-movement, anti-war-quotes, children, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-logic, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, vile, vile-creature, vileness, war

quote: The easiest way to forget about the people who are dying in wars right now is to close our eyes and ears! And this is also the ugliest and the vilest way!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-war, anti-war-movement, anti-war-quotes, death, dying, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, ugliest, vilest, war, war-quotations, war-quote, war-quotes, wars

quote: For a chic and an honorable full victory, you must make your own fight and win your own battle entirely by yourself! Try to refuse any help to get a pure victory, a victory which belongs merely to yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: battle, battle-quotes, chic, fight, fighting, honorable, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, refuse, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, victory, victory-is-yours, victory-quotes, war

quote: A country which prefers guns to flowers will live the beauty of the flowers only in its graveyards!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-war, anti-war-movement, anti-war-quotes, beauty, country, graveyards, guns, murat-ildan-quotations, war

quote: What do you need in the New Year? You need a dream; your dream needs an action; and your action needs right thinking! Without right thinking, you can have only unrealised dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: 2017-quotes, action, dreams, dreams-quotations, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, new-year, new-year-quotation, new-year-quotations, new-year-quote, new-year-quotes, new-year-resolutions, new-years-eve, right-thinking, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, year-2017

quote: Let the world know your dreams, my friend; realise them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams

quote: When your dream dies, create another dream; don’t waste your time to resurrect the dead one! Remember that you are mortal and don’t stuck on one dream! Give other dreams a chance! Be just! Remember, you are mortal and your time is very short!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams

quote: If a man has lost everything he has but his dreams, it means that he has still everything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams

quote: An invitation of a beautiful street is an invitation to walk within a dream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dream-quotes, dreams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, invitation, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, street, street-quotations, street-quotes, streets, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, walk, walking

quote: When you start dreaming, you become just a body because your mind is now somewhere else! A dreaming person is just a mindless body!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, body-and-mind, dream, dream-quotations, dream-quotes, dreaming, dreams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, mind-and-body, mind-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When the reality is no different than a beautiful dream, stick tightly to that reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful-dream, dreams, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, reality, reality-quotations, reality-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Do the dreams have also their own dreams? Yes they have and those dreams also have their own dreams! So when you create a dream, you create infinite number of dreams! When you dream of a beautiful house, then that beautiful house will create new dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dream-quotes, dreams, dreams-quotations, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Are you dreaming? Stop dreaming; come and watch the sunset, it is better than all the dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreaming, dreams, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sunset, sunset-quotations, sunset-quotes, sunsets, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Without travels, our existence, our memories, our literature, our dreams, our everything would be very poor, very boring, very limited!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boring, dreams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, journey, journey-quote, journey-quotes, limited, literature, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, poor, travel, travel-quotes, traveling, travelling, travelling-to-a-foreign-country, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What is the size of this universe? The size of this universe is whatever the size of your dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams, dreams-quotations, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, size, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quotes

quote: This morning do something different: When you wake up in the morning, wake your forgotten and forsaken dreams up as well, wake them up like an insisting rooster!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different, doing-different-things, dreams, forgotten-dreams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, morning, mornings, rooster, roosters, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wake-up

quote: Your dream is your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, dreams-quotations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, paths, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When a beautiful reality looks unreal, you will realize that the beauty of reality is superior to any dream whatsoever!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beauty, beauty-in-life, beauty-of-life, beauty-quotes, dream, dreams, dreams-quotations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, real, reality, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unreal, unreality

quote: Watching the infinite horizons gives you infinite dreams, infinite ideas, infinite paths! Choose a great target and then you will see that great instruments will appear for you to reach that target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams, goal, goals, horizon, horizons, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, infinite, instruments, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, paths, target, target-quotations, target-quotes, targeting, targets, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is in fact not our dream that makes us happy, but chasing that dream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chasing, chasing-dreams, dreams, fream, happiness-quotations, happiness-quotes, happy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, our-dreams, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Every seed wants to die in the soil! Every umbrella wants to live in a perpetually rainy world! Every mirror wants to see its own face in another mirror! Everything in this universe has dreams they wish to realise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, dreams-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mirror, soil, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, umbrella, umbrellas

quote: Don’t let the society or your own family or anybody to kill your dreams because your dreams are yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, dreams-quotes, family, kill, murat-ildan-quotes, society, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Whatever you do or wherever you go in life, after a while everything you did will look like a dream to you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, look-like, murat-ildan-quotations, whatever-you-do, wherever-you-go

quote: You may give up your big dream and that is very hard! If necessary, give it up but then create a new one! Never live without big dreams because they will keep you alive in life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alive, big-dreams, create, dreams, dreams-quotes, life-lessons, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-wise-sayings, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: You are sitting! Want to be there? You can’t reach there by not going there! Sitting is the enemy of your dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dreams, enemy, murat-ildan-quotations, reach, sit, sitting

quote: We fly with our dreams, we fall with our hesitations!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream-quote, dreams, dreams-quotes, fall, fly, hesitate, hesitate-quotes, hesitations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, rise

quote: Make a journey in such a way that it becomes the dream of others even long after you have gone!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, journey, journey-quote, journey-quotes, long-after, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Freedom gives you the air of the high mountains.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: freedom

quote: Not only the dead are dead but also those who are deprived of their freedoms are also dead!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dead, deprived, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quote, freedom-quotes, freedoms, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Trams are not free; their paths are predetermined; they must travel on the pre-designed paths! You are not a tram; your path is not predetermined; you can travel on any path! Fate is nonsense; you are free, you choose your own path with your own mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate-and-life, fates, free-to-choose, freedom, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, nonsense, path, paths, pre-designed, predetermined, tram, tram-quotations, tram-quotes, trams, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Don’t let anybody to ruin your inner joy or to interfere in your marvellous rhythm!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: freedom, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, inner-joy, inner-joy-quotes, interfere, joy, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, rhythm, rhythm-quotes, ruin, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When the sky is fully covered by the birds, you will feel the winds of pure freedom beneath this sky!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bird, birds, birds-and-freedom, freedom, freedoms, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, pure, sky, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, winds

quote: If a religion wants you to give up your freedom, just give up that religion! Nothing is holier than your freedom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-religion, anti-religious, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, give-up, give-up-quotes, holy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, religion-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: In every nation’s history time comes to behave like wild horses, to refuse any kind of authority which tries to eliminate your freedom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: authority, eliminate, freedom, freedom-and-liberty, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, horse-quotes, horses, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nations, nations-quotations, nations-quotes, refusal, refuse, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wild-horses

quote: There are two kinds of politicians on Earth: Those who expand the freedoms and those who restrict them! The second group has no chance to triumph and they will always be remembered as spooky characters from a horror movie!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-trump, bad-politicians, freedom, freedom-of-expression, freedom-of-speech, freedom-of-thought, horror-movies, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, triumph, trump, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Freedom can be forgotten in the repressive countries. To remember freedom, it will be enough to watch a happy seagull flying in the sky!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fascism, fascist-country, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, oppressive, repressive, seagull, seagulls, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Stay behind the scene; then you will have more freedom to work, more freedom to think and more freedom to act!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: behind, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, scene, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: To think is sacred; let every person think freely! To express what you think is sacred; let every person express his thought freely! If you do this, you prove that you are a conscientious and a moral human being! If you don’t do this, you just declare yourself being fascist!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fascist, fascist-values, fascists, freedom, freedom-of-expression, freedom-of-opinion, freedom-of-speech, freedom-of-the-press, freedom-of-thought, freedom-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sacred, think, thinking, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Paris has history, it has art, it has wonderful architecture, it has literature, but much more important than all these, it has freedom! If a city cannot offer freedom to its dwellers, all its other beauties will be meaningless!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cities, freedom, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, paris, paris-quotations, paris-quote, paris-quotes, parisians, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When nobody interferes with what you wear and how you wear, you are living in a civilised country at least on the matter of clothes! Happiness and freedom are often the same thing!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: civilised, civilised-society, freedom, freedom-of-choice, freedoms, happiness, happiness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, interfere, interference, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wear, wearing, wearing-clothes

quote: There are people who are trying to make the world darker and there are people who are trying to make the world brighter! And how can you know who is who? Very simple: Those who let you express your ideas freely, those who let you to be different than others and those who give you every freedom to criticize anything are the ones who are trying to make the world brighter!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: brighter, brighter-world, darker, different, freedom, freedom-of-choice, freedom-of-expression, freedom-of-speech, freedom-of-thought, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, to-be-different, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: In a democracy, when the traffic light is red for freedoms, don’t ever stop, don’t ever wait! Refuse the red light, ignore it, break the rules and move forward! It is always legitimate to challenge fascism for every nation in the world as long as this challenge is nonviolent! Because violence means using the same vulgar, the same evil methods of fascism! Don’t behave like a dog when fighting against a dog!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challenge, democracy, democracy-fascism, democracy-freedom, democracy-gone-wrong, democracy-in-america, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nonviolence, nonviolence-quotes, red-light, red-lights, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: However much you love them, you must let everything and everybody that desperately long for their freedom to be free!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: free, freedom, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, let-them-free, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, to-be-free, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A country where there are no freedoms is a black and white country; it is colorless and lifeless. Such a country needs nothing but colors, nothing but freedoms!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: black-and-white, colorless, freedom, freedom-quotes, freedoms, lifeless, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: The more freedom you get, the less your mind and your body is strangled!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, freedom, freedom-quotations, freedom-quotes, mind, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: A full loyalty to the leader merely fits to the dogs, not to the humans!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dogs, dogs-loyalty, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, leadership, leadership-quotes, loyal-politicians, loyalty, loyalty-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, merely, politics, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There are hundreds of intelligent and big brains in every country in the world to run that country successfully but somehow and often either an immoral stupid or a charlatan imbecile comes to power!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: coming-to-power, election, election-quotes, election-results, elections, government, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, immoral, leader, leaders, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, politics, power, power-quotations, stupid, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, world-politics

quote: Most countries have only few honest politicians and this is just like having a body with only few good organs functioning!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-politicians, honest, honesty, honesty-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, organs, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, politics, politics-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: One of the lowest creatures on earth is the politician who tries to eliminate his political rivals using unlawful methods and even violence! To halt the march of such demonic people, never use the same immoral methods, because to defeat a poisonous snake you don’t have to be a poisonous snake yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: politician, politicians, politicians-quotes, politics, politics-quotes

quote: If people notice you only when you do something very strange, then you are very lucky! You can enjoy your life without being noticed as long as you don’t do anything very strange!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-noticed, doing-strange-things, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-quotes, lucky, lucky-people, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, notice, noticeable, noticed, strange, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Let an eagle's stance in life be your stance too: Noble and powerful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eagle, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, noble, noble-quotes, powerful, stance, stance-in-life, stance-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Life is an ocean and every ocean necessitates right thinking and right action or else sinking becomes the only fate realisable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lide, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, right-action, right-actions, right-thinking, sink, sinking, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If the tranquillity is killing you, seek for the storm to save your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, life-quotes-inspirational-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, seek-for-solutions, storm, storm-quotes, storms, storms-of-life, storms-of-life-quotes, tranquility, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A good strategy of life is obvious: When the right path is found, it must be walked no matter how hard it is and the precious target this path destined to must be arrived at by defeating every difficulty encountered!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, darbımesel, destination, difficulties, difficulties-of-life, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, life-strategy, life-struggles, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, strategy-of-life, target, target-quotations, target-quotes, targets, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: When your life is stormy, take a refuge to a port: To music or to literature, in short, to art, to any kind of art!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, art-quotations, art-quote, art-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, music, music-quotes, music-quotes-by-authors, port, stormy, stormy-life, take-refuge, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Sometimes you must do crazy things to discover the life beyond your life, to enter the unknown zone beyond your known zone!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beyond, craziness, crazy, crazy-people, discovery, doing-crazy-things, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unknown

quote: Life is sweet till a bitter reality comes and hits us! After that, if you are a strong person, life will continue being sweet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bitter-realities, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, realities, realities-of-life, strong-person, sweet-life, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Oleanders have attractive flowers, they decorate nature beautifully, but they are poisonous; and a woman is an oleander; it’s all right to watch her once in a while, but then you must walk away without touching her; if you ever try to taste her even once, you’ll head for hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: women

quote: Women who live their lives according to the suffocating religious rules created by men represent one of the saddest tragedies of the whole human history!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: human-history, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, religious-rules, suffocating, tragedies, tragedies-of-life, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, women

quote: The prisoners of the cultures are mostly the women! House is the name of the prison!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: house, murat-ildan-quotations, prisoner, prisoners, woman, woman-quotations, woman-quotes, women, women-quotes

quote: To create a just world for women, we must firstly teach men to be just!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: international-womens-day, just, justice, murat-ildan-quotations, woman, women

quote: Clouds in the sky very much resembles the thoughts in our minds! Both changes perpetually from one second to another!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, clouds, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, thoughts, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You are an ordinary person till the day you realise that you have the power to change the world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, change-the-world, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, ordinary, ordinary-people, ordinary-person, power, realisation, realisation-quotes, realise, realise-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Don’t ever rule out the option of U-turn in your life, because one day you will need it! The moment you realize that you are going to the wrong direction, turn to the right direction instantly, with a beautiful U-turn!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you do your work happily, work will disappear.

category: nature

quote: To save our dying earth, any government which is not environmentalist must go because on earth there are thousands of governments but there in only one earth! quote: Humans have better wings than birds: Human mind is a perfect wing and with this wing we can fly to some farthermost places no bird can ever dream! Yes, mind is a wing; and when it comes to flying man is the most sophisticated bird on earth!

category: bird, bird-quotations, bird-quotes, birds, flying, flying-quotes, human, human-mind, humans, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, minds, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you are a boat and your lake is frozen, what can you do? You will wait for the spring! We are lucky that we are humans, we don’t have to wait for the spring; we can break the ice if necessary, we can use fire to open our way! Nothing can stop the mind if the mind decides to move to his target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boat, frozen-lake, goal, human-beings, humans, humans-humanity, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lake, lakes, lucky, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, mind-quotations, mind-quotes, target, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Stephen Hawking says we will not survive another 1,000 years without escaping beyond our planet. This existence problem can be solved by increasing the number of people with free-minds! Because just like the free birds only the free minds can reach the new horizons!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence-quotes, free-mind, free-minds, hawking, hawking-quotes, horizons, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mars-one, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, space-quotes, stephen-hawking, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When you smile, it means that your mind smiles; when you cry, it means that your mind cries!

quote: The kindest mind is the most beautiful mind!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mind, progressive, progressive-revolution, revolution, revolution-quotations, revolution-quotes, revolutions, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, violence

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: desolate, hiding-place, hiding-places, mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, secret-hiding-place, turkish-literature, your-mind

quote: With a foggy mind you see nothing but fog!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: foggy, mind, mind-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-literature

quote: World will be a beautiful place only with beautiful minds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

category: brighten, life, lights, mind, mind-power, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, shining

quote: Minds need the unusual, because the unusual has the power to shake the mind!

quote: Wherever wind visits, there it freshens the air; wherever wisdom visits, there it freshens the mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: air, freshen, ildan-words-of-wisdom, mind, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature, visit, wind, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: burdens, empty, loaded, mind, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-literature

quote: A peaceful nature is the best doctor for an unpeaceful mind!

quote: To be able to see a magic, you need to have a mind that can detect that magic!

category: magic, magic-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-özdeyişleri, mind, mind-quotations, mind-quotes, see

quote: Your mind is your guide! With a clever mind, you will have a life full of light! Improve your mind, improve your real savior!
