category: clever-mind, full-of-light, life, light, mind, mind-improvement, mind-power, mind-quotations, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-words, real-savior, savior, saviors

quote: Old man with a young mind is much younger than the young man with an old mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind, murat-ildan-quotes, old, old-man, old-mind, old-minds, young, young-man, young-mind, young-minds

quote: To see the universe clearly, you need not only a clear sky but also a clear mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clear, mind, murat-ildan-quotations, sky, universe, universe-quote, universe-quotes

quote: If you want to go to a far and difficult place, firstly send your mind to that far place, then your mind will meet with your body over there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, difficult, far, mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, power-of-mind, send

quote: Art needs no victory because it is already the victory of the meticulous mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, art-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, meticulous, mind, victory

quote: If the weather is summer in your mind, even the coldest winter will be hot for you! If the weather is winter in your mind, even the hottest summer will be cold for you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: col, hot, mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, weather

quote: Mind makes you happy, mind makes you unhappy. When you are unhappy, the solution is there, in your mind, not in somewhere else!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy, happy-quotes, mind, murat-ildan-quotations, solution, unhappiness-quotes, unhappy, unhappy-quotes

quote: First reach your target in your mind, then reaching your target in reality will just be a formality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: formality, goal, goals, mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-words, reach, reaching-your-goals, target, target-quotes

quote: Earthquake means destruction; dictator means destruction! In the case of earthquake, you need a strong building; in the case of dictator, you need an educated rational mind, because an irrational ignorant mind always serves the dictator!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: despotism, despots, destruction, dictator, dictator-quotations, dictator-quotes, dictatorship, dictatorships, earthquake, ildan-words-of-wisdom, irrational, mind, murat-ildan-sayings, rational

quote: A mind that tastes the grief obtains a good chance to travel to the Land of Wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: grief, ildan-words-of-wisdom, land-of-wisdom, mehmet-murat-ildan, mind, mind-quotations, mind-quotes, taste, travel, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wisdom-wise, wisdom-words

quote: Are you there? If your mind is not there, you are not there! You are wherever your mind is wandering!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wise-sayings, mind, wandering, where

quote: The reality of the mind can be one hundred percent different than the reality of the reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan, reality

quote: Your body is always wherever it is; but your mind, often somewhere else! Thus, when a person talks to you, he often talks to your body, not to your mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mind, talk

quote: To empty your mind, walk in the empty streets! Full mind is a tired mind; empty mind is a lively mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind, mind-quotes, murat-ildan-sayings

quote: For a cheerful mind, sun never sets; for a cheerless mind, sun never rises!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cheerful, cheerless, mind, sun, sunrise, sunrise-quotes, sunset-quotes

quote: A limited mind will have a limited world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: limited, mind, world

quote: The greatest storms on our Earth break not in nature but in our minds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, greatest, mind, minds, nature, storm, storm-quotes, storms

quote: When you take a photo, you often take your own reality into your camera - the reality that you shaped in your mind - and not the real reality over there, whatever it is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: camera, mind, photo, photographs, photography, photography-quotes, real, reality

quote: Do not try to catch the happiness because happiness is not a thing you can catch, it is a thing you can create with your own mind only!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: catch, happiness, happiness-quote, happiness-quotes, mind

quote: You need to lose yourself and disappear in the depths of the repetitions? Find a coast and watch the repetitive waves! Soon your mind vanishes away and when your mind disappears you disappear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: coast, coastline, depth, depths, disappear, disappearance, lose, lose-yourself, mind, repetitivei-waves, sea, vanish-away

quote: Sometimes your mind can imprison your body and can put your body under some constraints. There is only one way for your body to be free: To free your mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, constraints, free, freedom, imprison, mind

quote: You must learn the art of disappearance to protect yourself from the stupid! This art will save your time and your energy and it will keep your mind’s purity. And what is this art? It is to isolate yourself for a particular period of time from the society!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, disappearance, isolate, mind, society, stupid

quote: Our true appearance is our mind’s appearance; whatever our mind’s visage is, that is our real visage! Thus, whenever you meet a person, concentrate on his mind to see his real look, try to understand his mind because his mind is his real face!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: appearance, face, look, mind, real-face, visage

quote: If your mind is misty, your life will be misty; if your mind is sunny, your life will be sunny! Your life will be the reflection of your mind, of your thoughts! If there is a candle in your mind, your life will not know what utter darkness is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: candle, darkness, mind, misty

quote: What a magnificient look a clear sky has! And what a magnificient look a clear mind has!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: A good mind is the mind which leaves no one on the ground when rising!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: When mind is so easy, body becomes so tranquil and so fearless.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: Open the curtains of your mind! If there is light outside, it will come in; if there is light inside, it will go out! Keep the curtains open!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: Seek not a lighthouse greater than the human mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: Have you got a local mind? Broaden it! Have you got an international mind? Broaden it! Have you got a universal mind? It is not enough, because there are other universes. Broaden it! Broaden your mind till you get a multi-universal mind! And yet, this is not enough too! Broaden it! Leave your village; leave your city; leave your country; leave the earth; leave the universe; leave all the universes! Don’t let your mind to cast anchor in any port! Narrow mind is the greatest enemy of the truth! The best mind is the one which has no frontiers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: An unfree mind is just like a windmill inside the bell jar!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: Just like sweeping the streets, sweep the unnecessary things from your mind too; keep your mind clean!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mind

quote: A waterfall cannot be silent, just as the wisdom! When they speak, the voice of power speaks!

category: murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, power, turkish-literature, turkish-writers, voice, waterfall, waterfall-quotations, waterfall-quotes, waterfalls, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

quote: If the storm underestimates your power, nothing happens to him; but if you underestimate the power of the storm, you sink!

category: power, sink, storm, underestimate

quote: No matter how strong you are, there is always another power which can defeat you easily!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: power

quote: All the beautiful corners of the world are the greatest mind and body healers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: world

quote: Don’t hide yourself from the world and don’t let the world hide himself from you!

quote: There is nothing sacred about any beliefs! They are all the apparent inventions of human mind! Beliefs of the billions have nothing to do with the truth! If the world can stop deceiving itself, there will emerge a new world, a world that represents the truth!

quote: Whether you have teeth or not, smile! Because our world always needs a smile!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, smile, smile-quotations, smile-quotes, teeth, tooth, world

quote: Wherever in the world a country is governed by spiritually ill, politically empty, ethically rotten and mentally stupid people, over there you can find nothing but chaos, tears and fire!

category: chaos, empty, ethically, fire, governed, governments, mentally-ill, murat-ildan-quotations, politically-incorrect, politicians, rotten, stupid-politicians, tears, world

quote: If the world you created on your own is stronger than the real world, then the real world disappears and you stay alone with your own created world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disappear, ildan-words-of-wisdom, mehmet-murat-ildan, own-world, real-world, stronger, world

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-quotes, missing, window, windows, windows-on-the-world, world, yourself

quote: What is the world’s problem? The world is still believing the old childish stories! That is the problem! Grow up, world, grow up! Be a bit serious!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-serious, belief-quotes, believe, childish, grow-up, ildan-words-of-wisdom, old, problem, serious, world, world-quotes

quote: A nation’s people must love each other, otherwise there will remain no nation! The world’s nations must love each other otherwise there will remain no world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: love, murat-ildan-sayings, nation, world

quote: Create a world within the world and be happy inside it! Don’t forget, you are not condemned to live the world as is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: condemn, create, happiness, happy, murat-ildan-sayings, world

quote: If we people become more helpful to others, there will be much less tragedy in the world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: help, helpful, helping-hand, helping-others, helping-people, people, tragedy, world

quote: In a simple street you can find the whole world: You can find joy and sorrow; you can find good and evil, silence and noise; you can find all the comedies and all the tragedies! An ordinary simple street is the mirror of the whole world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: comedies, comedy, evil, good, joy, mirror, noise, ordinary, silence, simple-street, sorrow, street, streets, tragedies, tragedy, whole-world, world

quote: If you want to give a message to the world, let it be simple, as simple as the life of a shepherd!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: message, plain, shepherd, shepherds, simple, world

quote: The greatest realisation in one’s life is this: You don’t have to follow others! Creating your own path is creating a new path for the world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: follow, following-others, life, new-path, path, realisation, world

quote: Without mathematics, your world becomes foggy! For a clear vision, you need to be educated in the Temple of Mathematics!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clear-vision, education, mathematics, temple, vision, world

quote: A thought which is created in a second can change the thousand years of the World!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, create, thought, world

quote: A man with awareness lives in a world much prettier and much richer than the world a man without awareness lives in!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awareness, world

quote: The world is your real country! Replace your local mind with the universal one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, local, universal, world

quote: A good quote is a beautiful bird! Wherever you meet with it, you will start flying with it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bird, flying, good, meet, murat-ildan, quotations, quote, quotes, quotes-about-quote, quotes-on-quotations

quote: For those who sit on the stairs, a good quote is a strong invitation to stand up and to go up the stairs!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: quote

quote: A wise quote may not be famous and a famous quote may not be wise! Stick to the wise as the other one is just a bubble!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: quote

quote: If a quote changes your life in a good way, keep it in your mind and in your heart to give it to someone else too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: quote

quote: A wise quote can only change a wise man! Therefore, wise sayings are for the wise men, not for the fools! The sunflowers turn their face toward the Sun, the fools, toward the darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: quote

quote: A clever quote opens new paths in the minds of the clever!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: quote

quote: Courage is to walk hand in hand with the fear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: courage

quote: A journey to the unknown shores needs a port, a ship, a wind; but more important than all of them: Courage; courage to leave the known for the unknown!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: courage

quote: We don't move with our legs and arms, but with courage and will power.

category: courage

quote: In life, courage is sometimes to enter through the door and sometimes it is to walk out the door!

quote: Bad governments always lie because telling the truth requires honour and courage!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ccourage-quotes, courage, culture, culture-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom

quote: Be bold! You will then see that life will find no time to attack you, because you are attacking it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: attack, being-bold, courage, life, life-philosophy, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, murat-ildan-quotes

quote: The less courage you have, the more dwarf you shall be; the more courage you have, the more giant you shall be!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: courage, dwarf, giant

quote: Great man is the one who is aware of his smallness in this universe! Greatness starts first of all with accepting the reality.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A warm dead photograph is much livelier than a living cold reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cold, hot, living, murat-ildan-quotes, photograph, reality, turkish-writers-quotes, warm

quote: When the reality looks magnificent, a real art of photography has only one choice: To capture this beauty magnificently!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Adventure is the best way to feel the reality thoroughly!

category: add, dimension, fable, job, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, reality, reflection

quote: Are you in a desert? Then be a camel! Be compatible with the reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: camel, compatible, compatible-with, desert, reality

quote: A dreamlike reality always looks like a real dream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreamlike, real, reality

quote: When the reality looks extraordinarily unreal, you must know that you are in an extraordinarily beautiful place!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful-places, extraordinary, reality, unreal

quote: You can sleep in a forest and have a nice dream. But when you wake up, you will have a much better dream: The Magnificent Reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reality

quote: The most important thing in life for you is your positive stance in life!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: joy, murat-ildan-quotes, new-paths, open, path, path-quotes, paths-quotes

quote: Why a wise man is wise? The answer is simple: Because he has left his own shore!

category: shore, shores, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wise, wise-man

quote: By disappearing in the Land of Nature, you appear in the Land of Wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom-quotes

quote: Wisdom is not to be at the top of a giant pyramid and hence see everywhere clearly, but wisdom is to be at the top, at the bottom, to be inside the pyramid, it is to be everywhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom-quotes

quote: Children can create fun out of nothing and when this great talent is lost you become a boring creature which is called adult!

category: adult, boring, child, children, creature, fun, great-talent, talent

quote: In a country where children are unhappy, everyone is unhappy!

category: children

quote: Poor or rich, black or white, quiet or naughty, mentally defective or sharp-witted, thin or fat, all children are great!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: children

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: children

quote: A street where there are no children playing is a dead street!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: children

quote: World is brighter with the happiness of children.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: children

category: society

quote: An uneducated society will eventually turn into something lower than a herd of animals!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mine, miner, miners, remembered, respected, safety, society, sun, sunshine, sunshine-quotes

quote: If a man can say ‘My life is more important than my country,’ that man has succeeded in freeing himself from the chains of society!

category: society

quote: Too much work will create too much motivation for the strong, and a big collapse for the weak! Strength gets great strength from the challenges!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: strength

quote: Today’s living people are much more important than tomorrow’s yet unborn people! We need to help the people of today before helping the people of tomorrow! We cannot make our plans so as to save the people of distant future by ignoring today’s people!

quote: If science can eliminate sleep, we will have more time to live and no time for the dreams. But living is superior to the dream because it is real!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: living

quote: A predetermined destiny does not exist; when a man is born, his life is open to all the possibilities; in other words, potentially, man has infinitely different destinies! All destinies are his probable destiny!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destiny

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destiny, destiny-quote, destiny-quotes, fate, murat-ildan-quotations, path, paths, predetermined, predeterminism, tram, tram-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destiny, destiny-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, loser, loser-quotes, losers, miserable, moment, predetermined, trust

quote: From a rat hole you can go to the stars or from the stars you can go to a rat hole! Your destiny is open to every possibility!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destiny

quote: Our creativity is a universe within this universe, certainly a much bigger one!

quote: You want to create a country with millions of great magicians? Then let the free thinking prevails everywhere. And thus creativity will increase and creativity is the greatest magician in our universe.

category: creativity

quote: To achieve a great success, you must first have yourself behind yourself as your greatest supporter!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: achieve, great-success, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, own-support, success-quote, success-quotes, supporter

quote: Being alive and helping others to stay alive is the greatest personal success!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alive, help-quotes, helping-others, mehmet-murat-ildan, personal-success, success, success-quotes

quote: What is a great success? You haven’t hurt anyone? That is a great success! You haven’t ignored any person? That is a great success! You haven’t lied? That is a great success! You haven’t deceived a person? That’s a great success! And now you see how very difficult to have a real success!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: great-success, hurt, hurting, ildan-quotes, lie, real-success, success, success-quotes

quote: Discipline is a kind of divine hand for the mankind on the matter of achieving great successes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discipline, divine-help, mankind, success, success-quotes

quote: Those who want to have a beautiful future must first dream of a beautiful future! Dream is the first step; it is the first action; it is the first move before any move, it is the first of everything!

category: bright, dark, future, future-generations, future-quotations, future-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: He who knows everything about the future must surely be a cursed person! Because life is beautiful if you do not know what life will bring you!

quote: To be in the present time, keep yourself busy always or else you will find yourself either in the past or in the future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future, murat-ildan-quotations, past, present-time, present-time-quotes, time, turkish-literature

quote: Future is something imaginary but the present moment is something real!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future, future-quotes, ildan-wise-sayings, imaginary, murat-ildan-quotations, present-moment, present-moment-qoutes, real

quote: Are you afraid of the future? That is funny because future does not exist yet! Future is not even a shadow, because shadow exists! Let go your fear and concentrate on the present time!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exist, funny, future, future-quotations, future-quotes, let-go, let-go-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, present-time

quote: If you stuck in the past, you won’t be able to step in the future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future, murat-ildan, past, step, step-in

quote: Trying to see the face of the future? Know ye not that the future has infinite faces?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: face, future, future-quotes, infinite, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: The day you stop dreaming, you stop creating the future as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: create, dream-quotes, dreaming, dreaming-quotes, future, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: By thinking continuously your past or your future, you kill your today which is the only substantial part of your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: continuously, future, kill, life-quote, life-quotes, past, substantial, thinking, today, yesterday

quote: Universe is not a calm lake and therefore when you watch a calm lake you get a deceptive idea about the universe and you get a wrong perception of future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: calm, calm-lake, deceptive, future, idea, perception, perception-of-reality, universe, watch

quote: The most tragic thing about the future is that it may not come into being!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: In the future, you will always encounter the past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: If somebody asks you where you are going, tell him you are going to everywhere, because future is a path going to everywhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: What marvel things are waiting for us in the future? What horrible things are waiting for us? Whatever is waiting for us, we always want to be in the future, ready to celebrate and ready to fight!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: You know what the future is? It is a heavy fog which hides inside everything you can imagine!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Since the future is unknown, nobody can really know where he is going! When asked, tell them you know not where you are going! You can only say where you wish to go!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Future is an empty paper, but not absolutely empty; the shadows of the drawings of the past is there, on the paper!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Whatever it will bring, it will be good to be there, in the Land of Future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Live the future when it comes, not now, only when it comes! Now, only live the now!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Look at towards the future! If you see something, it is your imagination only! Because the future is not there yet, it has not born yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: Since the future is unknown, in every step forward we walk to the unknown!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future

quote: What millions believe is often just fairy tales for children! The fabrications of the past are ridiculously accepted as the holies of people! Glory lies in searching the truth not in believing the irrational legends!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anti-religion, anti-religious, belief, belief-quotations, belief-quotes, fabrication, fabrications, fairy-tales, glory, holies, holy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, irrational, legends, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, religion-quotations, religion-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Every irrational and unscientific belief will ruin your life! Your own wrong belief will be your own tragic punishment!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief, belief-quotations, beliefs, beliefs-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, irrational, life-and-belief, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, punishment, ruin, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unscientific, wrong-belief, wrong-beliefs

quote: Everything will turn into a ruin, even your beliefs will turn into a ruin! There will be no more believers from your belief, there will be only the viewers around your belief, watching this belief of once upon a time, and now just a ruin!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief, belief-quotations, belief-quote, beliefs, beliefs-quotes, believers, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words-of-wisdom, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, ruin, ruins, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Your belief is mostly your prison! To discover the world outside your prison, you must first realize the walls surrounding you! Otherwise you shall continue being stuck in the prison of childish tales and fallacious illusions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief, belief-quotations, belief-quotes, childish, fallacious, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, prison, religion, religion-quotations, religion-quotes, tales, tales-for-children, turkish-writers

quote: Let me give you a New Year message: Believe in yourself, because no one ever achieved anything significant without believing in himself and no one ever will! Believe in yourself powerfully, especially when there is no reason left to believe in yourself because the ultimate bottom is the best place to start a big rise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief, belief-in-self, belief-in-yourself, bottom, murat-ildan-sayings, new-year, new-year-quotation, new-year-quotations, new-year-quotes, rise

quote: For any kind of problem, we must first undoubtedly believe that we can absolutely solve it! Then, the solution will come; it is our determination and our utter belief on this matter that shall bring the solution!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief, believe, believe-in-yourself, determination, determination-quotes, problem, solve, solve-problems, undoubtedly, utter

quote: Cut the connection between your clothes and your beliefs, because clothes will not make you something, it won’t make you honest or dishonest, good or bad! Your essence will not change because of what you wear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad, belief, beliefs, clothe, clothes, dishonest, essence, good, honest, wear

quote: Just because you believe in something, you cannot expect others to respect for your belief! They may even make fun of it! All you have to do is to be peaceful at any time, with everyone! Something holy for you may be just a rubbish for others! All you have to do is to be peaceful at any time, with everyone!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief

quote: Any belief which encourages you to use your own intellect, which motivates you to question everything and points out your own mind as the only road for your salvation is a good belief!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief

quote: You may spend fifty or eighty years of your life believing in something totally false, and this is what happens to most people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief

quote: If a thing which is believed by billions is against the reason and not supported by the science, it is a great honour not to be amongst those billions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: belief

quote: Yes, looking through the eyes of literature we may talk about the beauty of sadness! But in the eyes of truth, sadness is just saddening; there is no beauty there, only a touching desperation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, literature, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, saddening, sadness, sadness-quotations, sadness-quotes, touching, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Literature is an invitation to people to discover the world of others and the world of others is the best source to understand and to improve our own world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: literature, literature-quote, literature-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, our-world, world-of-others

quote: Good literature is a lifeboat! Every time you feel you are sinking, jump on it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: jump, lifeboat, literature, literature-quote, literature-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, sink

quote: You want to go to a place where you never lose anything and you keep gaining many things? Go to the Land Of Literature where you gain new paths, new ideas, new lives, new goals, and new souls!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: literature, literature-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Literature is a mountain made of gold in this poor world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: literature

quote: We have invented the literature because the reality wasn’t imaginative enough and we also wanted to be alone, at least for a while!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: literature

quote: In literature, you either create a classical or create a foam! There is no in between!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: literature

quote: Powerful words always travel the whole world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: great-words, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, powerful, powerful-words, travel, traveling, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, words, words-quotes

quote: You can save hundred words with just one look!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, look, look-quotes, looking, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, the-way-we-look, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, words

quote: We must be loyal to the truth, not to our words! Change your words if they are not compatible with the truth; go back on your words, throw them to the bin!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words

quote: You may hear bad words but you always use soft words that carry the air of flowers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words

quote: If your words touch the hearts, that’s good; if your words touch the minds, that’s better and if your words touch both the hearts and the minds, that is the best!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words

quote: Words are never insufficient to describe any situation. It is the talent to use the words which is the insufficient one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words

quote: No writer can be the ‘Master of the Words’ without loving them! Loving is the way for Mastering! No Love, no Master!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words

quote: Sometimes all you need in your life is anything strange because strange things can revive your soul just like a cold water freshening your pale face with every splash!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: freshen, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-and-living, life-lessons-quotes, life-philosophyi-revive, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, pale, pale-face, splash, strange, strange-thing, strange-things, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What can you learn from a statue? You can learn to stay calm whatever happens!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: calm, calm-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, learn, learning, learning-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, statue, stay-calm, staying-calm, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When you leave a port, ask yourself two questions: What mark you have made on that port and what have you learned from that port?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, learn, learning, leave-a-trace, mark-on-the-world, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, port, ports, trace, trace-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You learned something right? Make it part of your life right away! You heard something clever? Internalize it instantly! You heard something beautiful? Add it to your life philosophy at once!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clever, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, internalize, internalizing, learn, learning, life-philosophy, life-philosophy-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, right-away, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Meditation is to leave the noise and to meet with the silence.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, meditation, meditation-quotations, meditation-quotes, meditations-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, noise, silence, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Water is sagacious because it carries inside of itself the bottomless profundity of oceans, the cosmic looks of the clouds, subtle wits of the rivers, the inquisitive character of the rains and the silent meditation of the little lakes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clouds, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, meditation, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, rain, rain-quotations, rain-quotes, river, river-quotes, rivers, sagacious, sagacious-sayings, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, water, water-quotations, water-quotes, wisdom

quote: Simple things relieve eyes; simple things ease mind, simple things create meditation, simple things are simply miraculous!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: meditation, meditation-quotes, miraculous, murat-ildan-quotations, simple-things, simple-things-in-life, simple-things-of-life, turkish-literature

quote: Meditation is mind’s vacation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: meditation

quote: Meditation is not to be on the surface of a thing or underneath it or above it, but it is to be in everywhere and to be in nowhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: meditation

quote: A man who refuses light will remain in the darkness even by the side of light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, darkness-and-light, light, man, refuse, remain

quote: It requires no special talent to be a shadow; but to be a light, you need to be burning inwardly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: Freeze, freeze in the winter, if you really want to appreciate the summer! Walk, walk at the edge of the precipices, if you rightly want to learn the meaning of the safety! Switch the lights off, if you want to see the amazing beauty of the light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light, safety

quote: * If you have a light, share it with people; if you have a darkness, share it with the Sun!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: To give light to others, you must first take light from others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, light, light-quotations, light-quote, light-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, others, others-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is very possible that the majority of a nation can choose darkness! Such fool nations learn the beauty of light through the unbearable and inconceivable pains!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beauty-of-light, darkness, fool, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, light, majority, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nation-quotations, nations, nations-quotations, nations-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wrong-choice, wrong-choices

quote: All a hardliner has to do is to keep the door of his mind open! And then, the light will visit him! Only in light we can see the truths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: door, hardliner, hardliners, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, keep, light, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, open-mind, open-minded, open-mindedness, truths, truths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The most precious light is the one that visits you in your darkest hour!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, darkness-and-light, darkness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, light, light-and-darkness, light-quotes, lights, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, precious, precious-things, precious-things-in-life, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: He who hides himself amongst the shadows deserves to live inside the dark shadows! Meet with the light to deserve the light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dark-shadows, deserve, deserving, hide, hiding, light, light-and-dark, light-and-darkness, meet, murat-ildan-quotes, shadows, turkish-author, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-writers, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: There are two lights in this universe: The light and the Reason!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light, lights, murat-ildan-quotations, reason, reason-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: There is a cosmic river flowing from the Sun to the Earth and to everywhere: The Sunlight, the holiest of the holy rivers! Enemy of Darkness is the best friend of existence! Touch the sunlight with a strong love because light itself made that love possible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, enemy-of-darkness, holy-rivers, light, light-quotes, love, love-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, sunbeam, sunbeam-quotes, sunbeams, sunlight, sunlight-quotes, turkish-literature

quote: The windows of the houses - even if the house is ramshackle - are always beautiful because windows represent light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light, murat-ildan-quotations, ramshackle, turkish-writers-quotes, windows, windows-quotes

quote: There is always a beautiful light around the compassionate people: The shining light of goodness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion, compassion-quotes, compassionate, goodness, goodness-quotes, light, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Never accept the situation where you have the light but sufficient only for yourself! You must have an abundant light so that you may give to others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: abundant, giving-to-others, light, light-quotations, light-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, others, situation

quote: You need a strong light for a tough journey? A light like the sun? Then you need a wise thinking!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light, mehmet-murat-ildan, strong-light, sun, sun-quotes, thinking, wise, wise-quote, wise-quotes, wise-quotes-wise-words

quote: If you have a good light inside you, you will get a good light from outside!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good, inside, light, light-quotes, outside

quote: If your headlight is broken, stop travelling in the darkness! Either you travel with the light or sit tight wherever you are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: headlight, headlights, light, light-and-darkness, travel, travel-quotes, travelling

quote: The best light which illuminates your path is your determination!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: determination, illuminate, light, path, road

quote: A street full of shadows will teach you what life is much better than the street full of lights!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life, life-lesson, life-lessons, light, lights, shadow, shadows, street, streets, teach

quote: To carry a light on Earth is to represent the Sun on earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: carry, carrying-light, earth, light, represent, sun

quote: Everything can always be better! To know this is a wit! But if you also know that everything can always be worse and that is wisdom! Wisdom is to see both the lights and the shadows!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: better, everything, know, light, lights, shadow, shadows, wisdom, wit, worse

quote: Reduce the light, increase the concentration!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: If there is a powerful light within you, it will be clearly visible to others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: Earthworms cannot be painters. Those who live in the darkness can never perceive and appreciate the beauties of the light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: From whichever direction or from whoever the light comes to you, always welcome it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: If you have a light, meet the world or let the world meets you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: light

quote: Trust yourself, trust the road, trust the weather and trust your destination! This quarto-trust can create a miraculously successful journey!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, destination-quotes, journey, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, path-quotes, road, road-quotes, succesful, trust, trust-quote, trust-quotes

quote: When you trust yourself, you sow the seeds of fear into the hearts of your enemies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enemies, hearts, murat-ildan-quotations, self-trust, self-trust-quotes, sow, sowing-seeds, trust, trust-quotes

quote: When you trust yourself, you will come out like a beautiful sunbeam through the dark clouds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trust

quote: Photos which captures human sadness are the noblest and the most meaningful of all the photos!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, noblest, photographer, photographer-quotes, photographers, photography, photography-captions, photography-quote, photography-quotes, photos, sadness, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A sad soul needs an infinite horizon which can throw all his sorrow into the silence of the eternal emptiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: emptiness, eternal, horizons, horizons-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, infinite-horizon, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sad-soul, sadness, sadness-quotes, sorow, sorrow-quotes, souls, throw, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you are happy with your present time, you will look at your past with happy eyes even if you have had a sad past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy, happy-eyes, happy-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, past, past-quotes, present-moment, present-time, present-time-quotes, sad, sadness, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The face of poverty is a mixture of sincerity and sadness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: face, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mixture, poor, poor-people, poor-people-quotes, poverty, poverty-quotations, poverty-quotes, sadness, sincerity, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You know you may feel very sad like a child whose toy is broken; but then you know sun rises, life continues and you start laughing again!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sadness

quote: Sadness is one of the best universities in life! Though bad things take good things from us, they do give us useful things as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sadness

quote: Let the ‘why not’ philosophy be your life principle!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life, life-philosophy, life-philosophy-quotes, life-principle, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes, why-not

quote: Your life will be colourful if you just add colours to your life! It is your own decisions that will determine to have a miserable or a marvellous life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: colors, colors-of-life, decisions, life-philosophy, life-philosophy-quote, marvellous, miserable, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-literature

quote: Sometimes a strong wind blows suddenly and you leave your beloved tree without saying even goodbye, like a pale autumn leaf! This uncertainty of life makes every moment in life infinitely precious.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: autumn-leaves, autumn-quotations, autumn-quotes, blow, ildan-words-of-wisdom, life, life-philosophy, murat-ildan-quotations, precious, precious-life, uncertainty, wind-quotes

quote: If you want the waves to touch you softly, have a walk on the sea coasts; if you want the life to touch you softly, have a walk on the reason’s coasts, because reason is a shield that softens the strokes of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: coasts, life, life-philosophy, life-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, reason, reason-quotes, shield, strokes, strokes-of-life, touch, walk, waves

quote: Though the life is very difficult and at times quite tragic, we must nonetheless be happy for being existed, for being the miracle very itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life-philosophy

quote: One face of the cloud sees the sun, other face of the cloud sees the darkness! To survive in this universe, you must do the same! See the sun, see the darkness! Enjoy the life, but prepare for the worst as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life-philosophy

quote: There are two gods in this universe: God and Imagination. Both of them can design and create infinite creations.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: imagination

quote: Infinite horizons belong to those who have infinite imagination!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: horizon, horizons, horizons-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, imagination, imagination-quotes, imaginations, infinite-horizon, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When you see something impossible, this is often because you have a limited imagination!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wise-sayings, imagination, imagination-quotes, impossible-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes

quote: If you are completely surrounded by the enemies, this proves that you are damn stupid in matters of making friends and such a stupidity, such a miserable clumsiness is your biggest enemy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clumsiness, enemies, enemy, enemy-quotations, enemy-quotes, friends, making-friends, murat-ildan-quotations, stupid, stupidity

quote: When we see a lonely fisherman, we ask where the boat is; when we see a lonely boat, we ask where the fisherman is! We love to see the good friends always together!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: friends

quote: How very wonderful friends the moon, the sea and the night are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: friends

quote: You can walk in a dream while you are awake: Just walk in the misty morning of a forest!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awake, dream, fog, fog-quotes, foggy, forest, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, misty, morning, mornings, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The most tragic thing for a person is to have a very limited capacity in the matters of dream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: capacity, dream, dreaming, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, limited, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, most-tragic, tragic, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Night is the time to dream and morning is the time to actualize them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: actualize, actualize-your-desire, dream, dream-quotations, dream-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, morning, morning-quotes, mornings, night, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Being alive is being a part of a dream and there is no dream outside the life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alive, being-alive, dream, life, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: What is the name of your dream? A lovely wooden cottage in the middle of a forest? Or walking in an endless autumn path? What is the name of your dream? Don’t give a name, always give a list! Fill yourself with dreams because dream is the path to reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: autumn, cottage, dream, dream-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, name, walking, wooden-cottage

quote: Forest is a dream where you may find yourself and dream is a forest where you may lose yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream, dreams, finding-yourself, finding-yourself-quotes, forest, forest-quotes, lose-yourself

quote: Stars are much further away from where they are now for those who have no dreams and no intentions to reach them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: away, dream, dreams, intention, intentions, now, reach, reaching-out, star, stars, stars-quotes

quote: When your dream comes true, have another one! Your dream-box must never remain empty!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: A dream like beautiful place is much more important than the beautiful place in a dream, because it is real!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: Since it is always possible that your dream can come true, you must be very careful in choosing your dream, because the world is full with the unhappy people whose dreams are realized!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: You can give up your present dream provided that you have created a new dream and especially a better one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: No dream can be more beautiful than the reality itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: Anything that ends is a dream. This whole universe is a dream.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dream

quote: No person can walk all alone because to walk all alone one must have no memories at all from the past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: all-alone, memories, memories-quotes, memory, murat-ildan-quotations, past, person

quote: It is such a strange fact that memories of people are more loyal and more faithful than the people themselves! When a person dies or leaves us, his memories yet stay with us!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: die, fact, faithful, leave, loyal, memories, memories-quotes, memory, people, strange

quote: Losing path is a magic! If you can enjoy with the unknown path, you shall find the exit much quicker!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exit, lose, magic, murat-ildan-quotations, path, unknown-path, unknown-paths

quote: Love is a magical shelter where you will feel yourself safe beneath it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beneath, feel-safe, love, magic, magical, safe, safety, shelter

quote: The greatest magic of life is that all things in life can be changed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, life, magic

quote: Look at every creature from the window of compassion with the eyes of love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion, compassion-quotations, compassion-quote, compassion-quotes, compassionate, creature, eyes-of-love, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Look every creature from the window of compassion with the eyes of love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion, turkish-authors

quote: We are nothing without compassion for others and for all other beings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion, compassion-quotations, compassion-quotes, ildan-wise-sayings, others, others-quotations, others-quotes

quote: Believe not the existence of an emotion nobler than the compassion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion

quote: Man without compassion is the coldest thing ever in this universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion

quote: Much less than a man, a little bit more than a jackal! This is the person without compassion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion

quote: If you have nothing but compassion, you are still very wealthy; if you have everything but compassion, you are still very poor!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion

quote: Avoid the man without compassion, because he ain’t a man surely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: compassion

quote: Every kindness we have done is a monument built in our name in the heart of God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: kindness

quote: Kindness is your best gift you can ever give to anyone in any time!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: gift, gift-quote, gift-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, kindness, kindness-quotations, kindness-quote, kindness-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Elegance and kindness is an elegant and kind reply to the rudeness of this world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: elegance, elegant, elegant-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, kind-quotes, kindness, kindness-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, rudeness, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you can be Kind in the Land of Rudeness, you can be King in the Land of Kindness.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: kindness

quote: For a man, no more beautiful wish has ever found yet than wishing him a life full of kindness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: kindness

quote: Beating drums while doing a kindness to someone is a very ugly show of ego!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: kindness

quote: Your body travels sometimes to somewhere but your mind travels every time to everywhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body, mehmet-murat-ildan, mind-thoughts, travel, travelling, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: He who claims to have travelled in the hard roads, let him show his shoes for the proof!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hard-roads, mehmet-murat-ildan, proof, road-quotations, roads, shoes, travel, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Sometimes you do not need a particular destination to go, you just need a travel; the place you want to go is the travel itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, destination-quotes, destinations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, travel, traveling, traveling-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Something right in the morning can turn into something wrong in the afternoon! Even if you are on the right path, you must still question the rightness of your path! Conditions perpetually change! Update your path and your travel constantly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: conditions, conditions-in-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, travel, travelling, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Colourful autumn is a tristful travel to the pale Planet of Melancholy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: autumn, autumn-quotes, colourful, ildan-quotations, melancholy, planet, season-quotes, seasons, travel, tristful

quote: As long as your determination is at least as long as the the road you travel, you will definitely reach your destination!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, determination, murat-ildan-sayings, road, travel

quote: Whatever we do we are always on the way to somewhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: road, travel, travel-quotes, way

quote: Every single moment is a travel into the unknown!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moment, travel, travel-quotes, unknown

quote: Man’s primary purpose is not to be happy but to continue to live, to continue to travel - happily or unhappily - on the path of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy, happyquotes, path-of-life, purpose, purpose-of-life, travel, unhappy

quote: Looking for a good book to read and a great teacher to listen to? Here is a good book and here is a great teacher: Other cultures! To read this book and to listen to this teacher, all you need is to travel!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: book, culture, good-book, great-teachers, other-cultures, teacher, travel

quote: Let our road be long, let it be very long, let it be very very long and in fact let our road be infinite! Travel means flow, flow means life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: travel

quote: If you want to be tall to see the world better, have some high thoughts!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, darbımesel, high-thoughts, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, tall, thoughts, thoughts-quotes, to-see-the-world, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: People of one idea are the poorest people on earth; people of many ideas, people of many different thoughts are the richest people on earth! Only the rich in ideas, only those who have flexible minds will survive in this ever changing universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas, ideas-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, one-idea, rich, thoughts, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: You do not have a mind belongs to yourself! Your thoughts are the thoughts of your culture! When you speak, it is not you but your culture, your religion, your traditions, your political or spiritual leaders speak! If not you but your culture, your religion etc. are speaking on behalf of you, then what are you, who are you? A stupid puppet? Get a mind which belongs to yourself! Only then you will be able to speak with your own thoughts on behalf of your own self!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: free-mind, free-thinking, free-thinking-abilities, ildan-wise-sayings, murat-ildan-quotes, puppet, religion, religions, thinking-quotations, thinking-quotes, thoughts, traditions, turkish-literature

quote: Every man has a river on his mind: The River of Thoughts! But not every man has a holy river on his mind: The River of Right Thoughts!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: holy, murat-ildan-quotes, right-thought, right-thoughts, river, rivers, thoughts, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Worn old shoes need a good cobbler to be repaired; but worn old thoughts, only a rubbish bin!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cobbler, old, old-thoughts, repair, rubbish, rubbish-bin, thoughts, worn

quote: If you want people to enter your world, you don’t need to invite them; just keep your door open and keep your thoughts plain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: door, plain, thoughts

quote: Your windows are closed, your doors are closed! Open your windows, open your doors! Let the air and sunshine enter inside, let the ideas flow into you, let the thoughts flock into your mind! Take, so that you can give!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thoughts

quote: The leaves of the trees are like the thoughts of the men: Some are bright, some dark; some fresh, some rotten; some healthy, some diseased.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thoughts

quote: The right thoughts of the clever man are a ladder which takes you higher places. By climbing these ladders, one day you yourself become such a ladder itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thoughts

quote: Not every thought is a candle! Some thoughts can make the world darker!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thoughts

quote: Stupid crowds are the greatest wealth of the crook politicians!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crook, crooks, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, imposter, imposters, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotes, stupid, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wealth

quote: If a politician obtained a great wealth after he has been elected, his being an immoral corrupt man is not a possibility but it is a self-evident reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: corrupt, corruption-politics, corruption-quotes, elected, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, immoral, immoral-politicians, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotes, self-evident, thief, thiefs, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wealth

quote: Some live in poverty but with their honor; some live in wealth but with no honor! Some lives are respectable, some are disgraceful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disgraceful, good-lives, good-man, honor, lives, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, poverty, respectable, wealth

quote: Our goodness is our wealth and when we close our eyes to the tragedies of the hard lives, we start losing our wealth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness, hard-life, hard-lives, ildan-words-of-wisdom, losing, losing-wealth, murat-ildan-quotations, tragedies, turkish-literature, turkish-writers, wealth

quote: Sometimes man seeks for wealth for eighty years, but cannot find, and then realises that life itself is the wealth itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wealth

quote: Are you looking for a wealth in life? Fool! Life is the wealth itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wealth

quote: You will always remain lonely till the day you meet a person who can understand your mind deeply!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, loneliness, loneliness-of-life, loneliness-or-solitude, loneliness-quotes, lonely, lonely-loneliness, lonely-people, lonely-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: No better school invented yet than the school of loneliness in the matters of understanding our deep-self!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, loneliness, loneliness-of-life, loneliness-quotes, lonely, lonely-loneliness, lonely-people, lonely-quotes, lonely-soul, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, self, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You must always see your loneliness as an opportunity to meet something good unexpected, something new unknown before, something interesting not happened yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, loneliness, loneliness-of-life, loneliness-quotations, loneliness-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The meeting of the two lonely souls is the meeting of the dark sea with the moonlight.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: loneliness, loneliness-quotes, lonely-soul, moonlight, sea

quote: To ease the loneliness of the bridges, visit them sometimes! The forgotten ones must be remembered! Create some memories with them so that they will feel themselves less lonely! Memories are the enemies of solitude.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: loneliness

quote: Don’t be afraid of loneliness, because everything is a door; even loneliness is a door, it opens to somewhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: loneliness

quote: You can do beautiful things with your friends; you can do beautiful things when you are all alone! In togetherness, listen to the music of the crowds; in solitude, listen to the music of the silence! Be neither afraid of the crowds, nor of the loneliness, because both are blessings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: loneliness

quote: Loneliness is a good education. You learn the things no crowds can teach and you discover the things no crowds can give.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: loneliness

quote: It is not possible for a house to own a spirit without owning windows with flowers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers, house-quotations, house-quote, house-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, spirit, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, windows, windows-quotations, windows-quotes

quote: For a cheerful spirit, a dark street is just another bright street!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bright, cheerful, cheerfulness-quotes, dark, ildan-wise-sayings, spirit, street

quote: For us, a pretty bird is a pretty bird; for an insect, pretty bird is an ugly enemy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise-words

quote: Your first purpose is to find a purpose for yourself. And your second purpose must not immediately be trying to reach that purpose you found but to investigate thoroughly whether that purpose is really necessary for yourself or whether it is worth at all to struggle for it! Because millions are fighting for a purpose which will in no way make them happy at the end!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fight, fighting, goals, goals-in-life, happiness, happiness-quotations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, purpose, purpose-driven-life, purpose-of-life, purpose-of-life-quotes, purpose-of-living, purpose-quotations, purpose-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Life is a miracle and your most important goal in life is to protect this miracle. You have one more goal which is as important as this one and that is to protect the other miracles, the lives of others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goals, goals-in-life, lif, miracle, miracles-quotes

quote: Enlightenment is to replace your own self with the self of the universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enlightened, enlightenment, enlightenment-principles, enlightenment-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, self, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: For a finite being, an infinite path has no meaning!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: finite-being, infinite, infinity, meaning, mehmet-murat-ildan, path, path-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: If you cannot create a meaning, the things you see will always look meaningless to you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, meaning, meaning-quote, meaning-quotes, meaningless, meaningless-life, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: In the New Year, never forget to thank to your past years because they enabled you to reach today! Without the stairs of the past, you cannot arrive at the future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, new-year, new-year-quotations, new-year-quote, new-year-quotes, new-years, new-years-eve, past, stairs, thankful, thanks, thanksgiving, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Do you know who your grand grand grand grand grand father is? Probably you don’t! If you want to know your very distant past, just look at yourself because you are the accumulated past, you are the ancient river coming from the valleys of the far past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: accumulated, distant, distant-past, grandfather, grandfathers, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, know-yourself, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, past, past-quotations, past-quote, past-quotes, rivers, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, valleys

quote: In every man’s life there are moments where looking to the past may ruin the future and in those moments walking forward without looking back is the best thing one can ever do!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, looking-back, looking-backward, looking-to-the-future, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, past, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you can be very impartial in analysing your own past, then you will have a much better future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: better-future, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, impartial, impartial-eye, impartiality, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, past, past-and-future, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, your-past

quote: Past is always afraid of being forgotten because being forgotten means being never-existed in a way!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existed, forgotten, forgotten-past, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, never-existed, past, past-quotations, past-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Where are you? In the past or in the future? It doesn't matter because if you are not in today you are in the wrong place!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-in-the-past, matter, murat-ildan-quotes, past, past-and-future, today, turkish-literature, turkish-writers, wrong, wrong-place

quote: You can never really know where exactly people are looking at! At the place they are staring at? Or at their past? Or at their future?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: future-quotes, look-at, looking-back, looking-forward, murat-ildan-sayings, past, stare, staring-at

quote: If you are happy with your past, you visit it often; and strangely, if you are unhappy with your past, you visit it often too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy, happy-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, past, past-quotes, unhappy, unhappy-quotes, visit, your-past

quote: You can’t clean your dirty past as if you are cleaning a dirty window! All you can do is to create a clean future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: past

quote: Every lesson you take from your past immediately turns into a stairs to the light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: past

quote: For most of the people there is no today and there is no tomorrow; for them, there is only the past times! Leave your past to live your today and to live your tomorrow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: past

quote: How many stars can you count in the sky? How many mistakes can you count in your life? Stop counting! No clever man ever is stuck in the past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: past

quote: Unless you refuse the bad things happening to you, you will continue to suffer with your own consent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-things, bad-things-happen, bad-things-in-your-life, consent, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, refusal, refuse, suffer, suffering, suffering-quote, sufferings, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If giving up is to fail, then to hell with give up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure, failure-quotations, failure-quotes, give-up-quotes, giving-up, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: When you start your journey towards your target, walk and then rest for a while and then walk again and then rest for a while again and then walk again! Rule out the option of failure in your mind! Leave only one option available: To reach your target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aim, failure, failure-and-attitude, failure-and-success, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, journey, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, reaching-for-your-dreams, reaching-your-goals, target, target-quotations, target-quotes, targets, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What we call as burden of life is nothing but the human failure on the matter of creating a just world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: burden-of-life, failure, human-failure, just-world, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-writers-quotes, unjust-world

quote: If you fail, let the world knows the reasons of your failure; if you win, let the world knows the secrets of your victory! This is a great way to be useful for others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fail, failure, great-way, murat-ildan-quotations, reasons, secrets, turkish-writers, useful, way, win

quote: A man who is fed up with being successful all the time must definitely try failure to feel better!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure

quote: Sometimes coping with the difficulties success brings is much more difficult than coping with the difficulties failure brings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure

quote: Failure knocks the door of the unprepared minds very often.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure

quote: Make no cry in failure! Make no noise in success! In failure, silence; in success, silence! Fly with the same attitude both in the high and in the low altitudes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure

quote: Both half success and half failure must be considered as a full failure!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: failure

quote: Mystery is a genius teacher: It forces its students to think thoroughly and to ask many questions! The path of mystery gives you much more things than the path of known!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
