category: known, mehmet-murat-ildan, mystery, mystery-quotes, questions-quotes, teacher-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: When the unknown becomes known, we lose something very big: The beauty of mystery!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beauty, known, known-quotes, lose, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mystery, unknown, unknown-quotes

quote: Blessed are those who encounter a mystery in their lives because they obtain a big opportunity to live the great joy of solving puzzles!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mystery

quote: Hungry people need food, definitely not an advice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: advice, food, hungry, hungry-man, hungry-people, hungry-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, starvation, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Do you want a good advice on your path? Here it is: Don’t be sure of your path! Don’t ever be sure of it! Do you want more advice? Here it is: Doubt your path! And examine the other paths, know the other paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: advice, doubt, doubt-quotes, examine, know, murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, paths, sure

quote: Even the most perfect advice cannot be as useful as a staircase or a rope for those who live in the dark wells!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: advice

quote: A person who loves himself can never feel himself completely lonely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: self-love

quote: You, the unhappy young! Try to take a leaf out of the old happy’s book!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: young-adult

quote: When you admire the light, remember to give the darkness its due as well, because without it, the beauty of the light will disappear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: When the sun sleeps, the darkness awakens! When the shepherd disappears, the wolf appears on the horizon!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: When you lose your path, you get an opportunity to discover a world you have never known! And better worlds are often found this way! Darkness and uncertainty hide presents in itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, darkness-and-light, darkness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, losing-path, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-of-life, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, paths, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, uncertainty

quote: Every morning is a revolution against the darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, darkness-and-sunrise, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, morning, morning-quotations, morning-quote, mornings, revolution, revolution-quotes, sunrise, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you are not afraid of the dark, the darkness will start being afraid of you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: afraid, afraid-of-the-dark, dark, darkness, darkness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Those who have darkness in their minds turn their bodies into darkness as well! Life is colourful; be like a rainbow, use every colour! Don’t get stuck in one colour, be colourful! Black, red, yellow, green, let all the colours be your colours! Those who have colourful minds will have colourful bodies as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bodies, body-and-belief, colour, colours, colours-of-life, darkness, get-stuck-in, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, minds, minds-quotations, minds-quotes, rainbow, rainbow-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There are two excellent challengers against darkness in this universe: Powerful lights and great ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challengers, darkness, excellent, great-ideas, great-ideas-quotes, ideas, ideas-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, lights, murat-ildan-quotations, powerful, turkish-writers

quote: Never give up the life you wish, because that wish is your personal sun! If you give up, you will find yourself in the darkness even in the brightest day!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, give-up, give-up-quotes, giving-up, ildan-words-of-wisdom, sun

quote: No matter what happens in the outside world, as long as you have faith in yourself, no darkness can touch you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness, faith, faith-in-yourself, no-matter, no-matter-what, outside, outside-world, touch, touching

quote: Darkness well ahead is better than darkness close by, because you can find a way to avoid the former! Search the horizons to see the storms ahead.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Darkness can always visit us; when it comes, we shall light a candle to welcome it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: You must often visit the darkness to get the people lost in the darkness out of there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Darkness uses light as bait on its fishhook!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Candle needs darkness to show its talents. Good shines only beside the bad; it disappears when the bad disappears. Where there is no darkness, candle is forgotten.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Plants turn their face to the Sun; Animals, to the ground; and Men, to the darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Despite billions of Sun, the universe is still in darkness! The wisdom of light is yet powerless!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: darkness

quote: Mostly the greedy rich is responsible for the poor’s poverty!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: greedy, greedy-people, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, poor, poverty, poverty-quotations, poverty-quotes, rich, rich-people, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Natural disasters happen from time to time but poverty happens all the time and therefore poverty is the greatest tragedy, it is the greatest disaster of mankind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disaster, disasters, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mankind, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, poor-people, poor-people-quotes, poverty, poverty-quotations, poverty-quote, poverty-quotes, tragedy, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Because of poverty and ignorance, not everyman living on earth lives in the same epoch!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, epoch, era, ignorance, murat-ildan, poverty, poverty-quotes

quote: The day you forget about the poors, you become the poorest of the poor!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: forget, forgetting, murat-ildan-philosophy, poor, poorest, poors, poverty

quote: Every one of us see many nightmares every day, not in our sleeps but with our very own eyes: The poverty! The most real and the most common nightmare of all times!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: It is true that prosperity has many close friends; poverty, on the other hand, has only distant watchers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: Poverty must be eliminated or else the honour of humanity will vanish!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: The presence of even a single poor child on the street means a million defeats for mankind.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: When it comes to poverty, there is no need to say anything. All we need to do is to help, the moment we encounter it.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: For a man who is in poverty, doomsday is already there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: A big hole in a poor child’s shoe is the simplest evidence to condemn the society he lives in.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: Poverty is a mathematical proof of the fact that mankind is a big failure!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poverty

quote: Great writers speak with their works not with their mouths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: great-writer, great-writers, great-writing, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mouth, speak, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, writer, writer-quote, writers, writers-on-writing, writers-quotes

quote: If a writer is not an opponent of the government, he cannot be called as a writer, but just a disreputable lickspittle!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disreputable, ildan-wisdom, ildan-words, lickspittle, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, oponent, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, writer, writer-quotes, writers

quote: If you want to be a good writer, internalize the good writers; absorb them; integrate with their souls; embrace their minds; mingle with their life stories; in short, merge with them, lose yourself in them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: absorb, embrace, good-writer, good-writers, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, internalize, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, merge, mingle, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, writer, writers, writing

quote: Whatever good and beautiful experience you are having, if you are not writing them down, you are wasting them! Your thoughts on the paper are your real reality because the realities of the experience quickly disappear, they are already gone, they are dead, but the written thoughts of your experiences are still alive and can live thousands of years! Sit down and write them down!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: experience, experience-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes, writer, writers, writers-quotes, writing, writing-life

quote: Why a writer writes? This question is trivial! The important question is this: What he writes?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: important, murat-ildan-quotations, trivial, turkish-writers, writer, writers, writers-on-writing, writers-quote, writers-quotes

quote: Roald Amundsen says that ‘Adventure is just bad planning.’ In that case, friends, let us make more bad planning!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: adventure

quote: Even a little adventure in the day will make that day a real day!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: adventure, adventure-quotations, adventure-quotes, adventures, day, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature

quote: There is a road which leads to all roads. The name of that road is adventure!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: adventure

quote: Man needs air, man needs water, man needs food and man needs adventure also! Adventure is a medicine for the infinite boredom.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: adventure

quote: If there is no adventure in your life, it is as if you live no life! Adventure is the real soul of man; without it, He is a stub!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: adventure

quote: Here is the fate of the man: To appear and to disappear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate

quote: By walking on the right path, you create a golden fate for yourself and you also become a silver lining for the others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate, golden, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-of-life, path-quotes, paths, right-path, right-paths, silver-lining, silver-linings, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When a nation leaves the fate of his country to an ignorant and fool person, then that nation itself will be remembered in the history as ignorant and fool nation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dictator, dictator-quotations, dictator-quotes, dictatorial, dictatorship, dictatorships, fate, fool, ignorant, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nation, nations, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: We are creatures taken seriously by the Earth, because we can severely affect the fate of the Earth, but we are in no way taken seriously by the Universe yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: affect, affecting, earth, effect, fate, fate-of-the-earth, human-beings, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, serious, seriously, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quotes

quote: If you sleep on the train, you will miss your station; if you sleep at the station, you will miss your train! You can control your fate only when you are awake!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awake, controlling-your-fate, fate, fate-control, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, miss, sleep, sleeping, station, stop, trains, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is always a great honor to be the driver of your own car, to be the boss of your own fate!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boss, car, driver, fate, fate-quotations, fate-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The fate of the world depends on the triumph of the good people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate, fate-of-the-world, good-people, good-people-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, murat-ildan-quotes, triumph, victory

quote: We can't change our fate, because we can't change something which doesn't exist.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate

quote: The tram’s fate is to travel only on its track. But for man, everywhere is a track; everywhere is his fate!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate

quote: Fate! This four-letter little word gave the biggest harm to mankind! We must totally get rid of this degrading concept of primitiveness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate

quote: He who believes in the fate accepts the collar in his neck!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fate

quote: If you know the North, you know where the South is; if you know the darkness, you know where the light is! Evil is an excellent compass to find the good!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: evil

quote: Let those who sit know that this world is not a waiting room; it is an arena to struggle, an arena for action! Let the inactive remember that we were born to act, not to sit!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: act, action, action-quote, action-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, immobile, inactive, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, motionless, sit, sitting, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, waiting-room

quote: Inaction is the worst action of human beings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: action, actions, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, inaction, inactions, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, worst

quote: In action is the worst action of human beings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: action, actions, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, inaction, inactions, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, worst

quote: Behind your view there are other views; to see them, you must first visit the view you see!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: action, action-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, view, views, visit

quote: Crowds don’t think; they act; they don’t produce ideas, they produce actions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: act, action, crowd, crowds, crowds-quote, ideas, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, masses-quotations, masses-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, produce-ideas, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: No matter how right or how beautiful your path is, never try to impose your path on others! Remember that flowers by no means pull bees by force to their world! Your path is your poem; if people like your poem, they will fondly join you in your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bees, by-force, flowers, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, impose, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, poem, poems, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There is no school or teacher more valuable than your own experiences.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: experience, experiences, mehmet-murat-ildan, school, teacher

quote: When somebody speaks a language that we don’t know, we often imagine that some important things are being said!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: language

quote: If an obstacle in the real world can be eliminated in the mind then it can no longer resist to exist in the real world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan, mind-power, obstacle, obstacles, obstacles-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Even the giant lead balls are not as heavy as the two sad eyes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eyes, giant, lead, murat-ildan-quotations, sad, sad-quotes, sadness-quotes

quote: Sometimes a gloomy street is all a sad person needs! A magical relief may arise from the meeting of the two sad things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: gloomy, magical, relief, sad, sad-person, street, streets

quote: Master Chekhov says Man is what he believes. From here we conclude that when Man believes in a crap, Man becomes a crap!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: believe

quote: Your culture is your limit; if you can’t go beyond it, you will remain as a frog of your little lake!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture

quote: You will get closer to the truths only when you start thinking this way: My religion is not the best religion, my country is not the best country, my culture is not the best culture, and my life is not the best life! The more you move away from arrogance, pride and prejudice, the more you will get closer to the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: arrogance, arrogance-quotes, country, country-quotes, culture, culture-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, my-country, my-religion, prejudice, prejudices, pride, pride-and-prejudice, religion-quotes, the-best, truths, truths-of-life, truths-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Look at the mirror! Who are you? You are not yourself, you are your culture! Do you want to be yourself? Then leave your prison and discover the paths beyond your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture, culture-quotes, leave, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mirror, path, paths, prison, yourself

quote: The more you keep your door closed, the more you will rot! Open your door! Let different ideas, different beliefs, different cultures and different attitudes flow into your mind. Anything different will help you to enlarge your little world! By opening your door, you invite the whole universe to your tiny house! Enlarge your house and enrich yourself! As long as your door remains closed, you shall continue rotting in your poor world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: attitudes, culture, different-cultures, door, door-quotations, door-quotes, enlarge, enrich, flow, house, ildan-wise-sayings, poor, rot, universe

quote: Man is often the prisoner of the culture he lives in. Question your culture to break the prison doors! Question it so that you can be able to see the incredible stupidities in your culture!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture

quote: There are many madnesses in every culture! All cultures need reason!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture

quote: All cultures have things to learn from all other cultures. Don’t get stuck in your culture! Go beyond it! Get out of your aquarium; get out of your farm; get out of your castle; break your bell jar! Give chance to other cultures and to other opinions! This is the best way for you to see the insufficiencies, absurdities and stupidities in your culture!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture

quote: Man is a culture, nothing but a culture! Question your culture! Just like monkeys picking lice from their skin, get rid of the stupidities in your culture!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: culture

quote: Anger is a rough water; if you can canalize it into a watermill, you can benefit from it. Anything bad can be transformed into good.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: anger

quote: All the great feelings like goodness, love or compassion eliminate the gravity and thus the wingless man rises like a bird.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: feelings

quote: No man is a great man if he used violence to achieve his goals!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: great-man, great-man-quotes, great-men, great-men-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, man, violence, violence-quotes

quote: Storm destroys, man also destroys, so man is a storm too! But contrary to storm, man can learn no to destroy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destroy, man, mankind, murat-ildan-quotations, storm, storm-quotations, storm-quotes

quote: Man who is at the edge of a precipice has always a better chance to understand the universe than a man who is far away from that precipice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man, precipice, understand, universe

quote: Man has not forgotten to be man because man has not yet learned to be man! You can’t forget the thing you haven’t learned yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man

quote: Man is the ant of the Universe; He is not an important creature, at least at the moment!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man

quote: Man is a marble piece; unlike Michelangelo's masterpieces, man is unconsciously carved and imperfectly shaped by the nature!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man

quote: A man who has built a world empire with only ideas and with love, not with swords and with archers, is the greatest amongst all the men!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man

quote: It is often said that it’s a man’s world! We must change this fact and create this: It’s a human’s world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: man

quote: The more thinking minds, the less sinking world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Where there is little thinking, there is big shaping of the people! ~
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: One thinking man in a crowd worth a thousand men!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crowd, crowds, crowds-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, thinking, thinking-man, thinking-mind, thinking-minds, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Like a breakfast time or lunch time, you must have a thinking time! Without eating and thinking we cannot stick to the existence; without them we cannot stay in the port of this universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: breakfast, eating, eating-and-thinking, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lunch, lunch-time, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, think, thinking, thinking-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What are we? We are a thinking universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, think, thinking, thinking-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe, what-are-we-made-of

quote: Moments of thinking are your military moments because they are the moments where you take the opportunity to attack and eliminate your problems!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, military, moment, moments, moments-of-life, moments-quotes, problem, problems, problems-in-life, problems-quotes, thinking, thinking-for-yourself, thinking-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: To be the thing you see, stop thinking! To be wild waves, you must quit thinking, you must leave all the thoughts before the wild waves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, leave, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, quit, stop-thinking, thinking, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, waves, wild, wild-waves

quote: Are you comfortable? That’s good. But there is somewhere at least someone is uncomfortable! And this should somehow make you uncomfortable too! The world can be a better place only through this way, through thinking others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: better-place, better-place-to-live, comfortable, helping-others, helping-others-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, thinking, thinking-others, uncomfortable

quote: Roof of your house is not your real roof; the walls of your house are not your real walls, your fists are not your real fists! Your real roof, your real wall, your real fist, your real shield is your right thinking! It is your right thinking that protects you from every danger!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: danger, fist, fists, house, right-thinking, right-thoughts, roof, shield, thinking, thinking-quotes, walls

quote: The easiest way to be immortal is to stop thinking and the easiest way to stop thinking is to work hard physically! Remember, when you don’t think, you are immortal!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: death, immortal, remember, remembering, think, thinking, work, work-hard, working-hard

quote: There is something much better than sitting on an empty chair and that is to watch it and to let it to inspire you to think deeply!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chair, empty-chair, thinking

quote: Think something better so that something better can happen!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Open the door of nature; enter inside; forget yourself; think nothing; be the nature itself and now you are a heron, a river, a rosehip, you are the shadow of a fox, sweet fruit of a tree, you are the silence of a lake! When you forget yourself, when you stop thinking, you become everything, you become the universe itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: There is a big difference between a tree and a wood! There is a big difference between a thinking society and an unthinking society!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: When you start thinking, you will lose your contact with the crowds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Thinking is an act of creating sunshine! The more we think, the more our way will be illuminated!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: True thinking brings a good life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: The master of thinking is like a master of sword! He can easily win any fight with a high art and a great elegance!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Put no limit to your thinking or you can never go far and never find the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Think, my friend, think millions of things! Thinking is the Art of God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Thinking is a great joy for a good writer and a great torture for the bad one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: There are too many things around us, preventing us from thinking well! To think well, sometimes we need a heavy fog!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thinking

quote: Gandiji says where there is love there is life. We can also say where there is hate there is hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: Cold is hot, if you love it; hot is cold, if you hate it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: col, cold-quotations, cold-quotes, hate, hot, hot-quotes, love, murat-ildan-quotes

quote: We learn more when we hate than when we love, because hate is eternally awake, but love is everlastingly asleep.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: People ask whether there is Hell. Yes, there is Hell: Hate is Hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: A Japanese proverb says fall seven times, stand up eight. We can also say this: Hate zero times, love infinitely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: Rumi says love turns thorns into flowers. This means that hate turns flowers into thorns!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: Hate is a door with hundred locks and love is a hand with thousand keys!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hate

quote: In the eyes of high morality, to be a victim is always more honourable than to be a killer!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: morality

quote: Give me an old house full of memories and I will give you hundred novels!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan, memories, novels, old-house, old-house-quotes, old-houses, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: In old age, past haunts the present; memories replace the real life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: haunt, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, memories, memories-quotes, old-age, old-age-quotes, old-aged, present, present-moment, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Kids don’t have much accumulated and deep memories and that’s why they happily live in the present time!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, kids, kids-mindfulness, kids-quotations, kids-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, memories, memories-quotes, present-time, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: People of deserts cannot know the importance of forests; to know this, one must first have sweet memories spent in the forests!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: deserts, forest, forests, memories

quote: When they look at a beautiful view, most people see their memories, not the view!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: memories

quote: Every man has two lives: The first one is the one we are living now and the second one is our memories! Memories are our invisible lives. But you must know that it is your first life that creates your second life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: memories

quote: If we lose all our sweet memories, it means we are dead even if we are alive!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: memories

quote: Moments fly, memories remain; and then memories fly, only memoirs remain and finally memoirs disappear, nothing remains!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: memories

quote: In reality the concept of ‘other nation’ is wrong because there is only one nation: The Human Nation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: human, human-nation, humans, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nations, other-nations, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When we were monkeys, we were more human because we were at least not destroying the nature those days!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destroying, human, monkey, monkeys, nature

quote: Beautiful places are almost alive! When you visit them, you can feel their breaths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful

quote: If two people said the same thing but only one of them said it beautifully, then only that one will conquer both the hearts and the minds of the people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, beautifully, beautifully-said, hearts, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, minds, say, saying, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Every beautiful street is a port of happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, port, port-of-happiness, street, street-quotations, street-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: To look beautiful and innocent all the time, keep your heart beautiful and innocent all the time!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: all-the-time, beautiful, heart-quotations, heart-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, innocent, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Be calm like a calm lake, then you will look beautiful like a beautiful calm lake!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, calm, calm-quotes, calmness, calmness-and-attitude, calmness-quotations, lake, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: The greatest danger in finding the right path often lies in here: The right path may look ugly and the wrong path may look beautiful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, danger, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, pretty, right-path, ugly

quote: There is something more beautiful than a beautiful thing and that is a beautiful thing which has a beautiful reflection on the water!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, ildan-wise-sayings, reflection, reflection-quotes

quote: However beautiful a morning may be, we still must not wish it to continue endlessly, because this shall mean missing forever all the beauties of the night!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beauties, beautiful, miss, missing, morning, night

quote: The most beautiful thing about the most beautiful roads is that the destination is forgotten and the journey becomes the destination itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beautiful, destination, journey, journey-quotes, path, paths, road, roads

quote: A man’s greatness is neither determined by having great dreams nor by his determination to realize them; but by his contribution - however small may be - to the progression of the humanity, without forgetting other creatures as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: greatness

quote: For us, the greatness of this universe is to give us every means by which we may build our dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: build, dreams, dreams-quotes, greatness, ildan-wise-sayings, means, universe

quote: Greatness is to stay humble when the whole world calls you great!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: greatness

quote: Find a strong glue and stick yourself to honesty! You shall feel like a wind, so light and so free!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: honesty

quote: Birds don't need bridges to cross precipices and honourable men with honesty wings to cross precipices of slander.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: honesty

quote: If you close your door to the world of books, the gates of the world of ignorance automatically opens and quickly pulls you inside!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: book-quote, books, books-quotes, books-reading, door, doors, gate, gates, ignorance, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A ship with a hole underneath is doomed to sink! And ignorance is also a hole in the brain, a big hole!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: brain, brain-quotes, hole, ignorance, ignorance-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, ship, sink, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: To attack terrorism, firstly attack the ignorance which is the greatest source of terrorism! Attack the ignorance worldwide because ignorance often creates sick minds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ignorance, ignorance-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, terror, terror-quotes, terrorism, terrorism-quotations, terrorism-quotes

quote: The tram can run over you only if you are on the tram way! The darkness can run over you only if you are on the ignorance way!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ignorance

quote: No herd is more herd than the mass of ignorant people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ignorance

quote: The politicians of your country will always try to encircle you with the high walls of lies! You must know that the truth is beyond the walls and without meeting the truth you cannot meet the freedom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beyond, encircle, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lies, lies-politics, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, truth, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Everyman has the ability to lie but luckily not everyman has the ability to hide their lies masterly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ability, everyman, ildan-words-of-wisdom, lie, lie-quotes, lies, luckily, masterly

quote: A dull speech which is full of truths is much more brilliant than an eloquent speech which is full of lies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dull, eloquent, lies, speech, truths

quote: A man who never lies must have green blood in his veins, or blue or yellow, but definitely not red!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lies

quote: You can’t walk till the end on an active railway line and you can’t walk till the end on the road of lies, because sooner or later you collide with the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lies

quote: A house made of ice in the middle of desert! And that house is the house of lies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lies

quote: In Jupiter, there are Earth-Size storms; and in Earth, there are Jupiter-Size lies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lies

quote: Share your food with the needy and you shall see that your food will taste much better!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: food

quote: Silence is a magical sleep where you find the solutions in your dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, magical, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, silence, silence-quotations, silence-quote, silence-quotes, sleep, solutions, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The most dangerous silence is the one where the impending danger is more silent than the silence there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dangerous, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, impending, impending-danger, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, silence, silence-quotations, silence-quote, silence-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Sometimes our best speech is the way we look in silence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-speech, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, silence, speech, the-way-we-look, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When two people got cross with each other and stop talking, the deep silence in the air will continue to speak glowingly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cross-with, get-cross, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, silence, speak, talking, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: To feel free, create a fog around yourself! And how can you do this? Be silent! When you are silent, people will not notice you much! You will be invisible, you will be inside the fog!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: feeling-free, fog, free, invisible, murat-ildan-quotations, silence, silent, turkish-literature

quote: Find a secret place and be unreachable! And then, in the silence of solitude, the things you cannot reach in the crowds will meet you there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crowd, crowds-quotes, meet, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, reach, secret, secret-place, secret-places, silence, unreachable

quote: Every time you walk lonely, you get a very special gift: The silence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: silence

quote: For the sea to be silent, wind must be silent, earthquake must be silent, boat must be silent, fish must be silent; behind every silence, there lies the silence of everything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: silence

quote: Until we will be able to shape the universe the way we wanted, mankind will not be taken seriously by the universe and he shall remain as insignificant ants of the universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: You want to survive in this universe? Then you are in a no-choice-positon! You have no choice but to be strong, you have no choice but to be hopeful, you have no choice but to be clever and challenger!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challenger, challengers, hopeful, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, no-choice, survival, survive, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: Look at the universe! What do you see? An order? Tranquillity? A divine peace? You fool! You ignorant! Over there, galaxies are colliding, suns are exploding, black holes swallowing stars! Now look at the universe again! What do you see? A disorder? Chaos? Anything savage? You see a hell? Now, you see the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: black-hole, black-hole-quotes, black-holes, chaos, disorder, divine-order, divine-order-quotes, divine-peace, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, space, stars, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universal, universal-truths, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quote, universe-quotes

quote: As long as there exist powers greater than you in the universe, you will continue to fight!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fight, fight-quotes, fighting, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, struggle, struggles, struggles-in-life, struggles-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quotes

quote: Whenever a child is born, a potential power that may consciously change the universe is born!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: child, child-quotes, children-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, potential, potential-power, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: We are unimportant creatures in this universe. We are all alone for the moment. Nobody has ever sent us any holy book or whatsoever. To survive in this universe we must first understand that nobody can help us, nobody but ourselves! To be important creatures in this universe means is to be able to shape this universe in such a way that our existence become everlasting!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: all-alone, creatures, existence, existence-quotes, holy-book, holy-books, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, our-existence, space, survive, surviving, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unimportant, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quotes

quote: Look at yourself from the space! You are very little, you are so tiny! But there is something big in you: Your great ideas! Even from the space they look big because they have the power to change the universe, to change the space!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: big-ideas, ideas, ildan-wisdom, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, space, tiny, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, universe

quote: Never give up fighting against the universe because we exist in life through action, through fighting!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exist, existence, existence-quotes, give-up, give-up-quotes, giving-up, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes, universe, universe-quotes

quote: You exist because the universe exists. You owe your existence to the universe. You may call the universe as god or something else, it doesn’t matter. What matters is this: Thank to it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exist, existence, existence-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, owe, thank-to, thank-to-god, universe, universe-quotations, universe-quote, universe-quotes

quote: A man stroking a dog’s head means the universe is stroking the universe; a child playing with a little dog means the universe is playing with the universe! If the universe is a theatre play, then we can be sure that there is only one player: The universe itself! Everything we see is the same player!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cosmos, cosmos-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, player, stroke, theatre, universe, universe-quotes

quote: When you swim, be a part of the sea; when you walk, be a part of the road! Integrate with the universe! See it not as a distinct entity, but as your own continuation, as your own self!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: continuation, distinct, entity, murat-ildan, own-self, road, sea, swim, universe, walk

quote: There are no mighty mountains for the universe, because there are no mountains for the universe, no rivers, no sun and no clouds! There is only universe for the universe, just a single entity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clouds, cosmos, entity, mountain, mountains, river, rivers, single-entity, sun, universe

quote: When you are watching the universe, you are watching yourself! Wherever you visit in the universe, you visit yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cosmos, universe, universe-quotes, visit, watch, yourself, yourself-quotes

quote: When you sweep the universe, nothing changes, only the things change their places; when the universe sweeps you, nothing changes, only the things change their places!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sweep, universe

quote: While we have very serious problems with the universe, it is most illogical and most stupid to make wars among ourselves! Let there be peace on earth so that we can fight with the real enemy: The ever-changing unreliable universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: We need another universe, a smaller one; with more Earth's and less Saturn's; more alive and less dead!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: For some, the universe ends at the borders of their villages; even for others, at the threshold of their home doors.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Universe is a paradise of beautiful hidden doors.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Having a finite life in an infinite universe means nothing; having an infinite life in a finite universe means nothing; having an infinite life in an infinite universe, now, that means something!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: A great idea can change the world; but to change the universe, men need even much greater ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: We must either rearrange this unstable universe or we must exit from here! If we are not a mosquito or a crocodile, we must either dry out the marsh or exit from it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Think big: Universe is a village, a small place! When you think big, all will get smaller!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: The Universe is a big ship and its captain is the Laws of Physics! The bad news is that there seems to be no safe harbour to dock and no lifeboats if we sink!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: The universe does not have a purpose, but we do have! Our purpose is to re-shape this purposeless universe in a way that it will not be able to kill us!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: While other creatures of the evolution are just watching the universe, man alone has the power to change the fate of the universe.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: If the universe has an end, it means we are captive fishes in an aquarium! If it has no end, we are lost sheep in the eternal darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Universe is a friend, it creates us; universe is an enemy, it kills us! It is neither a complete-friend, nor a complete-enemy.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Neither the stone that made you stumble is your enemy, nor the stone that helped you cross the river is your friend! Universe just lives its own life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: universe

quote: Every country is a battlefield for the struggle between honest and dishonest, between honourable and honourless people! At the end, the character of that country will be determined by whichever group wins!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: battlefield, battlefields, character, country, country-quotes, dishonest, honest, honourable, honourless, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, struggle, struggles, struggles-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If lots of men around you are growing a beard just because of political or ideological reasons, you refuse this, and if you have a beard, shave it off! Leave your herd to find yourself! Find your own style, not the style your ideology or your party is dictating on you! Remember, you build a sound character mostly through refusing, through saying no, through staying different!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beard, being-different, being-different-quotes, character, grow-beard, growing-a-beard, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sound-character, stay-different, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Some clever and honourable nations change their regime from authoritarian to a democratic one, and some weak-kneed dictator lover miserable nations do the exact opposite! Don’t try to look for a character in a person who gave up his freedom, because he does have none!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: authoritarian, authoritarianism, character, clever-nations, democratic, democratic-regimes, dictator, dictator-quotations, dictator-quotes, dictatorship, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, miserable, nations, regimes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, weak-kneed

quote: When the river meets the sea, he dies! Because the character of the river is to flow and when the character dies, everything dies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: character, characters, meet, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, river, rivers, sea, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes

quote: It is the character of the road you travel gives you wisdom not the length of the road!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: character, length, road, wisdom

quote: If a railroad is bent, the train shall turn over; if a man’s character is bent, he shall turn over just like that train.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: character

quote: Any regime or any government which motivates its own people to be different than one another is a good regime, is a good government! Encourage people to think differently, to act differently, and to believe in different things, otherwise you create just a herd of animals!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-regimes, being-different, being-different-quotes, different, differently, encourage, good-regimes, government, herd, herd-of-animals, herds, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, regime, regimes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If your government keep making big mistakes and in return you keep supporting your government, then you are the biggest mistake for your country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, government, government-corruption, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mistakes, mistakes-quotes, supporting, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What can you expect from a stupid government? Anything good? Anything useful, anything clever? Anything just? No! You can expect nothing but stupidity, nothing but mistakes, nothing but injustices and tragedies! All a stupid government can do is to produce wrecks and debris!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: debris, government, government-quotations, government-quotes, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mistakes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, wrecks

quote: If bad things are happening in your country, remember, the first responsible person is your stupid government! But if you have supported that government, now, you are the first responsible person! So sit down and shut up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-things, government, government-quotations, government-quotes, governments, murat-ildan-quotes, responsible, turkish-literature

quote: In a country where people are afraid of criticizing the government, many things must be going horrible! In such countries people must know that a society of cowards will always be remembered as a society of honourless people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, cowards, criticize, criticize-government, government, governments, honour, honour-quotes, honourless, murat-ildan-quotations, society-of-cowards, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Unless you have a free press in your country, there is no need to buy newspapers and there is no need to watch the news because there is no need to listen to the lies! And you already have one real information: You are being deceived by the people you are governed! This is an enough information for you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: free-press, free-press-quotes, freedom-of-expression, freedom-of-opinion, freedom-of-the-press, freedom-of-thought, government, media, media-bias, media-distortion, media-lies, media-manipulation, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, news, newspapers

quote: The name of the regime where media is on the side of the government is undoubtedly fascism, a regime of the sick minds where freedoms are drowned in the cold waters of oppressions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fascism, fascismo, freedom, freedoms, government, media, media-quotations, media-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, opression, regime, sick, sick-mind

quote: Governments stand because people sit; if people stand, governments will sit!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: government, government-quotes, governments, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, people, stand, stand-up

quote: If a country is not governed well, all sort of disasters will become a routine of that country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, disaster, disasters, governed, government, government-quotes, murat-ildan-words, routine

quote: If you think that you are living in a stupid country, you can be sure that you are being governed by the most stupid people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-governed, country, govern, government, governments, stupid, stupid-people

quote: If a media is not criticizing the government, then that media is not a media but just a clown of the government!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: clown, criticize, government, media, media-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: A government which is not liked by the artists is certainly a bad government, because artist sees very well what is behind the masks!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: government

quote: An honest government is the childish dream of the gullible men!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: government

quote: Are you tired? Are you feeling that you will not be able to reach your destination? Then all you have to remember is that those who reached their far and hard destinations also felt the same way on their way! Knowing what others felt will give you a great power to complete your journey!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, destination-important, destination-in-life, destination-quote, destination-quotes, destinations, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, journey, journey-of-life, journey-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, target, target-quotations, target-quotes, targets, tired, tiredness, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When travelling, concentrate on the path! Don’t sleep! Don’t read! Just live the journey in full by observing the path instead of wandering in your own world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: concentrate, journey, journey-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, observe, own-world, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, read, sleep, travelling, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-wise-sayings, turkish-writers, wandering

quote: If you are happy with the journey you can give up the destination!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, destination-quote, destination-quotes, give-up, happy, journey, journey-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Watch carefully the journeys of others because the beginning of your own journey is hidden in the journeys of others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: journey, mehmet-murat-ildan, your-journey, your-journey-in-life, your-journey-of-life

quote: Start your journey where the road ends! Glory lies beyond the ends!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beyond, end, ends, glories, glory, journey, path, paths, road, road-quotes, roads, start

quote: Find a unique path and make a successful journey over there! This is the way to have a unique place in the history!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: history, journey, path, road, succesful, unique, unique-place

quote: For an infinite journey, we need an endless road, an immortal vehicle and an eternal body!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: journey

quote: In life you have always the choice to leave the shadowy places and head towards the illuminated locations!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: choice, choice-quotations, choice-quote, choice-quotes, choices, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, illuminated, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, shadowy, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Choices are abundant, it is the right decision which is the rare one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: abundant, choice, choices, choices-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, rare, right, right-decision, right-decisions

quote: If you have a boat to sail, land becomes a choice! If you do not have a boat to sail, land becomes a fate! Create different choices so that you can have different fates!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: choices

quote: When people have similar emotions, their faces also look similar!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: emotions, emotions-quotes, face, face-quotes, faces, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, similar, similar-souls, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: To have a meaningful look on your face, you need to have a meaningful emotions deep inside you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: deep-inside, emotions, emotions-quotes, face, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, look, meaningful, meaningfulness, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Whatever you value, it becomes your sun! If you value a calm night, your own sun will rise with the sunset on the horizon!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: calm, calm-night, horizon, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, night, sun, sunset, sunset-quotations, sunset-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, value

quote: If you can bow in front of the justice at the height of your power, it means that you are really a just person!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: justice

quote: A justice-thirsty country needs nothing but justice, neither bread nor anything else, only justice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: justice, justice-quotations, justice-quotes, justice-thirsty, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: All the buildings of justice will remain idle on the day when all men have high conscience!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: justice

quote: If there is no justice in a country, who can claim that, that country is a country? An injustice country is just a rubbish bin!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: justice

quote: A country where women are not free has no chance ever to be something good and respectable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, free, freedom, good, mehmet-murat-ildan, woman, woman-quotes, women, women-quotes

quote: Woman cannot be free until man’s mind is liberated from the megalomania! His self-exaltation is the mother of the gender inequalities. Till we eliminate his exacerbated narcissism, woman will remain unfree!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: woman

quote: Anything good has a magical power! Say something good; it travels around the world without legs; do something good, it flies around the world without wings! Everything good has a mystical power!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good

quote: Without knowing every single detail in a man’s life, we cannot judge whether he is a good person or not!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good

quote: When you are learning swimming, try to swim like a fish! Target the best so that you can always easily reach good and better!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best, better, good, good-and-better, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, swimming, target, target-quotations, target-quotes, targeting, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Remember that good poets too can write bad poems! Talent has also a talent to be untalented!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good, murat-ildan-quotations, poet, poets, talent, talents, untalented

quote: Wherever you see an empty life, or an empty page or an empty mind, add something good to it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: empty-life, empty-page, good, ildan-words-of-wisdom, life, life-quotes, pages

quote: You cannot call a man as a good person just because he is treating you good! He should treat everyone good to be good!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good, good-person, good-person-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, treat, treating-others

quote: All good that you have done for the humanity, keep it like a secret; do your goodness in the shadow! Let one day others find this secret, preferably long after you have passed away!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good

quote: If the lambs were flying, wolves would have also the wings to fly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: evolution

quote: If you look at the picture of a beautiful bird eating a little fish, you will see two victims there: Fish is already a victim; but the bird is also a victim because to survive, it has to be a killer; it is forced to be a murderer!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bird, bird-quotes, birds, evolution, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, survival, survive, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, victim, victim-quotes, victims

quote: When you see a lion tearing apart a zebra, what sort of divine order you see there? What we see there is nothing but savagery, injustice and chaos, in short, we see a primitive disorder, we see an evolutionary cruelty and a primitive disturbance deprived of any kind of ethics!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chaos, disturbance, disturbances, divine, divine-order, divine-order-quotes, evolution, evolution-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lions, lions-and-zebras, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, savagery, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, zebra, zebras

quote: Teaching the myth of creation to the students instead of teaching them the fact of evolution is nothing but an act of ultimate ignorance!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: creation, creation-myth, creationism, evolution, evolution-law, evolution-theory, evolutionary-process, fact-of-evolution, ignorance-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Watching our closest living relatives, the chimpanzees, is reading the first chapter of human-being’s adventures in this universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chimp, chimpanzees, chimps, close-relatives, evolution, evolution-law, human-being, human-beings, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, relative, relatives, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There are millions reasons to live and not even a single reason to die! You must protect your life - the miracle given to you by the evolution - under all conditions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: evolution, evolution-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, miracles-of-life, protect, protecting-life, reasons-to-live, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, under-all-conditions

quote: The wolf eats the lamb; the strong eats the weak. This is not God’s Order, because it lacks justice, ethics and goodness. This chaotic structure belongs to the evolution! Evolution is primitive and it lacks high intelligence; it moves ahead by crawling and it is faulty! He who calls this system as God’s Order openly insults God! We must know that God is not in this universe; He is somewhere else, somewhere where there is no evolution, where there is justice, ethics and goodness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: evolution

quote: If books are your good friends, then a conscious life will be your best comrade all your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: book, books, comrade, conscious-life, good-friends, life

quote: A bad book with a good cover is nothing but a wooden house with a golden door.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: book

quote: What makes your life rainy or sunny is your attitude towards life, not the attitude of life towards you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: attitude, attitude-toward-life, attitude-towards-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-attitude, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, rainy, sunny, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Anywhere you find peace of mind is your home!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: home, home-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, peace-of-mind, peace-of-mind-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The nice thing about being away from home is the feeling of excitement when returning to it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: home

quote: A house without security cannot be a home!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: home, security

quote: Awareness creates another world - an already existing world where you were not aware of its existence! It is an operation of ‘mature cataract’ surgery!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aware, awareness, awareness-of-life, awareness-of-the-problem, awareness-quote, awareness-quotes, awarenesss, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Amongst all the virtues, high awareness is the most precious one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ability, awareness, awareness-quotes, ildan, murat-ildan, murat-ildan-sayings, precious, virtue, virtues

quote: If you are happy, don’t analyse your happiness, don’t ask questions and don’t even think about it; just live it to the fullest!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy

quote: When you are happy, you feel the sunshine even inside the fog; when you are unhappy, you feel the fog even in the sunshine.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy

quote: A man who can be happy with the crumbs of light in the dark corridors of life infinitely deserves the brightest Sun!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy

quote: Man must be happy, as happy as a poor child cheerfully playing with his poor toy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy

quote: When a person becomes happy, the world becomes lighter! If all becomes happy, the world will be weightless!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happy

quote: To make an elderly person happy is the noblest act a young person can ever do!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: act, elderly, elderly-care, elderly-people, elderly-quotes, happy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, make-happy, making-happy, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nobel-act, noblest, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, young, young-people, young-person

quote: Only a happy mind will see the beauty of a beautiful view! For the sad mind everywhere looks gloomy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: gloomy, happy, happy-mind, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, view, view-quotations, view-quotes

quote: If you are not happy with your life, it is most probably because you have eagle eyes to see the negative parts of your life and almost blind to the beautiful side!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: blind, eagle-eyes, happy, happy-life, happy-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unhappiness, unhappiness-quotations, unhappiness-quotes, unhappy, unhappy-life, unhappy-quotes

quote: If you know the art of being happy with simple things, then you know the art of having maximum happiness with minimum effort!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art-of-happiness, happiness, happiness-quotes, happy, happy-life, happy-living, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, maximum-effort, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, minimum-effort, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A happy face is also a source of happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness, happy, happy-face, happy-faces, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, smile, smiling, smiling-face, source-of-happiness, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: One has to be dull to feel happy amongst the dull!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: dull, dullness, happy, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: You can pull people to your own winter and freeze them up or you can take your sun to people’s own winter and warm them up! It is up to you to bring hell or heaven to people’s life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cold, freeze-up, heaven, hell, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, problems, problems-in-life, problems-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, warm-up, winter, winter-quotations, winter-quotes

quote: Every beautiful place is your temple, you can always visit them; every useful book is your holy book, you can always read them; every place you find love is your heaven, you can always go there! Don’t get stuck in the temples, in the so-called holy books and heavens of the religions because life is much richer, much superior and much intelligent than all the religions because life is alive, it is dynamic and it continuously develops itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
