category: dynamic, heaven, heavens, holy-books, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, life-and-religion, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, religion, religion-quotations, religion-quotes, religions, temples, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A peaceful life is always the best destination one can ever arrive at and it is the only real heaven one can ever ascend to!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ascend, destination, heaven, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, peaceful, peaceful-life, real-heaven, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: On Earth you can meet Heaven and this meeting actualises every time you meet a kind person!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, heaven, heaven-quotes, kind, kindness-quote, kindness-quotes, meet, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature

quote: Earth is a heaven but man often creates many hells within this heaven and a fascist country is one of the hottest and the most suffocating hell amongst all those hells!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, fascism, fascism-quotes, fascist, fascist-country, heaven, hell, ildan-words-of-wisdom, suffocating, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: If only a horrible storm can demolish the castle of the devil, then let the storm be victorious! It is not uncommon that heaven comes after hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: castle, demolish, devil, heaven, hell, storm, victorious

quote: Jean Paul Sartre says that ‘Hell is other people!’ In the name of completing this sentence we must also say this: ‘Heaven is other people too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: heaven

quote: If heaven is within you, everywhere you go you will find heaven!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: heaven

quote: When we look from the bottom of a well, sky shines more beautifully than from the surface! Heaven is a Double-Heaven in the Hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: heaven

quote: If you do not enter inside, what use the door to heaven can have?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: heaven

quote: One of the most important jobs of the youth is to make the elderly happy.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: youth

quote: Do something very praiseworthy in your youth or in your middle age so that you can spend all your time talking about it in your old age!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, middle-age, middle-age-quotes, old-age, old-age-quotations, old-age-quotes, praiseworthy, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, youth

quote: You walk and walk and walk and then you look at back and see your youth, so far away from you, so young, so curious, so hopeful, so breezy, so brave! To feel young in old age, remember your youth very often! Remind yourself frequently what you were once!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: youth

quote: In youth, the greatest success is to see the world from the eyes of the aged people and to feel exactly how they feel.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: youth

quote: A need for many candles may arise in every nation’s history to light up the darkness in the country. Most of the time, the youth is the very candles themselves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: youth

quote: Which gate to enter? Which path to choose? Which stairs to take? Which direction to go? These questions can be very depressive! And sometimes the solution lies in being bold, in being imprudent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-bold, being-unwary, bold, bolness, choice, choice-quotes, depressive, direction, gate, gates, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, imprudence, imprudent, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, paths, paths-of-life, questions, stairs, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unwary

quote: If you see many paths before you, don't be afraid; if you see only one path before you, then be afraid because choice means freedom and no choice means slavery!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: choice, freedom, ildan-quotations, path, paths, slavery

quote: The choice is very obvious if you have to choose between the devil and the angel! If the choice is not obvious in your mind, then you have some badnesses inside you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: choice

quote: There is only one way to be a respectful being and the way for this is very simple: Respect other beings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beings, beings-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, other-beings, respect, respectful, respectful-of-others, respecting, respecting-others, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Respect the hand stronger than your hand if and only if that hand is just and an honourable hand!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hand, hands, honorable, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, just, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, respect, respecting-others, stronger, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You can always be better than your master but you can never change the fact that you were his student and he was your master! The seed must always respect for his soil!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, master, master-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, respect, respect-for-others, respecting, seed, soil, student, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you want to be respected, do something respectful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotes, respect, respected, respectful

quote: No man thinks the same story when looking at a photo because every mind lived a different story!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, photographs, photography, photography-caption, photography-captions, photography-quotes, story, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Here are the Ten Commandments for a writer: Create, Create, Create, Create, Create, Create...
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: writer

quote: There is no vacation for a writer! Every moment of his life is work!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: writer

quote: A good writer must be like the birds of a dark forest; you can’t see them, but you can hear their mysterious and wise voices!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: writer

quote: Let the romantic minds meet the romantic cities and after that the candle of romanticism shines on earth like a sun!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cities, city, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, meet, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, minds, romantic, romantic-cities, romantic-minds, romanticism, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Some beautiful opportunities are like birds. They may be there but only till the next second!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, opportunity, opportunity-knocks, opportunity-life, opportunity-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The Moon always finds an opportunity to turn our attention from the ground beneath our feet to the sky above our head!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moon, moon-quotations, moon-quote, moon-quotes, opportunity, sky, sky-above, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Opportunity is not a rock, it is a bird! You either catch it or you miss it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bird, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, miss, missing-opportunities, opportunity, opportunity-quotes, rock, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When the tram has arrived at the stop, you have to be there! Calculate where a good opportunity will stop and be there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: opportunity

quote: When you feel you are badly falling into the emptiness, stick to the reason , stick to the logic; they will reverse the situation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reason

quote: We need more windows for the houses. And for men, more reason!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reason

quote: Use your own reason to find the truth. And to do this, you must first get rid of the myths that your culture injected to your brain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reason

quote: To say something great, you must first stop trying to say something great! Sometimes struggling is an obstacle to reach the target! Flow like a river, calmly, naturally, enjoying the present moment, without thinking of the ocean and finally you will be there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enjoy, great, greatness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, obstacle, ocean, present-moment, reaching-your-goals, river, saying, struggling, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Leaving a place, a person or a country silently and without any notice is a heroic and a noble way of teaching the importance of your presence to those who ignore your existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, existence, ignore, ildan-words-of-wisdom, leave, leaving, noble, person, place, presence, teaching

quote: Close your eyes because all the great sounds of existence can best be heard with eyes shut!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: closed-eyes, existence, existence-quotations, existence-quotes, eyes-shut, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sounds, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Who can live without eating? A farmer is a great hero because he fights for our existence! If anyone deserves a medal of existence in a country, that person should be a farmer!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eating, existence, existence-quotes, farmer, farmer-quotations, farmer-quotes, farmers, fight-for-life, hero, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, real-hero, real-heroes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What job a fascinating view does, apart from fascinating you? It does this: It perfectly motivates you to love existence much more than you can love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence, existence-quotes, fascinating, love, motivate, view, view-quotations, view-quotes

quote: Everything which helps us to exist is holy! And a tree is holiest of the holy for us!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence, forest, forests, holy, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, tree, tree-quotes

quote: Find a calm lake and wait for the twilight in silence! There, existence will visit you with all its magnificence! The existence of the Existence can best be felt in the presence of dimness and in the absence of crowds and noises!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: absence, calm, dimness, existence, existence-quotes, lake, magnificence, presence, twilight

quote: Hold the Earth tightly and fondly because you owe your existence to the Earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, existence, existence-quotes, murat-ildan-sayings

quote: To smile is to turn the lights on, the lights of existence within you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence, lights, smile, turn-the-lights-on, within, within-you

quote: Remember that existence comes before the happiness and thus to exist is more important than to be happy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Even in the saddest moments of life, the happiness of simply being, the joy of just having existence must be remembered strongly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: There is nothing in this universe which is not in struggle to keep its existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: No man is poor in real terms, because every man owns a great treasure: Existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: What are you waiting for, you little mortal! You have no time! Get up and get out and do something to protect your miraculous existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Woody Allen once said that ‘I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve it through not dying.’ This is certainly a very wise wish! Whoever grasped the triviality of anything besides the existence is a wise man indeed! There is no substitute for life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: If you exist tomorrow as you do today, that is a miracle! It means that thousands of bad things which may happen did not happen and you are still alive! Existence is always a miracle in this universe of chaos!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: A Tibetan proverb says that it is better to live for one day as a tiger than to live for a thousand years as a sheep. Well, I think the opposite, because the most important thing is to exist! Living sheep is superior to dead tiger!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Existence has billions of doors, but death has none!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Existence is more important than happiness; we can’t live without existence, but we can live with unhappiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Fight for your existence and when doing this, try to be just to others! You have no job other than this in this universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: If you believe in existence, you will refuse to be a hero!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: existence

quote: Fairy-tales exist and the best proof for this is our own childhood! Yes, childhood is a real fairy tale!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: childhood, childhood-quotes, fairy-tale, fairy-tale-quotes, fairy-tales, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A thought can be said in hundred different ways but only one of them will be very effective and popular: The one which has been said in the simplest and clearest way!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thought

quote: By creating an intelligent thought, you open the road for many other intelligent thoughts! By producing a stupid thought, you open the path for many other stupid thoughts! Beware of your thoughts! Create pearl, and then pearls will increase! Create mud, and then mud will increase!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thought

quote: Not every thought is a flower; some are thorns. But while a flower may make you fall asleep and too see dreams, a thorn will wake you up and make you to think!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: thought

quote: To live is to paint, it is to create; but while we are painting, we are being painted, being created as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: create, life, life-quotes, live, paint, painter, painting

quote: How long we live is much more important than how well we live!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: live

quote: The earth exists not for us but for itself; the Sun shines not for us, but for its own life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: The Earth loves us through its gravity and this love is ideal: It neither sticks to us nor let us to fly to the unknown darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: Soil is earth’s barefoot and when we walk barefoot, two barefoot touches each other with love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: barefoot, barefoot-quotes, earth, earth-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, soil, touch, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: The more we pollute the earth, the less we deserve to live on earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth, earth-day, earth-day-quotations, earth-day-quotes, earth-quotes, environment, environment-pollution, environmental, environmental-conservation, environmental-protection, environmentalism, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, pollute, polluted, pollution, pollution-quotations, pollution-quotes, pollutions, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Which is the most successful country on Earth? In whichever country dying is the most difficult thing, that country is the most successful one! And which is the most stupid country on earth? In whichever country dying is the easiest thing, that country is the most stupid one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-country, country, death, die, dying, earth, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, successful, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If an earth with no other creatures but only humans would be possible, it would be unbearably boring!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boring, creatures, earth, humans, murat-ildan-quotes, planet-earth, turkish-authors, turkish-thinkers, turkish-writers-quotes, unbearable

quote: We don’t give a damn to the insects on our Earth, but if we could find even a single insect on Mars, the whole world would cherish it like crazy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: appreciation, cherish, earth, earth-quotes, give-a-damn, insect, insect-quotes, insects, mars, murat-ildan-quotations, our-earth

quote: Earth is a flower in the Garden of Cosmos! And therefore, a flower on Earth is a flower within the flower!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cosmos, cosmos-quotes, earth, earth-quotes, flower, flower-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: After a long time when the sun finally comes out of the clouds, the Earth salutes it by striking its best pose!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: What do we see when we look at our Earth from the space? We see a giant present given to us by the evolutionary processes! To love and to protect this cosmic present is the most supreme duty of every living person!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: He who knows Mars, Venus, Mercury or Jupiter very well will also know very well how very precious our earth is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: Earth can live longer then the humanity or the humanity can live longer than the earth! Both are possible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: A house in the middle of nowhere always reminds us our Earth’s position in the universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: Let the creatures other than man also breathe freely. Remember that earth belongs to all the creatures living in this planet.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: Earth travels in the space at the speed of 108,000 kilometres per hour. When you walk calmly in a forest, you must know that you are in fact flying in the space at that crazy speed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth

quote: Only those who spend long times with themselves can touch the depths of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: depths-of-life, depths-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: You are the richest person if you own the treasures of both the solitude and the togetherness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, richest, richest-in-the-world, richest-man, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, togetherness, togetherness-qquotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: When you want to be alone, even few people around you will seem like a tremendous crowd to you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alone, around, crowd, crowds, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, loneliness-quotes, lonely, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, to-be-alone, tremendous, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Solitude is the path to visit yourself, it is the path to yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-words-of-wisdom, murat-ildan-quotes, path, paths, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes, visit

quote: Solitude is not a port to drop anchor, but only a port to rest for a while!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: drop-anchor, ildan-words-of-wisdom, murat-ildan-quotations, port, rest, solitude, solitude-quotations, solitude-quotes, turkish-writers, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: To get matured, you must have an education in the School of Solitude!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: education, get-matured, mature, matured, school, solitude

quote: When alone, concentrate on the fruits of the solitude, not on the poisons of it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alone, concentrate, fruit, fruits, poison, poisons, solitude

quote: In solitude, you will find yourself; in crowds, you will find others! You need both of them: Solitude and crowds; yourself and others! Without others, what to do with yourself? Without yourself, what to do with others?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: Solitude is the rebel of the freedom.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: Every day solitude for a particular time period is a good way to refresh physically and is a great opportunity to rise spiritually!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: Everyday, spend some time in solitude to repair the damages done by the crowds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: When you are alone, bless the solitude; when you are with someone, bless the togetherness! Think of the seagull: It flies alone happily; it flies with another happily too! Solitude is a food; togetherness is a food; man needs both and he must be happy with both!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: In solitude, you accumulate energy to spend in crowds; and in crowds, you accumulate energy to spend in solitude!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: solitude

quote: There is no such a rule that patience leads to salvation! Patience can lead to salvation or it can lead to disaster. Every inaction or every action is open to all the possibilities!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: patience

quote: You poor, patient man, you think you have time? The best thing you can do for yourself is to stop waiting for something and refuse to be patient! Waiting is nonsense! Patience is rubbish! Get rid of these cultural and religious baloneys, throw away these turtle strategies! No waiting! No patience! Do whatever you want to do now! You have only ‘now’ in your hand to do something! You poor, slow man; you poor turtle man! Speed up! To speed up is the greatest revolution man needs!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: patience

quote: Anyone who truly grasps the fact of limited time curses the patience blesses the hastiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: patience

quote: Ignore the people who advise you patience! There is no time for patience! Those who are patient for many years about anything are mad!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: patience

quote: You mortal! You time-poor! Don’t waste your scarce time to be patient!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: patience

quote: Only the big souls can forgive the big crimes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crime

quote: When everybody worships all sort of religious lies and illogical myths, dare to be there, in the land of reason!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: worship

quote: Most of the time it is a good job and a good honour to fight against people's values, because most of the time people's values are irrational and absurd!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: values

quote: To use violence against a peaceful man is the greatest immorality and the biggest rot ever!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: violence

quote: Whatever your objective in life may be, never use violence to get it! Violence belongs to the Land of Evil; once you enter there, your face and your heart is forever sealed with the devilish ugliness of the violence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: violence

quote: If ten men are trying to lynch one allegedly vile person, than we can be completely sure that there are ten vile people and one allegedly vile person over there! Don’t forget, violence makes you a low man!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lynch, lynch-quotations, lynch-quotes, lynching, lynchings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, vile, violence, violence-quotes

quote: Hand holding sword is always an ugly hand!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hand, holding, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sword, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, ugly, violence, violence-quotes

quote: Violence is the tool of the barbarian; aggression is the method of the primitive; bloodshed is the way of the savage; cruelty is the manner of the brutish! To be called as a ‘civilised,’ man must be peaceable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: violence

quote: A beautiful smile without any reason is the smile of the existence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: smile

quote: Smile is a good reply to the dark world.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: smile

quote: To smile when you are defeated means your defeat is already defeated!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: defeat, defeat-and-attitude, defeat-quotes, defeated, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, smile, smile-quotations, smile-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is not possible to find a person where smiling does not suit him or her!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, smile, smile-quotations, smile-quotes, smiling-quotes, suit, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It will be very fair to say that the moments of sincere laughing are the very best moments of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-moments, fair, fair-to-say, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, laugh, laugh-quotes, laughing, laughing-quotes, laughter, life, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, moments-of-life, smile, smiling, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Want to give a very strong energy to someone with a simple act? Then, smile!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: energy, murat-ildan-quotations, smile, smile-quotations, smile-quotes, smiling

quote: A man who smiles when he falls gives the Devil a good slap!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: smile

quote: Since there are thousands of reasons to be happy, let us smile so many thousands times!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: smile

quote: A single smile of man is a thousand defeat of the devil!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: smile

quote: The good things you do for others when nobody sees you make you a real star in the sky, a shining noble star beyond reach!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: doing-good, doing-good-for-the-world, goodness, goodness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, noble, noble-quotes, stars, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Some little pieces of sand are so full of ego that they see themselves as a giant rock! But then the wind blows, the big ego flies in the air!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ego

quote: Ego is a drum and the drum has to make a noise to tell everyone that that it is there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: drum, ego, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, noise, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There is a night school where you shall meet great teachers: The sky! When the night falls, the shining stars in the school will teach you how small you are and how comical to own an ego!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: comical, ego, ego-quotations, ego-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, night-school, school, sky, teach, teacher-quotes, teachers

quote: High ego makes you think that you are the king of the universe while you are in fact the king of nothing!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ego

quote: An old horse, an old bird, an old man, an old tree, they all represent a great survival in the jungle of cosmos; they deserve to be applauded and respected!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: survival

quote: By just looking at a different direction than others, you may gain the vision of a genius because geniuses often do this!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different-directions, different-perspective, direction, direction-quotes, directions, genius, genius-quotes, geniuses, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, vision

quote: Let the dogs bark, the wolves howl, the lightnings flash and the crows caw, you continue doing your job!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: job

quote: To kill for fun is the job of the psychopaths! And what is a matador, apart from being a mentally ill person?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: job, kill-for-fun, matador, matador-quotes, matadors, mentally-ill, psychopaths

quote: The great ideas you met on your path are the genius sculptors which shape the shape your mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: book-quotes, books, books-quote, great, great-ideas, great-ideas-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, sculptor, shape, shaping, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A love letter can be very short or it can be long; it can be literary or non-literary; it can be bright or dark, cheerful or tragic. But above all, for a love letter to be a love letter it must be sincere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bright, cheerful, dark, letter-quotes, long, love-letter, love-letters, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-saying, love-quotes-and-sayings, love-quotes-for-everybody, short, tragic

quote: If there is no one around you that you can teach, it is time to leave to another place where you can teach; if there is no one around you to teach you, it is time to leave to another place where you can be taught!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: teaching

quote: In life there are times where you have to behave like twilight streets: Don’t move, don’t speak, don’t even dream, just be silent and wait for the light to shine on you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life-lessons-quotes, life-quotations, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan, streets, streets-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers, twilşght

quote: Tell me the direction of your thoughts and I will tell you the direction of your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: direction-of-your-destiny, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan, tell-me, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: When you reach your middle age, you see a train far away and shortly after you watch that train passing rapidly in front of you and finally the train disappears in the horizon like a streak of lightning! And that train, my dear friend, is your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan, middle-age, shortness-of-life, speed-of-life, train-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Man is so stupid that all his life slips through his hands while trying to understand what the life is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life, life-quotations, life-quote, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan, stupid, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: You will best realise the speed of life when you stop and watch the life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-words, life, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, speed, speed-of-life, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is obvious that most people are not living the life they want to live! The easiest solution for this problem is to give up the life you want to live. And the hardest solution is this: Give up everything which prevents you to live the life you want to live!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life, life-quotations, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, living-life, living-life-to-the-full, living-life-to-the-fullest, murat-ildan-quotations, prevent, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Luxury life is good if everyman living on earth can benefit from it! Otherwise, it is injustice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-words-of-wisdom, injustice, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, luxury, luxury-life, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: Here is a very simple strategy of life: When the train arrives at the station, be at the station!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-words-of-wisdom, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, life-strategy, simple, station, strategy, strategy-for-life, train, train-quotes

quote: You are whatever you shall leave behind when you leave life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: behind, leave, leave-behind, life, life-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, who-are-you, who-are-you-really

quote: Look ahead, because life is before you, not behind you, or else you stumble!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ahead, behind, life, life-lesson-quotes, life-quotes-and-sayings, looking-ahead, murat-ildan-words, stumble

quote: You have to cross many bridges and you have to walk many paths in your life! But what is more important than this is to know which bridges you should not cross and which paths you must not walk!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bridge, bridge-quotes, bridges, life-lessons, life-lessons-quotes, life-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotations, path-quotes

quote: Let those who are awake awaken the dormant in every matter which desperately needs the liberating light of the truth or else the dormant will forever sleep!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awake, awaken, awakening, awakening-mind, dormant, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, liberating, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sleep, the-awaken, the-dormant, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Many countries collapsed totally just because nations of that country were sleeping like a log while the country is collapsing totally!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: collapse, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, log, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nations, nations-quotes, sleep, sleep-like-a-log, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Unless you have a very good reason, never wake up anybody or anything! Let the sleeper sleep in peace.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sleep

quote: There is no point of being enlightened unless you have started enlightening others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enlightened, enlightenment, enlightenment-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, there-is-no-point, turkish-quotes

quote: High walls and deep precipices on your path or hard rocks and big holes are not real obstacles! There is only one real obstacle on your path: Absence of self-confidence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: absence, high-walls, holes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, precipice, precipice-quotes, self-confidence, self-confidence-quotes, trusting-yourself, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, walls

quote: Every time you survive a horrible storm you start thinking that you are immortal and this is the most negative and the most dangerous part of self-confidence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: self-confidence

quote: Democracy can exist only in the countries where people are brave! Coward nations always live under the authoritarian regimes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: authoritarian, authoritarianism, brave, brave-nations, coward, coward-nations, democracy, democracy-quotations, democracy-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nations, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The biggest mistake of a democratic country is to underestimate the power of a democratically elected pro-fascist leader because it is always easier to destroy a castle from within!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: democracy, democratic, fascism, fascism-quotations, fascism-quotes, fascismo, fascist, fascist-country, fascists, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, trump, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, underestimate, underestimation

quote: If a nation is leaving democracy and choosing fascism, it means that it is taking itself from a peaceful garden to a bloody slaughter house!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: democracy, democracy-in-america, dictators, dictatorship, dictatorships, fascism, fascism-quotations, fascism-quote, fascism-quotes, fascismo, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nation, nations, nations-quotations, nations-quotes, trump, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: As long as there exist stupid people supporting stupid governments in their countries, people living in those countries will continue fluttering badly in the cesspool created by this utter foolishness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: democracy, democracy-gone-wrong, democracy-voting, government-quotations, government-quotes, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, stupid, stupidity, support, supporting-governments, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, utter, voters, voters-and-voting

quote: In a democratic country everything is very simple: If you choose a good government, good things will happen; if you choose a bad government, bad things will happen!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: democracy, democracy-quotes, democratic, democratic-country, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: In a democracy, people always vote for their alike! Pig for the pig, raven for the raven! Dull for the dull, wise for the wise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: democracy

quote: Happiness has only one colour: The Bright! The bright of red, the bright of green, the bright of any colour! Happiness is bright! It shines, it sparkles, it glints!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bright, colors, colors-quotes, colours, colours-quotations, happiness, happiness-quotations, happiness-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, shine, shining, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You will meet happiness on your way if you just stop looking for happiness desperately! Live your life without looking for anything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness-quotations, happiness-quote, happiness-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: There are many sources of happiness. Doing goodness is one of them and one of the best!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: happiness, happiness-quotations, happiness-quote, happiness-quotes, many, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, sources, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: We see what we are only through reflection and thus the more our reflections occur, the less our mistakes will be!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mistake, mistakes, reflection, reflections

quote: Every end of every day is the most important time of that day because you confront with your past and you obtain a chance for tomorrow not to repeat your past mistakes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: day, days, end, end-of-the-day, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, mistake-quotes, mistakes, past-mistake-quotes, past-mistakes, repeat-mistakes, repeating-the-past, tomorrow, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The worst mistakes of your past can be the best lights of your future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mistakes

quote: People often make very bad mistakes because people often don’t ask very simple crucial questions before their actions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mistakes

quote: Never compete with your master, because that is disrespect to him! You are your only rival, you compete with yourself, go beyond yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beyond, compete, competence, go-beyond, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, master, master-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, student, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, your-master

quote: Something always attracts us towards the ruins, because ruins remind us our fundamental problem: The problem of impermanence! Amongst the ruins we see the very end of our road! Whatever shows you the simple truth, it is your Master Teacher; whoever repeatedly recalls you of the plain truth, he is your good master!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: impermanence, master, ruins, simple-truth, teacher, truth

quote: The best master is the one who raises many more masters and much more important than this, who creates masters even much better than himself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: master

quote: Refuse to be called master, otherwise people will start thinking that whatever you say is right! Refuse to be called master!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: master

quote: Hell is a hell of a lie! God is not a torturer!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: People who go through hell in the Heaven of Earth are mostly the people who live their lives according to some religious rules!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell, hell-quotations, hell-quote, hell-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, religious, religious-people, religious-rules, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Hell people talk about hell, love people talk about love!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell, hell-people, hell-quotes, love, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Any religion which uses the words such as hell, fire, curse, burning, amputating can never be a religion of love because a religion of love must only use the language of love, must only use only the sweet words of affection, not the words of darkness and torture!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: burning, fire, hatred, hatred-language, hell, kind-words, language-of-affection, language-of-love, murat-ildan-quotes, religion, religion-quotations, religion-quotes

quote: Living in a stupid country is living in a marsh! You are surrounded by the reptiles and the alligators! Refusing hell is the best path to eliminate the hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alligators, country, hell, hell-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, marsh, path, path-quotes, refuse, reptiles, stupid

quote: At the beginning Earth was a hell; then it became a heaven! Hell is the road leading to heaven! Chestnut tastes good after roasted! When the sand lives through hell, it becomes a beautiful glass!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: Because the mankind very himself is a torturer, he created the concept of hell!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: Sometimes the bridge that leads to heaven is the very hell itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: The road to Hell is always shiny and alluring.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: Chuck Palahniuk asked which is worse: Hell or nothing. Here is my answer: Of course nothing! Because even in Hell, there is hope!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: In a marshland amongst the crocodiles, there float beautiful water lilies! Even in the Hell, one can find the good and the beauty.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hell

quote: Rise not alone, rise with others! If you rise alone to the top, you shall be alone at the top!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alone, others, rise, top

quote: There is a magic in walking alone, in thinking alone: If there is no one to contact you around, the universe starts contacting you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alone

quote: When you walk alone, when everybody is against you, if you are sure with your ideas, walk strongly and proudly as if there is an army of angels by your side! ~
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: alone

quote: It is not the jumps you made in your life but mostly the jumps you haven’t made are the real source of regrets in your life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: jump, jumps, murat-ildan-quotations, regret, regret-quotations, regret-quotes, regrets, source, sources, turkish-literature

quote: There are many you’s within you, but all of them are still you! You are nothing but different you’s!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: you

quote: Do you remember your first real teacher? Your first real teacher is your first sorrow, your first crying!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crying, crying-quotes, first-sorrow, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, sorrow, teacher, teacher-quotes, teachers, teachers-quotations, teachers-quote, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Every sorrow and every pain is a good reminding to us to be serious because we are living in a dangerous universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sorrow

quote: There are two kinds of great power which can shake the earth: Mega earthquakes and big ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Open the curtains of your mind, my friend; let the world know who you are! Do not hide your ideas; set them free, let them free! Open the curtains! Feel no fear! If there is truth in your ideas, you become invincible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: You run out of new ideas? Then you run out of your progression!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, new-idea, new-ideas, new-ideas-quotes, progression, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Let the colours of your ideas are red so that all can easily notice them! And what is red? Red is scream, red is power, red is assertion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: assertion, colour-red, idea, ideas, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, red, red-colour, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Death is the truth of the 21st century and we know that it was the truth of the older centuries as well but it may not be the truth of the next day or the next year or the next centuries ahead! Why? Because we have created the idea of immortality and once we think of something, once an idea is created, it will appear in reality sooner or later!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: idea, ideas, ideas-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, immortality, immortality-quotations, immortality-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature

quote: The best thing is to walk on the right path without looking back, without knowing who is following you because you must walk with your own speed, with your own freedom! Your followers will catch you or your ideas somehow somewhere ahead, somewhere in time!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-path, followers, followers-quotes, ideas, murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotes, turkish-literature, walking, your-followers

quote: Good ideas never require guns; and if an idea requires guns, it is not a good idea!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: good-ideas, gun, guns, ideas, ideas-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom

quote: Same ideas don’t create same faces but they create same behaviors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: behaviour, behaviours, ideas, ideas-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, same-ideas, turkish-quotes, turkish-thinkers

quote: Every idea travels to somewhere but some ideas travel to everywhere, the great ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: everywhere, great-ideas, idea, ideas, ideas-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-quotes

quote: To move the earth like Archimedes, one needs not a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it. There is an easier way: Give a genius a beautiful remote house in a green valley where he can think calmly, and he shall move the earth with ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: You can always borrow ideas; but unless you improve them very significantly, never behave as if they are your own!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Like birds leaving the dangerous places man must also leave his dangerous ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: A brain with many ideas is like a house with many windows! Inside is full of lights!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: If you do not read and listen to the opposite ideas, you can always remain a stupid person! Opposite ideas, however contrary they may sound, are your greater chances on the way to truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: From the port of ideas, not only the most clever ones put out to sea and conquer the world but also the most stupid ones do this!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Ideas are the invisible Gods of our universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Create a good idea and leave it in the darkness; you will then see that people will come with the candles in their hands to find it, because just like the bad, the good has also a special scent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: To get fruits from the tree branches, shake them with hands; to get fruits from men, shake them with clever ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Through your ideas, you open the window of your mind and say a hello to the world.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: You may live in an unknown small village, but if you have big ideas, the world will come and find you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: Those that cannot produce ideas often speak with the old proverbs!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: In the jungle of ideas, it is hard to find the true direction! The paths of the wrong ideas often seem to be very alluring!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ideas

quote: We cannot respect something just because millions or billions believe in it! We can respect something only if it is complying with the high intelligence and the ethics!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ethics

quote: No ethical person wants to be a king or a queen, because there is no ethics and honor in putting yourself in a place higher than others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ethics, honor, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, king, king-quotes, kings, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, place, position, position-yourself, queen, queens, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you are not rising with ethics, you will sink with every rise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ethics

quote: The best comedy on earth shows up when an immoral person talks about the morals!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-comedy, comedy, immoral, immoral-person, immorality, moral, morals, murat-ildan-quotations, show-up

quote: Time is the sole photographer of all the times, from the Big Bang till the possible Big Crunch!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, big-bang, big-crunch, darbımesel, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, photographer, photographer-quotes, photographs, photography, photography-captions, photography-quote, photography-quotes, türk-edebiyatçıları, türk-edebiyatı, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: Knock the door or ring the bell but don't ever push it! Be gentle!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, being-gentle, darbımesel, door, door-quotations, door-quotes, doorbell, gentle, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, knock-on-the-door, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, ring-the-bell, ring-the-bells, ring-the-doorbell, türk-edebiyatçıları, türk-edebiyatı, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: Let us drink wine to remember what kind of mystical beauties life offers us and to comprehend what sort of magic potions existence has!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, beauties, beauties-in-life, beauties-of-life, darbımesel, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, magic-potions, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, türk-edebiyatçıları, türk-edebiyatı, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, wine, wine-lovers, wine-quote, wine-quotes, wines, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: You don’t have to love the storm but you have to know its language in case you meet it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aforizmalar, darbımesel, ildan-sözleri, kelamıkibar, mehmet-murat-ildan, mehmet-murat-ildan-özlü-sözleri, murat-ildan-sözleri, storm, storm-quotations, storms, storms-quotations, storms-quotes, türk-yazar-sözleri, türk-yazar-özdeyişleri, türk-yazarlar, özdeyişler, özlü-sözler

quote: People are perfectly capable of ruining their own lives by very themselves without taking any wrong guidance from outside!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: capable-of, guidance, guidance-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, murat-ildan-sözleri, outside, people, ruin, ruining, turkish-literature, turkish-writers, wrong-guidance

quote: There is no country on earth which does need no revolution!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: An ant can't make a revolution, but a monkey can do; because it owns a fist! No real revolution is ever possible without fist.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: A reactionary revolution is nothing but a high-speed evolution backwards!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: There is only one real purpose of a real revolution: To move forward!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: Every man must be a part of a progressive revolution at least once in his lifetime! This will leave him great honour and great memories for the future.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: History respects revolutions; and yet, if a revolution is progressive, support it; if it is reactionary, resist it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: No turtle can be a revolutionist, because revolution requires high speed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: Even in the middle of barking dogs, you can hear the footsteps of a big revolution!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: Revolution is an awakening, so is the spring! Spring is an awakening, so is the revolution!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: revolution

quote: Sometimes interesting paths create interesting people and sometimes interesting people create interesting paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, interesting, interesting-people, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, paths, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Your path will shine when you shine on your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, paths, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Whichever path you choose, always know how to quit this path, always know where the exit is because once realised that the path is wrong, it has to be left immediately!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exit, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, realise, realise-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, way-out, way-out-quotes

quote: All the paths kneel before the decisive minds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: decisive, decisive-mind, decisive-minds, decisiveness, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, kneel, kneel-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, paths, paths-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The moment you think that there is no path before you, path disappears! The moment you think the opposite, path appears! All paths need people who see them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: appear, appear-quotes, disappear, disappearance, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If you are a path-creator, you don’t need a path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: creating, creator, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, paths, roads, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: An endless path is frightening but the path that ends is even more frightening!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: end, ending, endless-path, frightening, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-q, path-quotations, paths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is a great privilege to travel alone on the right path knowing at heart that one day millions too will travel on that same road!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: at-heart, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, know, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, millions, path, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, paths, privilege, right-path, right-paths, road, travelling, travelling-alone, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The whole world may call you to follow the wrong path! In such a case, tell the whole world to buzz off!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: buzz-off, follow, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, paths, paths-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, whole, whole-world, wrong-path, wrong-paths

quote: You will never be lonely on the right path because the truth itself is the best companion a person can ever have!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: companion, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, lonely, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quote, path-quotes, right-path, right-paths, truth, truth-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Water is the most perfect traveller because when it travels it becomes the path itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, traveller, travelling, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes, water, water-quotations, water-quotes, waterfall, waterfall-quotations, waterfall-quotes, waterfalls

quote: When you find the best path ahead of you, leave all other paths behind you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: best-path, finding, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, leave, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, paths, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The path to tranquility gets through the storms!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: get-through, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, storm, storms, storms-in-life, storms-quotations, storms-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: A wrong path may take you to the right wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotes, wisdom, wisdom-quotations

quote: If the path is beautiful, all you have to do when walking in that path is to be beautiful so as to not ruin the beauty of the path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotes, ruin-path-quotations

quote: When people like the path you walk and the style you walk in that path, they will start following you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: follow, followers, following, murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, people, style, style-quotes, turkish-literature, walk

quote: Only the exceptional paths bring exceptional glories!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: exceptional, glories, glory, murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Know all the paths, but walk on your path! Be original!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-genuine, being-original, murat-ildan-quotations, original, path, path-quotations, path-quotes, paths, turkish-writers

quote: Choose the paths which are not worn out by many feet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: feet, foot, murat-ildan-quotations, path, paths, paths-quotes, worn-out

quote: If you are unable to reach a person you must know that this happens not because that the roads are closed but because you don’t know the true paths to reach that person!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotes, path, path-quotes, reach, reach-quotes, reaching, reaching-a-person, roads, true-paths

quote: Unless you leave the known paths, no one will realize your footprints!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: footprints, footprints-in-life, ildan-words-of-wisdom, leave, path, path-quotes, paths, realize

quote: The nicest thing about being lost is that you get rid of the fear of losing your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fear, lose, losing, losing-path, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, nicest, nicest-thing, path, path-quote, path-quotes, road, roads

quote: One can easily forget his destination when walking in a marvellous path towards his destination! The attraction of the path can be much stronger than the attraction of the target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: destination, forget, murat-ildan-quotations, path, path-quotes, target

quote: The longest path is always the one you walk with fear!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fear, ildan-wise-sayings, longest, path, path-quotes

quote: As long as you keep on walking on the old paths, you will never have footprints on the new paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: footprints, ildan-words-of-wisdom, new, new-paths, old, path, path-quotes, road

quote: You may lose your path, but you must never lose your hope, because hope is the path to all the paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hope, hope-quotes, hope-quotes-philosophy, lose, path, paths

quote: When the wind likes a path, the weeds around that path will tremble all day long!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path, paths, tremble, weed, weeds, wind, wind-quotes

quote: Watch the fools! Watch them carefully! Learn their paths so that you can learn how to avoid them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: avoid, fools, ildan-words-of-wisdom, learn, path, paths, watch

quote: Sometimes you find your way and sometimes way finds you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path, path-quotes, road, road-quotes

quote: If you know the right path, never keep it to only yourself! If you know the wrong path, never keep it to only yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: Every road will take you somewhere! But the question is: To where? To a sunny place or to a place full with shadows? Those who are very sure of their paths often end up in the second place! Don’t be so sure with your path, question it ten times, question it hundred times!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: If you are walking on the wrong path not knowingly, that is bad for you; if walking knowingly, that is stupid for you and if you lead others on the wrong path deliberately that is a shame for you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: No matter which path you are on, always do this: Question your path! If you are on the wrong path, change it; no matter on which mile of the road, change it! Till you find the right path, change all the paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: Even the longest beautiful path is perceived as very short and even the shortest ugly path is perceived as very long! Beauty changes the perceptions!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: If the path you walk is the right one, then the big question comes: How many people have you directed to that path?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: path

quote: Humans which imprison the animals can never be called as humans!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: In a country where even humans are treated brutally, animals must be in a totally desperate condition!

quote: When animals behave like humans or when humans behave like animals, don’t be surprised because in every animal there is a human and in every human there is an animal!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animals, animals-and-attitude, animals-and-man, humans, humans-and-animals, murat-ildan-quotations, turkish-literature

quote: Make peace with people, make peace with animals, make peace with trees!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animals, ildan-wise-sayings, make-peace, make-peace-with-people, peace, trees

quote: A man who learns complicated things from animals is a clever man, but an animal who learns complicated things from men is a genius animal!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animal, animals, clever-man, complicated, genius

quote: For the animals in nature, everywhere is their houses! When we touch anywhere in nature, we must know that we knock their doors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animals

quote: Remember that animals are born to live their own lives, not to serve you! Do not use them; do not exploit them. Let them live their own lives.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animals

quote: When somebody criticise you, be happy and thankful because they have given you an opportunity to think about the matter more precisely and more detailed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise-quotes

quote: Every man must have a peaceful place to contemplate. If you do not have such a place, you must find one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise-quotes

quote: If a house has no garden, the whole earth becomes its garden!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise-quotes

quote: What are humans? They are unserious creatures in this serious universe! And because they are unserious, they appear and disappear quickly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: appear, disappear, humans, murat-ildan-quotations, serious, serious-quotes, seriousness, universe-quotations, universe-quotes, unserious

quote: When you are sad, do not bow your head in despair, lift it up; you can see and fight better when your head is up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: despair

quote: When everything seems too far away from you, don’t despair, return to yourself because you are the nearest thing to yourself! Accumulate energy with yourself! Then you will feel powerful to reach even beyond the far things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: accumulate-energy, despair, despair-hope, far-away, far-things, murat-ildan-quotations, nearest, return-to-yourself, yourself

quote: The word mother must be replaced with the word extraordinary because they precisely are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The strongest shoulders are not the well-built shoulders of a weight lifter who carries iron dumbbells, but they are of a mother’s weak shoulders which carry three children!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mother

quote: There is no rural life in a countryman’s dream and there is no city life in a townsman’s dream! We often dream of the other shores, not our own shore!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city-dweller, dreams-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, peasant-life, rural-life, townsman, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: To give up dreaming is to betray yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: betray, dreaming, dreams-quotations, dreams-quote, dreams-quotes, give-up, give-up-dreams, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, self-betrayal, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: The signature of our eyes, in other words, the way we look never changes even at the age of hundred!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: age, change, changes, eyes, hundred, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, signature, the-way-we-look

quote: Here is a good way for the world to make a good progress: Let the less clever nations learn good things from the more clever nations!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If you always read the same old ideas, what progress can you make in the name of discovering new paths?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: progress

quote: Magic of the nights is always much impressive than the magic of the days! ~
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: Did you have a sad day? Don’t worry, you have all the night to compensate for it! Did you have a sad night? Don’t worry, you have all the day to compensate for it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Bored with the upsetting realities of the day? Then leave yourself to the calming mysteries of the night!

category: bored, bored-with, boredom, boring, calming, calming-the-mind, murat-ildan-quotations, mysteries, night, night-quotations, night-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-writers

quote: In the beauty of the mornings we forget about the night; in the beauty of the night we forget about the mornings! When you meet the beauty, you drop anchor in the present time and all other times disappear from your mind!

category: beauty, beauty-quotes, morning, mornings, murat-ildan-quotations, night, nights, present-time

quote: In a beautiful night, under the stars, man always feels himself above the sky, beside the God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: As if the night has been created for the writers and as if the silence of it is the very inspiration itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: A calm night is open to all the truths.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: A night without stars is a night wasted.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: Night is the fatherland of the great inspirations.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: night

quote: It is always possible that a stupid and a mean leader can keep winning the elections and as for the result, there is no possibility here, there is only certainty: His country will keep sinking!

quote: Don’t ever be a stupid shadow who follows perfectly his leader no matter what foolishness his leader does!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: leader, leader-quotes, leaders, murat-ildan-quotations, shadow, shadow-quotes, shadows, stupid, stupidity, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: When the sun sets, life gets darker in the country; when a bad leader sinks, life gets brighter in the country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: leaders

quote: Do the things you want to do; if you don’t, the things which keep you alive inside you die and you turn into a ghost!

category: words-of-wisdom

quote: Can you see a serene island in the middle of a stormy ocean? And the wise man is that calm island!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: calm, island, ocean, serene, stormy, wise-man, wise-man-quotes, words-of-wisdom

quote: If you live in a dirty big city, it means that you surely need a pastoral life to make yourself clean!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: words-of-wisdom

quote: Sometimes when you lose your way in the fog, you end up in a beautiful place! Don’t be afraid of getting lost!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lost

quote: When the lost doesn’t want to be found, he cannot be regarded as the lost!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: feel, goal, goal-quotes, goals-in-life, lost, mehmet-murat-ildan, objective, objectives, objectives-of-life
