quote: The things that scare you also always provoke you to challenge your fears!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challenge, challenge-quotes, fear, fear-quotations, fear-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: As a legacy, most world leaders leave huge amounts of money to their children and only few leave an honourable surname!

category: honourable-surname, legacy-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, surname-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers, world-leaders

quote: Twilight is a court; when the sun sets we are put on trial in this dusky court! All things we have done throughout the day are interrogated by our conscience, the invisible judge of our minds!

quote: If nobody is somebody for you, then it means you have lost your belief in people; if anybody is somebody for you, then it means you have much love for every person!

category: every-person, love-others, mehmet-murat-ildan, nobody, somebody, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: An excellent photograph is the one which has excellently captured an excellent moment!

category: art-of-photography, mehmet-murat-ildan, photographer, photography, photography-captions, photography-quote, photography-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Nothing in this universe is able to complete its travel on the road of infinity! Because the road is very very long, travellers eventually get tired and turn into autumn leaves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: autumn-leaves, infinity, mehmet-murat-ildan, traveller, travelling, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: We use horses as our slaves; we chain dogs; we steal eggs from the chickens, honey from the bees; we make wallets out of crocodiles; we imprison the birds; we torture the bulls in the arenas; we whip the lions and beat the tigers in the circuses! What are we? Definitely not ethical creatures!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: animal-abuse, animal-rights, animal-rights-violation, animals-qoutes, mehmet-murat-ildan, torture, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: autumn, autumn-quotations, autumn-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, sadness, sadness-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan, travel-quotations, travel-quotes, travelling, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: Whoever is planning a nuclear war or seriously thinking about using nuclear weapons must directly be taken to a mental hospital! quote: When everything looks unusual around you, your eyes and your mind mostly need anything usual! Unfamiliar disturbs us; familiar comforts us! But for the wise man, unusual is more precious than the usual because it offers us a new way, a new vision, a new idea, a new world!

quote: Resurrection, rebirth, reincarnation, resprout, revive! All these words can be summarised only in one word: Vacation!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Wear red and just be silent, don’t even whisper by yourself; you will see that you will be heard easily because red always speaks on behalf of you! By wearing red, you give your tongue and voice to red colour!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: We have one thing in common with umbrellas: We both exist because the rain exists!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: What lies behind the innocent looks? What lies behind the kind words? What lies behind the gentle smiles? Do not remain on the surface of the things; go behind them so that you can compare the seen with the unseen, the surface with the depth to find out whether they are the same or not!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: behind, compare, depth, depth-quotations, depths, depths-quotes, gentle, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, seen, surface, surface-quotes, surfaces, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, unseen

quote: There are many peaceful ways to get rid of a fascist government and economic war against such a government is the best way amongst all these ways! And what is the economic war? It is to stop feeding the economy that feeds the fascist government, it is to take out your own individual brick from the wall of pro-government economy. Halt the food of the devil! Don’t forget that it is you who is feeding the hyena that bites you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-governance, bad-government, economic-warfare, fascism, fascism-in-europe, fascism-quotations, fascism-quotes, fascismo, fascist, fascist-country, fascist-government, fascists, governments, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: You want to get lost? Then get lost amongst a marvellous beauty!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Where you see yourself is more important than where you actually are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Be a provocateur! Provoke people to think! Provoke sleepers to awake! Provoke slaves to revolt against their masters! Provoke everyone to gain control over their fates unchecked! Provoke the lonely to participate the crowds and provoke the crowds to visit the loneliness! Be a provocateur! Provoke people to cross the bridges so that they can see the other side!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Instead of trying to be taller than others, stronger than others, more superior to others, try to be gentler than others, more compassionate than others, fairer than others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: While you are walking in a street, if you are not thinking about that street, we cannot say that you are walking in that street because you are always in the place where your mind is! Wherever you are, you can be in that place only by being at the present moment!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: No one is ordinary because every person carries the wisdom of his own unique path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A silver-tongued charlatan and a half-wit society are made for each other! When these two come together in an election, a great disaster happens: Charlatan comes to power!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-politicians, charlatan, charlatanism, charlatans, election, election-quotations, election-quotes, half-wit, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, silver-tongue, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: It is a privilege to exist, it is a privilege to live and all this made possible by our Earth, our beautiful warm home in this cold universe! If you are a man of high moral standing, you will protect the Earth with all your heart! Earth is the only real holy temple on earth! The more we love the earth, the more we will be loved by the earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earth-day, earth-day-quotations, earth-day-quotes, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: If a nation wants to be deceived, let it be deceived! Through this way, they will learn the truth after many deceptions and pains! Truth and time are the greatest teachers, they are the greatest instructors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: deception, deception-quotes, deceptions, deceptions-in-life, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nation, nation-quotations, nation-quotes, nations, teachers-and-learners, time, truth, truth-quotations, truth-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: What adjective can be used for a nation who is consistently fooled, recurrently deceived by the crafty politicians? Goofy? Very light! Fool? Not enough! Brainless? Yes, that is the very adjective!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-politicians, brainless, crafty, fool, goofy, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, nation, nations, nations-quotations, nations-quotes, politician, politician-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: There are some ignorant and immoral politicians, the more they win the elections the more their countries lose! Their victory always results in the defeat and the collapse of the whole country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crook, elections, elections-2016, elections-quotes, ignorant-politician, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, politicians, politicians-quotations, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: In a petty theft you steal money, gold etc.; in an electoral theft you steal the future of a country! The second crime can be committed only by the meanest people! Such a heavy crime results in a heavy price!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: election-quotations, election-quotes, elections, elections-quotes, electoral-frauds, electoral-theft, frauds, future-of-country, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, meanest, meanest-people, meanest-people-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, petty-theft, theft, turkish-aphorisms, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-sayings, turkish-thinkers, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers, vote, vote-theft, voting, voting-frauds

quote: The desired modernization and rationalisation of Turkey will never be realised till the day the Modern Turks of Atatürk come to power because only modern and rational minds can create a modern and a rational country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Palaces are for the little men not for the great men because great man is humble!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you need a helping hand, look inside you before anywhere else!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: It is always easy to create an ordinary city; what is difficult is to create an extraordinary one, peaceful and restful one, smart and tidy, artful and cultivated one, in short, a livable one! And Zurich is such a city!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Double face in a person is no problem as long as both faces are more or less the same!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: double-face, face, face-quotes, faces, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: Reflection is a blessing and reflection happens not only when one sees himself on a mirror or on the windowpane or on a puddle, but it also happens when someone criticises you! In every true critique made on you, you will see yourself and you will obtain a good chance to make corrections on yourself! Reflection happens even in the books you read! Reflection is a blessing; when it happens, you discover yourself, you face yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, reflection, reflection-quotations, reflection-quotes, reflections, reflections-on-life, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Every time the long-forgotten people of the past are remembered, they are born again!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you are in trouble, you are the nearest first person who can help you!

quote: What is really the Mars One project? It is to carry Frank Sinatra to the Mars, it is to carry Hamlet to the Mars, Gandhi to the Mars, Buddha to the Mars. It is a project of carrying our memories, our knowledge, our history, our everything to the Mars! It is not only a project of saving our future but also a project of saving our whole past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You want to be a river? This is not necessary because you can be a river without being a river; just flow in your life, this is what the rivers are doing, they are flowing! Remember, you can be anything without giving up yourself. Never wish to be something else, always be yourself! You want to be a Sun? Just give warmth to everyone with kind words!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flood, message, message-from, murat-ildan-quotations, ocean, rain, river, stream, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: They want you to use a black umbrella; use yellow, use red, use green and always refuse the thing they want you to use! Refusal is often more honourable than conformity!

quote: Unusual doors often take you to the unusual worlds!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, road, road-quotations, road-quotes, turkish-literature, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: The fate of every unusual thing is to be a usual thing quickly!

author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: He who knows to be afraid has a higher chance of living!

quote: Cats strongly believe that everywhere is designed for their comfort!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you are unhappy, do not resist it! Let your unhappiness do its turn. After that the turn comes to the happiness!

category: murat-ildan-quotations, resist, turkish-literature, turn, unhappiness, unhappiness-quotations, unhappiness-quotes, unhappy, your-turn

quote: If one part of a country is watching football match while the other part of the same country is under heavy attacks by the rockets, then we can say that there is no nation in that country, but there is only crowd of people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

category: afraid-of, devilish, journalist, journalist-quotes, journalists, murat-ildan-quotations, secret, secret-things, states, turkish-literature

quote: The best thing you can give to a child is to create an environment where the child can develop an independent mind so that he will be the man of no one and the instrument of no system!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Our real power in life comes from our true thinking!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Stick to the honesty and never leave it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: If you can’t control it, you will be the toy of your own mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Great thoughts cannot remain silent. They are born to scream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: The untrue things don’t deserve to be respected!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: The goodnesses you do will beautifully cover you like the beautiful flowers covering a country house!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Simple things have greater power than the complicated things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: When a great moment arises, it is great to be right there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Spend time for yourself, walk in solitude, refresh your mind and body so that you can spend time for others and walk with them! Spend time for yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: When the life is wavy, keep your mind smooth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-literature

quote: Do you have a problem? Think carefully! Is it really a problem or is it just your mind’s invention, your mind’s exaggeration? Is your problem really a problem? Think carefully, because mostly it is not!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problems

quote: When climbing, you don’t have to put your foot on every step, jump over some of them! When solving your problems, you don’t have to solve each and every one, jump over some of them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problems

quote: Not all the problems must be solved! Stick to this philosophy and you will save awful a lot of time! Stick to this philosophy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problems

quote: While the sun is shining on you, solve all your problems or else you shall be lost forever in the darkness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problems

quote: Do not postpone your problems, solve them now! Because tomorrow you might be weaker than today and there might arise additional problems! Unsheathe your sword now; forget tomorrow, time is now!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problems

quote: Frog in the mud is happier than the man, because it has no ambition to reach the stars!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ambition

quote: A touch may not be always be a love but love is always a touch!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: always, love, love-quotations, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-sayings, murat-ildan-quotations, touch, touch-quotes, touching

quote: A touch may not always be a love but love is always a touch!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: love, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-sayings, murat-ildan-words, touch, touch-quotes

quote: You want more light in your house? Enlarge your windows! You want more truth in your life? Doubt everything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: doubt

quote: Only the dull don’t doubt!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: doubt

quote: You can't create an ocean with a single drop. But you can create an ocean of suspicion with a single drop of doubt.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: doubt

quote: Doubt in love is the Devil in the paradise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: doubt

quote: If you keep fighting with yourself, you will have less energy to fight with life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: energy, fighting, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words-of-wisdom, life-quotes, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-thinkers

quote: Wherever there is a religious regime, over there there is ignorance, misery and absurdity! No religious state can ever elevate its own people! Sooner or later, the primitiveness of the religious administrations and the irrationality of the religious rules will cause a great collapse of those countries! The downfall is inevitable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religious

quote: Some countries and some people are so primitively religious and so underdeveloped that they don’t need a time machine to go back to the past; they are already in there, in the very distant and dark past!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: religious

quote: Treat your body good, because your body is your boat, it is your horse, it is your car, your wings, your every possible vehicle to take you to every possible place!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: body

quote: If a danger threatens you, you threaten that danger too
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: danger, dangers, murat-ildan-quotes, threaten, threatening

quote: To isolate life from danger is a mission impossible! To take precautions against the dangers, that is the necessary and plausible mission!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: danger

quote: If you see a big danger ahead, don’t start running immediately; because it may be the challenge that at the end you shall become stronger than ever before! Do not avoid every danger!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: danger

quote: Danger is hidden everywhere! You can’t always be physically ready for it, but you can always be ready mentally!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: danger

quote: If we had known everything in this universe, we would have had to find another universe to feed our curiosity, because what keeps alive man is the curiosity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: curiosity

quote: A man with a great curiosity will never get bored even if he lives millions years!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: curiosity

quote: People like the leaders; they like to follow them; they let the leaders to think on behalf of them; they like shepherds; they like to behave like sheep! For god’s sake, follow your own path, be an individual, be independent! Stop being a coach in the train, a duck in the row! Get some personality! Use your own mind to determine your own path! Forget the leader, forget the shepherd, forget the guru, and forget the protagonist! Be the leader of yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: leader

quote: You will find angels everywhere if you just stop looking for a supernatural being with feathered wings. When you see the sunshine through the clouds in a cold day, there the angel is! Anything good, anything useful, anything which gives you peace, they are all real angels! Look around you, you will see thousands of angels!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: angels

quote: The secret angels of God are only as alive as the marble angels of Michelangelo!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: angels

quote: In a conservative old town, say something new and be prepared for the stones!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: If you are good at building bridges, you will never fall into the abyss!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: abyss, bridge, bridge-quotations, bridge-quotes, bridges, fall, falling, good-at, mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Every long separation is a test: A test to see how powerful or how weak the will of reuniting is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan, powerful, reunite, reunited-lovers, seperation, seperations, strong, test, weak, will

quote: On the matters where your country is wrong, don’t take side with your country! Because it is always wrong to be on the side of wrong!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, mehmet-murat-ildan, take-side, take-sides, wrong

quote: Don’t look for trouble, because troubles look for being found by those who look for them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-found, look-for, mehmet-murat-ildan, trouble, trouble-quotes, troubles

quote: Every time you do goodness, you rise to the summit of humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: We cannot allow the badness to be triumphant on earth because we do not have a spare world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Do not underrate others, do not underrate yourself, and do not underrate anything! Do not overrate others, do not overrate yourself, and do not overrate anything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Storms are good friends because they light up the way to wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Refuse to seek for the road to paradise, because every beautiful place is already a paradise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: In every different house, the same things are spoken, the same lies are said, the same dreams are dreamed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: A well educated man with an independent mind is a type of man liked by no government!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Every right quote is a golden stair to enlightenment!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan

quote: Every lighthouse knows that when the giant waves come, no one will help! And when you know that no one will help you, you fight more seriously!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fight, fight-quotes, giant, help, lighthouse, lighthouse-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, waves

quote: If you have to choose between the two hopeless situations, choose the one which gives you at least an opportunity to fight!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fight

quote: The universe has no mind and that’s why it can never reach perfection! Perfection is the art of meticulous high-mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: perfection

quote: On the Earth, you admire the Moon; on the Moon, you admire the Earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: Since many things we see were once an idea, let us create good ideas today because they will be the realities of tomorrow! When you create an idea, do not forget that you shape the future! Idea is your God side! With ideas, you can change the universe, but only with very great ideas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: Looking for a saviour in the sky? Be serious! Know you still not that there ain’t any saviour but science! Get rid of your cultural craps and your religious illusions! Be realist! In this universe, only the realists have the chance to save themselves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: There is no need to upset about the fact that our ancestors were monkeys, because they are capable chaps! Don’t be sad about the truth, just understand the truth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: The stone you took away from a beach will long for that beach because it belongs there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beach, belong-to, murat-ildan-quotes, stone, turkish-writers

quote: A boat without port is free only until the storm breaks out!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boat, break-out, feeling-free, free, murat-ildan-quotations, port, port-quotes, storm, storm-quotes, storms, turkish-writers, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Yes, human salvation will come through science, but only through the nature-respecting science!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: human-salvation, murat-ildan-quotes, nature-quotes, nature-respecting, salvation, salvation-of-the-world, science-quotations, science-quote, science-quotes, turkish-writers, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Whichever point you reach in the future, that will be a miracle! If you reach tomorrow, that will be a miracle! If you reach next week or next year, that will be a miracle! Your every arrival to any point in the future time is a great victory!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: Today’s warm houses will be the cold ruins in the very distant future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: Once you take sword in your hand, you will lose your right to talk about the peace! Man of peace and love never takes the sword in his hand!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: For a great willpower, no road has length!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-writers

quote: You can never be a giant if you do not challenge the powers much more powerful than you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-a-giant, challenge, challenges-quotes, giant, ildan-words-of-wisdom, powerful, turkish-writers

quote: Some politicians are much noisier than the dogs! Just like teaching a dog how to hush, public must likewise teach those politicians to shush!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hush, murat-ildan-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, politics, politics-quotes, shush, turkish-writers

quote: Don’t perceive the facts as a false criticism or else you lose badly! Because facts are facts and they need to be respected and be taken into consideration promptly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: criticism, criticism-quotes, facts, facts-quotes, false-criticism, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, perceive, promptly, turkish-writers

quote: The goodness you do might fail; but keep doing it, because the real failure is never doing goodness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: Doing goodness, but doing goodness only is the best and the most superior religion of all the times!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: Never wish the death of anyone or you will lose your goodness inside you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: In matters of goodness, never expect any compliment or appreciation; just do your goodness and disappear!

category: goodness

quote: The goodness you do when you are very happy is not as valuable as the goodness you do when you are very unhappy!

category: goodness

quote: Visit the port of goodness often; if you can, cast your anchor over there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: Doing goodness is good only when you don’t expect anything in return; not a medal, not even a simple thanking!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: For a water drop, the most beautiful house is a leaf; and for a man: The goodness! Let the goodness be your home you permanently live in!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: goodness

quote: If you close your eyes, no lighthouse can help you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eyes, lighthouse, lighthouse-quotes, lighthouses

quote: Reflection is a good reminder of the truth! You may turn your eyes away from the truths, but the reflections will remind them to you! And anything which describes a truth well is a reflection of that truth! Turn your eyes away from the Moon, then the lake will remind the Moon to you, the shadows of the wolves howling against the Moon will remind the truth to you, even in the eyes of a frog, you shall see the Moon! Thus, if you turn your face away from the truth, it will never work! Because the reminders of truth are everywhere and they are as strong as the truth itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eyes, frog, lake, moon, moonlight, reflection, reflections, reminder, truth, truths, wolves

quote: In life moments arrive where the mouth becomes tongueless and the eyes become tongue!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eyes, life, moments, mouth, tongue, tongueless

quote: Fire is one of our best friends in this cold universe. Put some wood in it to show your gratitude.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fire

quote: Library: The Temple of the Wise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: library, library-quotes, temple, wise

quote: All the quiet corners of the world are the great temples for the wise and for the wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise

quote: If you are a sparrow, don’t attack the eagle; be wise! If you are an eagle, don’t attack the sparrow; be just!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise

quote: Politicians are like little cats: They are never serious; they always mess up the things; they are fainthearted and spoilt. And when they look at the mirror, they see a tiger there, till the hammer of reality break that mirror very harshly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cats, little-cats, mess-up, mirror, murat-ildan-quotes, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes, politics, tiger

quote: Little cats mean little kids, little kids mean little cats!

quote: Cats are the visible angels of the cities! There is always an eye of a cat observing you somewhere!

category: cats

quote: When bored, find a little cat and watch it; when very bored, find two little cats and watch them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: cats

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: Ignorant voters of the democracies are always a great threat to the progression of humanity, simply because they give their votes to the people who look like themselves!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: Enter the streets that you have never been to for the sake of the concealed beauties and the hidden truths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: What you do when nobody is there is your true you!

quote: For God must have more important universal matters to attend to than keeping himself busy with us, people! God is not interested in local matters!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: In the middle of the North Pole, anything hot gives the feeling like touching the hand of the God!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: Help is not in the sky, help is within you, in your mind; help is your reason! Turn your face to your reason not to the sky!

quote: If you are not afraid of rising, you will see that wings start growing in your body!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: When something bad happens, this often opens the ways for some good things to happen!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: Help your brother; and as regards helping, everyone is your brother!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: When a good change is flowing towards you, don’t stand like the river stones before it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

quote: When the sleep appears like a ghost, all the reality disappears!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes

The medusa of Turritopsis nutricula is biologically immortal and this little creature is a big inspiration for us! He who thinks positively reaches his target!

quote: For your shadow, you are his shadow!

category: devil

author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: devil

quote: When you reached the summit, you will see that you are still tiny!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Loneliness opens the door for wisdom and wisdom opens all the doors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: More gates you open, more worlds you discover! More worlds you discover, more gates are opened!

category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: The wind likes making jokes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: If the weather is sunny, it is good; if the weather is rainy, it is good; if it is foggy, it is good; if it is stormy, it is good; if it is damn cold, it is good; if it is damn hot, it is good! With a positive attitude of mind, all becomes good!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations

quote: When you speak universally, it means that you speak from the Moon, you speak from the Sun, from the stars; you speak by being in every corner of the universe!

quote: Talent is an art of gaining admiration!

quote: Talent is a firefly; even in a remote dark forest, sooner or later it is caught to an eye.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: talent

quote: In dark days, your best shelter is your clever thoughts!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: turkish-wisdom-words

quote: When will you understand that your childish beliefs mean an absolute nothing in this wild universe! When will you be serious? When will you give up deceiving yourself? When will you stop believing in the tales of old times as if they are true?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beliefs

quote: Update your belief! If necessary, throw it to the bin! Don’t exaggerate your belief! Remember that your belief is not that much important; the important thing is what the science, what the reason and the truth say! And remember also that with the earthquake of knowledge many beliefs have collapsed and again many more will collapse!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beliefs

quote: Most man can think no better than a child! This fact perfectly explains why there are so many funny beliefs!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beliefs

quote: In every opportunity, question your beliefs. Don’t forget that most of the beliefs are preposterous empty stories!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beliefs

quote: The beliefs of your country mostly become your own beliefs! Not the reason but the empty tales shape you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beliefs

quote: Genius tries to conquer the world with art, with songs, with words; stupid tries to conquer it with sword, with guns, with arrows!

category: genius

quote: In the land of genius, the sun always shines; in the land of clever, there are many clouds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: genius

quote: When the wind blows, curtain steps aside; when the genius blows, the intelligent stands aside!

category: genius

quote: By the time the clever reaches the clouds, the genius is already on the stars.

category: genius

quote: It is impossible for a dove to catch a swallow, for a clever man to catch a genius.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: genius

quote: Clever man is a chicken; it can fly, but a little. Genius, on the other hand, is a migratory bird; it can fly at high altitudes until He disappears on the horizon!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: genius

quote: A marching army first crushes the flowers before the enemy; but even before this, it crushes its own conscience! Conscience and killing cannot be together!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: conscience

quote: Divorce is a fire exit. When a house is burning, it doesn’t matter who set the fire. If there is no fire exit, everyone in the house will be burned!

category: divorce

quote: A man who sits under a tree and dreams makes more journey than a man who goes around the world without dreaming!

category: dreaming

quote: To read is to climb the high places!

quote: Read, so as to know; speak, so as to teach; write, so as to think!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: read

quote: When the water is calm, take as much distance as possible with your boat!

quote: For every drop of water you waste, you must know that somewhere on earth someone is desperately looking for a drop of water!

quote: Trying to educate the dumb with a dumb teacher is nothing but washing the dirty clothes in a dirty water!

category: water

quote: Appreciate water before you are thirsty! Appreciate all the good things before you need them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: water

quote: Even if you enter the dirty water, stay neat like a white swan!

category: water

quote: When the water is very calm and very beautiful, it won’t take a long time that a thick head will throw a stone in it!

quote: No one can know the infinite importance of a tiny drop of water better than a thirsty bird or a little ant or a man of desert!

category: water

quote: It is good to think; but to think in a right way, that is great!

category: think

quote: Whenever we hear laughter, we sense the magic and the beauty of being existed!

category: laughter

quote: Sometimes principles must be quitted without blinking en eye to discover the new paths!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: principles

quote: Strong jealousy in a beautiful love is the autumn in the middle of a hot summer!

category: jealousy

quote: If you have taught your child how to walk when he is all alone, it means that you have taught him everything!

category: child

quote: The most perfect magic for a child is the touch of a loving hand!

category: child

quote: When you make a child happy, the best gift you will ever get will be the smile of that child!
