category: child

quote: No child’s face is dirty even if it is muddy, because an innocent face has so much light that anything comes onto it becomes almost invisible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: child

quote: Child! Turn your face to the light, to the science, to the reason, to the truth, to the peace! Child! Be modern, be compassionate, be individual, and be independent! Child! Don’t be the man of anyone or any system, don’t believe in any religious stories, and don’t ever be silent against any oppressor! Child, turn your face to the light and walk towards the light!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: child

quote: Trust your own reason and your own logic, not your own media!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: media

quote: If there is a media in a country which deceives its own people, that country needs no other enemy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: media

quote: Something reduces the speed of the world and that something is stupidity! Stupidity is a boring friction!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: stupidity

quote: The moment when kite becomes free, it will fall down!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fall-down, free, kite

quote: No man can claim to be free in real terms unless he is fully in control of his own destiny!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: free

quote: Man will be free only when he frees both himself and all other creatures!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: free

quote: If you have a problem with the Moon in the sky and you are unhappy, change yourself, because the Moon won’t change!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: You may want to change the place or the direction of the Moon or you may do something more practical: You accept the Moon as it is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: The moon belongs to the lovers? Yes! But it also belongs to the lonely! It belongs to anyone who needs it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: The Moon is our local port opening to the universe; in the future, it's through that port we will sail our ships to the coastless oceans.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: If there was a little shine of gold on the moon, the mankind would have been to the moon even in the 19th century!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: Science is going to build a base on the Moon! This is a very necessary and a very possible mission! Start and finish! Thousands of problems will arise in this mission, thousands of solutions will be found! Start and finish! Moon is a good hole to enter the blood vessels of the universe. Start and finish!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: The wisdom of the Moon is greater than the wisdom of the Earth, because the Moon sees the universe closer than the Earth can see it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moon

quote: Sincere wishes come true.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wishes

quote: The Sun after the rain is much beautiful than the Sun before the rain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: To be remembered, umbrella waits for the rain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, rain, remembered, to-be-remembered, turkish-writers-quotes, umbrella, umbrella-quotes

quote: You want to do something very simple but also very fantastic? Then sit under the rain! Not long after, yourself will leave you and there will remain only the rain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fantastic, murat-ildan-quotes, rain, rain-quotations, rain-quotes, rainfall, simple

quote: Watching the rain is as beautiful as watching the sunset or the sunrise and it is even better because in addition to watching you can also listen to it, the fantastic music of the drop sounds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: The philosophy of the rain is very simple: No obstacle is obstacle when you are strongly determined!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: determined, obstacle, philosophy, rain, simple

quote: A beautiful rain is a treasure box. Inside this magical box there is an artistic umbrella, there is a pretty rainbow, there is a sweet bird singing and there is a lovely smell of earth! Something wonderful has a great potential to create some other wonderful things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: Those who love the rain much cannot long remain dry!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: What is rain? It is thousands of drop-friends coming from the sky!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: Rain just rains, it does nothing else. Wisdom just rains, it does nothing else! And those who get the rain get the miracles hidden inside the rain and create their own miracles!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: A pure drop of rain may fall on a beautiful water lily or on a dirty mud pond! This is exactly what happens when we are born!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: Every time it rains, the soil counts every drop to know exactly how many times to thank to God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: rain

quote: Great views are like great minds. They both give you the feeling of eternity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: eternity, great-minds, murat-ildan-quotes, turkish-writers-quotes, views

quote: With fear, you crawl on the ground; without fear, you fly in the skies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crawl, crawling, fear, fearless, fearless-quotes, fly, murat-ildan-quotes

quote: It is good to say something beautiful; it is even better to say something right; but saying a right thing beautifully, that is the best!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: right

quote: The Sun has no chance to be nobody and that is the punishment for being a sun! If you can be nobody just like a humble tree in a silent forest, you can find the happiness too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: In the future, man will be able to create an artificial Sun which is very similar to the Sun in the sky that was once upon a time worshipped as a god!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: Every end of the day is a great movie and the Sun above is surely the leading actor in this film!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: day, end-of-day, end-of-days, film, leading-actor, movie, sun, sunset

quote: The sun will rise whether you like it or not, whether you oppose it or not, whether you care about it or not! Some things will happen whatever you think and whatever you feel about them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun, sunrise

quote: If you are a hope for someone, that’s very nice, but if you are a hope for everyone just like the Sun, that’s excellent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: excellent, hope, sun

quote: Sun is a cosmic hand which tries to reach you wherever you are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: Sun always shines for those who have something good to stand upon.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: Admire all the stars, but what you really must admire is your very own Sun, the cosmic candle of our beloved Earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: We can bear the sun not to set, but we cannot bear the sun not to rise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: Sun must set so that we can long for its rise!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: The darkest clouds are the best ennobling of the sun, because the sun is most wanted under the darkest clouds! The evil is condemned to glorify and to honour the good!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: When the sun shines wondrously in the morning, even the shadows in our mind start running away!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sun

quote: When you look at a natural beauty, it also looks at you! Since both the viewer and the viewed are miracles, two miracles look at each other in admiration!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: miracles

quote: Are you a part of a herd? Then shame on you! Until you leave your herd, you are no one!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: herd, herd-behavior, herds, murat-ildan-words, no-one, no-one-quotes, shame

quote: An ocean which thinks there is nothing to learn from a lake is not a wise ocean!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ocean

quote: Can you imagine a waveless ocean while there is a big storm outside? And that calm ocean is the ocean of wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ocean

quote: Water on earth came from space. Everything which is there was once upon a time not there and everything which is there shall return again to wherever they come from! When you see a beautiful ocean, or beautiful anything, remember this and appreciate them well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ocean

quote: If you always look at the sky, you miss the good things on the ground; if you always look at the ground, you miss the good things in the sky!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sky

quote: A beautiful poem is like a beautiful sky and a beautiful sky is like a beautiful poem!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sky

quote: When you sit tranquilly, you set a great example to the people who rush around in panic and thus you show the crazy waves the beauty of being a calm lake!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beauty, calm-lake, crazy, lake, panic, rush, rush-around, sit, tranquil, waves

quote: When you take pictures of nature with passion, nature poses for you more passionately!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: nature, photo, photography, pictures, poses

quote: No hero is a hero if he ever killed someone! Only the man who has not any blood in his hand can be a real hero! The honour of being a hero belongs exclusively to the peaceful people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: hero

quote: Don’t wait for anyone to push you up, push yourself up; don’t wait for anyone to pull you up, pull yourself up! Your best hero, your greatest savior is yourself! The candle of your darkness is hidden within you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: candle, candle-quotes, hero, hidden, murat-ildan-quotations, pull, push, savior, wait-for, within-you, yourself, yourself-quote, yourself-quotes

quote: If you are not lucky enough, you can’t reach the future! You might be very intelligent, you might be very talented and a very good planner, but you still need ‘luck’ to reach tomorrow, you still need to be lucky to reach the future!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: luck

quote: In our unlucky times, it is a great comfort to think that luck favors only the bad guys or the dull!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: luck

quote: If you want to live above the clouds, you will miss the rain! When you want something beautiful, you must also know that you may lose some other beautiful and even more valuable things!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: want

quote: Every man is born to the world of chaos and all his life passes with struggle to create an order!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chaos

quote: Those who want to get wet need no umbrella!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: get-wet, getting-wet, murat-ildan-sayings, need, umbrella, umbrella-quotes, wet

quote: A single tree in the middle of nowhere means resistance and victory!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, resistance, tree, tree-quote, tree-quotes, victory

quote: The victory of the ignorant masses always means a temporary backward movement in the progression of humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: humanity, ignorant, mass, masses, masses-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, progression, temporary, victory

quote: A victory which is not honourable is nothing but a defeat!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: victory

quote: A victory with so many victims is nothing but the biggest defeat!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: victory

quote: He who despises simplicity will shout for a simple lifebuoy when drowning in the ocean of complexity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: simplicity

quote: You have the beach but not the sea? No use! You have the sea but not the beach? No use!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: beach, no-use, sea

quote: For the land, the sea is beautiful; for the sea, the land is beautiful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sea

quote: For the bored souls, sometimes sea is the best answer!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: sea

quote: The feeling that something good will happen must always be kept alive!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: feeling, feeling-quotes, good-will-happen, keep-alive, murat-ildan-quotations

quote: Sometimes everything passes fast before you while you are sitting and sometimes everything sits while you are passing fast before them! In both cases you feel lonely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lonely, lonely-quotes, murat-ildan-quotes, pass

quote: The longest walk of your life does not happen when you walk great distances lonely but it happens when you walk very shortly with the boring people!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: boring-people, lonely, walk, walking

quote: When you are surrounded by the people who do not see the world as you see it, you will be the loneliest of the lonely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: lonely

quote: Let the purity and innocence of a child be your one and only religion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wisdom-quote

quote: As long as there exist summer, we shall love the winter! The day summer disappears from Earth, we shall hate the winter!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: winter

quote: Beautiful winter means beautiful spring! When you look at a great winter scenery, see the flowers, see the bees, see the butterflies, they are all there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: winter

quote: In spring we are on Earth; in summer we are on Earth; in autumn we are on Earth, but in winter we are in another planet; winter is another planet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: winter

quote: When you see a heron eating an innocent rabbit, what comes to your mind? Do you say ‘What a great order God has created?’ or you say ‘What a devilish horror is going on here!’ Question your beliefs! If the strong eats the weak, there is absolutely nothing divine in here, but there is only injustice and nightmare!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: divine

quote: You build a thousand castles, a thousand sanctuaries, you are nothing; you build a library, you are everything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: library

quote: A big island of library, in the middle of an ocean, away from all the fools of the world, would this place not be a real paradise?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: library

quote: Flying is not only the art of the birds, but it is also the art of the artists!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, art-of-literature, art-quotes, artists, artists-quotes, birds, flying, flying-quotes, murat-ildan

quote: What is awakening? Awakening is the cessation of self-deception! Religion is self-deception; fate is self-deception; the idea that there is no death but only continuation is a self-deception! Real awakening is to acquire a scientific mind, it is to meet face to face with the bare realities, and it is to leave the spiritual fallacies and fantasies! And this is real awakening!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awakening

quote: The biggest awakening is the awakening from the childish deceptions and the invented tales of the religion.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: awakening

quote: Crying has no potential for solving the problems!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crying

quote: Disappointment means that things haven’t worked out the way you wanted! And now what to do? Very simple: Stand up and walk! Cut the tragedy because our limited time must always be used for the forward movements!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: disappointment

quote: Think about the answers of the questions that have not yet been asked! When they are asked, you will have the answers ready!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: questions

quote: A French proverb says ‘Wait until it is night before saying that it has been a fine day.’ To tell it more precise, wait till the clock strikes the midnight!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: day

quote: If fame came near to you to get you, you must run away from it very fast! Because this is a matter of freedom and captivity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fame

quote: Fame is a devil; obscurity is an Angel! Stay away from me, Devil; Come near to me, Angel!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fame

quote: The train may fall in love with a station, but it has to go and it goes! Don’t be like the train; stay at the station you fell in love, go nowhere!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fall-in-love, falling-in-love, leave, murat-ildan-quotations, train, trains, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Don’t be afraid of opening the unknown new doors; if you see the Devil inside, just know how to reclose it tightly! We exist in life to discover; if there is no discovery, there is no life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discovery

quote: Days passing with discovery are the days of real happiness.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discovery

quote: What do you see from your window? Mostly the things you have been taught to you! And so your view is poor and so you too! To be rich, let the things which have not been taught to you reach you too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotes, poor, rich, taught, window, window-quotes

quote: Some steal, earn a lot of money, but lose their honour and become very poor; some work, earn a little money, but gain a good honour and become very rich!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: earn-money, honour, money, poor, rich, steal, theft, thief, work, work-hard

quote: If you want to help a hungry poor man sleeping on the bench, don’t ever wake him up; put the food on the bench, put some money and leave the place without looking at your back!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poor

quote: A society which has poor people on its streets is a failed society!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poor

quote: Cheerful poor is rich with a smile, sulky rich is poor with a bullion of gold.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: poor

quote: In the twilight of a silent coast, under the beautiful stars, immortality visits you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: immortality

quote: People are afraid of immortality because they believe they won’t find something to do and will get bored! What to do if we become immortal? We can just walk! It is better than dying!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: immortality

quote: People often ask if one day mankind attains immortality, how he will be able to get rid of the eternal boredom problem? The answer is this: By embarking on eternal adventures!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: immortality

quote: All the roads of the haughty man lead to arrogance!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: arrogance

quote: Flowers are the Romeos and the Juliets of the nature!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Flowers are the beautiful hairs of the Mother Spring! Don’t pluck them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: If you want a forgotten corner to be remembered, a featureless place to be loved, a shadowy emptiness to shine, put some flowers there!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers, flowers-quotations, flowers-quotes, flowers-quotes-flowering, mehmet-murat-ildan, turkish-literature, turkish-quotes, turkish-writers

quote: The scent of flowers is the glory of gardens and the scent of art is the glory of Paris!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: art, flowers, gardens, glory, paris, paris-quotes, scent

quote: If you are a sensitive person, you don’t give flowers to others, because you know that the flowers – these miraculous beauties and the wondrous jewels of our cosmos – excessively deserve to live!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Here is a dream-life: A life amongst the flowers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Amongst the flowers you always feel yourself you are endlessly far away from all the dangers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Little flowers get more attention than the big mountains simply because they emit love around themselves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: A person who takes a concrete place and convert it into a garden of flowers is a real magician!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Killing flowers for our own happiness is a wrong attitude, it is a wrong culture! We must change this attitude and abolish this culture! Let the flowers live!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: No flower is happy in a vase, because vase is nothing but an ornate coffin for the flower.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: There is so much hope in a little flower and so many flowers in a little hope!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: The real wealth of a good gardener is not his salary but the marvellous flowers he is raising in the garden!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: You want to do something good for the flowers? Then, keep the flowers in the soil, in nowhere else!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: In the cold dark days of the winter, dream about the flowers to get warmed up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: Flowers have the greatest talent in converting an ordinary place into a magical palace!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: flowers

quote: A leader whose speech is prepared by others is not a leader; he is just an empty and stupid bottle! Use your own ideas and your own brain; write your own speech, just like Gandhi, Churchill or Nehru! That is indeed a good ethics and a good honour!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: speech

quote: Children must be taught mathematics well in anywhere under every condition at every age and so we can have more rational, more logical societies!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mathematics

quote: Trams and disciplined people always reach their destinations!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discipline

quote: Men need discipline! Countries need discipline! World needs discipline! He who wants to be successful needs discipline! Be a man of discipline!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discipline

quote: To discipline your body, you need a disciplined mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: discipline

quote: In war, bullets; in love, deceptions kill us.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: deception

quote: If you like the fairy tales, visit the old towns!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: castle-combe, fairy-tales, old-towns

quote: In narrow and gloomy streets, keep your spirit high!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: wise-quotations

quote: When the boat is waiting for you, when the rows are waiting for you, when the calm sea is waiting for you, when the sun is waiting for you, when everything is ready to help you to move forward, be there or those who wait will go away!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: waiting

quote: Sometimes it is not right to wait for the right train. Take any train instead of rotting at the station! In other words, be realistic!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, realistic, rotting, station, train, waiting

quote: Waiting for something or somebody for hours, for days and even for years is a common human behavior. Take the word ‘waiting’ out of your dictionary! Move! Act! These are the words and the behaviors you need! The dead can wait for, but the quick must not!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: act, move, murat-ildan-quotations, the-dead, the-quick-and-the-dead, wait, waiting, waiting-for-you, waiting-quotations, waiting-quotes

quote: Waiting insistently in front of a tightly closed door is unfair to all of the open doors! Give a chance to the open doors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: chance, closed, closed-door, closed-doors, giving-a-chance, open-door, open-doors, unfair, waiting

quote: Our universe is not suitable for waiting. This universe is a ‘we must do something universe,’ it is a ‘we must be serious universe!’ Think fast, think right and implement your thoughts very fast! To survive in this universe, ‘waiting’ must be abolished!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: waiting

quote: You are waiting for something good to come; but you know, if the life is also waiting, then nothing will happen, nothing will come!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: waiting

quote: The universe we are living in is not suitable for waiting for anything! Stop waiting and leave your port!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: waiting

quote: You can’t get the taste of winning in a running competition with a turtle!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: winning

quote: Don’t forget the snow in the summertime, because you will meet him again when the summer is over!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: forget, forgetting, forgetting-the-past, murat-ildan-quotations, snow, summer, summertime, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: When the winter comes, the summer shines infinitely in our hearts!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: summer

quote: Pull yourself out of yourself so that you can replace yourself with the universe itself! When somebody knocks your door, if you are not there, the universe will open the door! Wisdom is to make yourself to fly away from yourself! When you leave yourself, there won’t be any emptiness left inside you, because universe will immediately flow into that emptiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: yourself

quote: To encounter great moments, you must mostly be in motion!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: moments

quote: Bad is always afraid of good and that is the reason why bad tries to eliminate good!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad

quote: Watch out when the bad treats you well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad, treat, watch-out

quote: The best thing about a horrible city is that it makes you to understand the beauty of the pastoral life! The bad crystallizes the value of the good.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad

quote: When bored of sitting, move! When bored of moving, sit! Balance your life or there will remain neither moving nor sitting in your life but only falling!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: balance, balance-quote, balance-quotes, balanced-life, bored, bored-of, boredom, falling, murat-ildan-quotes, sit, sitting

quote: Balance is the secret of reaching the far places!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: balance

quote: To see something different gives you a chance to be something different!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: being-different, being-different-quotes, chance, different, different-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, to-be-something

quote: If you do something different, you leave your herd! And to leave your herd means to reborn with creative abilities!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: abilities, creative, different, herd, leave, mehmet-murat-ildan-literature, reborn

quote: Though the people look the same, they are different; though the people look different, they are the same!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different, look, looking, people, same

quote: If you are not different from others very distinctively, you are not different from others at all!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different

quote: You are not superior to others and others are not superior to you. You are only different than others and others are only different than you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different

quote: When you do different things than others, you will have a different world than others.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: different

quote: You either keep your childhood innocence or you rot!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: innocence

quote: An innocent bird is not innocent from the insect’s point of view! Only man can attain the rank of innocence through becoming a peaceful vegetarian!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: innocence

quote: As long as you stay as a good hearted person, you will keep the innocence in your face.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: innocence

quote: Eagle rises to the top of the precipice with its wings; man, to the top of the honour, with his morals!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: morals

quote: My friends, I like them; my morals, I like them more!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: morals

quote: We can change people only by becoming their friends, not by becoming their enemies! Make friends with people so that you may be able to change them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, change-people, enemies, make-enemies, make-friends, murat-ildan-sayings

quote: If you have too many enemies, it means that you are either too good or too evil!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enemies

quote: Hate not your enemies; love thy rivals, for this is the only way to convert them into your friends and your partners!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enemies

quote: John F. Kennedy says: ‘Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.’ I suggest that forgive your enemies and forget their names too! Don’t leave any stone in your head; keep only the flowers, only the names of the good men!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: enemies

quote: Whatever your problem is, if you may think it rightly, the solution will appear on the horizon like a shining sun!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: problem

quote: If you come across a high mountain on your way, thank to it, because a good challenge is a great chance for you to surpass yourself! Thank to it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challenge, challenge-quotes, high-mountains, mountain, murat-ildan-quotes, surpass-yourself, surpassing-yourself, thank-to

quote: A challenge to us is a great joy to us! If you see an open door, there is no challenge there and therefore there is no joy! A door must be closed so that we can obtain the joy of trying to open it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: challenge

quote: Crowds most envy the lonely man who walks confidently as if he is walking with the great crowds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: crowds, envy, lonely-man, walking

quote: Only the honorable people resist the injustices! The rest - the honorless - are afraid of even their own shadows!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: honorable, honorable-men, honorless, injustice, injustice-quotes, injustices, murat-ildan-quotations, resist, resistance

quote: How close we can approach the land of happiness with the heavy shackles on our feet of injustice permeated deeply into every corner?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: injustice

quote: In every country where there is a vicious oppression, a peaceful and a continuous civil disobedience is the magical door opening to the freedom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: oppression

quote: You like the wind? There is no wind? Start running! Create your own wind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, running, wind, wind-quotations, wind-quotes

quote: Don’t get stuck in one candle; find other candles, create other candles!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: candle, candle-quotes, candles, create, find, get-stuck-in, murat-ildan-quotations, stuck-in

quote: After reading a book, you become someone else: Now you are not you, but you plus the book!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reading-books

quote: If you are not reading and thinking, it means that your windows looking to the ocean are closed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: reading-books

quote: Here is a fact for you: Your prison is made by yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fact, made-by-yourself, murat-ildan-quotations, prison, your-prison

quote: When you are bored of the plains, the secret passages to the mountains suddenly appear out of nowhere before you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bored, boredom, mountains, plains, secret-passage

quote: Thoughts of some special people are like the stairs, they take you up to the upstairs floors; some are like the wings, they take you up to the skies and some are like the light itself, they take you right to the stars and the beyond! And such are the thoughts of Buddha!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: buddha

quote: Your only real problem is mortality! No religion can solve this problem, but science can do!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mortality

quote: Why pay money for the horror movies? Just go to a street without trees!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trees

quote: He who sees a gold bullion more valuable than a tree has surely an intelligence much less than a donkey’s!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: ecological-awareness, ecological-consciousness, forests, gold, gold-mine, gold-mining, murat-ildan-quotes, nature-destruction, tree-cutting, trees

quote: Even a lamb can defend itself, but a tree cannot even do that. If you are a just person, you never harm any tree, those defenceless angels!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trees

quote: A street without trees is a street only for the sick-minded people whose god is nothing but money!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trees

quote: By respecting the trees, you prove that you are a person who deserves to be respected!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trees

quote: Trees make man happy in thousands of different ways; in return, man hurts the trees in thousands of different ways! What an honourable being man is!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: trees

quote: You can look at the world from a mountain or from a rat hole! Most people do the second!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mountain

quote: Sometimes you must behave like a tunnel! If a formidable mountain is on your way, thrust through it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: formidable, mountain, mountain-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, thrust-through, tunnel

quote: If you are a giant mountain, you cannot escape from being famous; all that you can do is to pray for the fog to cover you up!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mountain

quote: To be a plain means to die for a mountain; to be a mountain means to die for a plain! Thus, to kill a mountain, make it plain; to kill a plain, make it mountain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mountain, mountains, plain, plains

quote: He who hates easiness in life will always find a though mountain to climb!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: mountain

quote: The opinion of the majority or the minority is of no importance! The important thing is the opinion of the Truth, of the Reason, of the Logic, of the High Intelligence!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: opinion

quote: He who knows how to fall without hurting himself will also know how to rise without any difficulty!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fall, falling-quotations, falling-quotes, murat-ildan-words, rise, rising-quotations, rising-quotes

quote: In every fall, clever man discovers the secrets of further rising!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: fall

quote: Our laugh is a torment and our cry is a joy for the Satan!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: satan

quote: When you fully understand something, you become that something itself! If you understand a rock, you become a rock; if you understand the universe, you become the universe; if you understand a horse, you become a horse! Understanding automatically transforms you into the thing understood!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: understand

quote: If you want the people to understand you, invite them to your life and let them see the world from your window!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: life, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, understand, understanding-others, view, window, windows-on-the-world

quote: If you see a strange thing, try to understand it! If you can understand it, nothing strange will remain!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: strange, strange-thing, understand

quote: There are things we really do not understand; and much more than this, there are things we really do not try to understand!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: understand

quote: Don’t be afraid of an endless road, but the road with an end!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: afraid-of, end, end-quotes, endless-road, murat-ildan-quotations, murat-ildan-quotes, murat-ildan-wise-sayings, path-quotes, paths, road, road-quotations, road-quotes

quote: For some, the life journey has just started, for some, it is about to end; but in truth, there is no start and there is no end! There is just an ocean of particles playing aimlessly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: aimless, aimlessly, end, end-quotes, ildan-words-of-wisdom, life, life-journey, life-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, start

quote: If you are given a hundred city, refuse it without any hesitation; if you are given a lovely wooden cottage in the middle of a forest, accept it without any hesitation because all you need is just a peace of mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: peace-of-mind

quote: Peace of mind! All we need is peace of mind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: peace-of-mind

quote: Let those who live never forget those who died!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: forget, forget-quotes, murat-ildan-quotations, remember

quote: In the distant future, I don’t want to be remembered; I want to remember!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: remember

quote: Instead of politicians, let the monkeys govern the countries; at least they will steal only the bananas!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: bad-politicians, govern, government-corruption, government-quotes, monkeys, murat-ildan-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotations, politicians-quotes

quote: If a thief and an immoral society finds a thief and an immoral political leader, it will support him to the death!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: immoral-politicians, immoral-society, murat-ildan-quotations, politicians, politicians-quotes, thief, thief-society, thieves, to-the-death

quote: On the Night of the Halloween, I have never seen any evil apparition or fearsome ghost but politicians on TV! They are the real goblins and specters!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: politicians

quote: Just because an impressive storm doesn’t touch you, you must not find it beautiful! Lend an ear to the voices of those which are under the storm!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, storm, storm-quotations, storm-quotes, voice

quote: People are very busy; they are so busy that when they walk in the crowds they see no one, no one but themselves; they hear no voice, no voice but their own voice!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: busy, busyness, crowds, hear, voice, walk

quote: Don’t see anything impossible! This simple philosophy will enable many things to be possible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: possible

quote: Everything cannot be possible without thinking that everything is possible!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: possible

quote: Man can be an atheist only in theory, not in practice, because the universe is too frightening and too chaotic to be too independent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: atheist

quote: If you can remain as an atheist in a falling plane, then it means you are a real atheist!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: atheist

quote: In the middle of the storm, the ‘a’ of the atheist drops!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: atheist

quote: When I deeply look at a pious, I see no affection but fear; and when I look at an atheist, I see no fear but conceit!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: atheist

quote: If your yesterday was much better than your today, then today you will most probably walk around in your yesterday!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: murat-ildan-quotations, today, today-quote, today-quotes, yesterday, yesterday-quote, yesterday-quotes

quote: If half of a country is rotten, the other half will soon start rotting as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country, murat-ildan-quotations, rotten, turkish-writers-quotes

quote: Just because you are living in a stupid country, you don’t have to be stupid! Isolate yourself from the fools! Protect your mind to be poisoned by the deceitful media, by the dishonest politicians, by the primitive culture and the illogical traditions! Rise above the lownesses of the system like a falcon rising from the marshland and start shining like a star for others to see you and to come near to you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: You must often leave your country, not necessarily physically, but mentally often! Leave your own music; leave your own religion! Leave your own culture, your own books and ideas! Walk around in the world of others, listen to what they speak and learn what they think! In short, get out of your puddle, sail to the ocean! Move, friend, move out of your country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: In the agenda of empty countries, there exists only empty matters!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: We love our country, not because it is perfect in everything, but it manages to touch our heart despite all its imperfections in everything!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: A moss which leaves its ocean becomes pale and dries up and a man which leaves his mother country is a moss which leaves it ocean!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: William Cowper said that God made the country, and man made the town. If it was the opposite, there would be no country; because town can be created from the country but the country cannot be created from the town!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: May God save any country to remain in a position to choose between a genius of bad character and a stupid of good character, because both will bring disaster to that country!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: country

quote: There are many lights in the shadows and many shadows in the lights; lots of talents in the shades, lots of incompetents in the luminosities.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: talents

quote: If you don’t hear the crows of the roosters in the mornings, you are one cursed city fellow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city, city-people, crows, cursed, murat-ildan-quotes, rooster, roosters

quote: There are great roads, beautiful bridges, lovely parks, gorgeous gardens and wonderful buildings in a big city. But there is something missing, something very important: The spirit of nature!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: big-city, city, ildan-quotations, nature, nature-quotes, spirit-of-nature

quote: It is perfectly banal to establish a city in the middle of nature but it is perfectly extraordinary to establish nature in the middle of a city! Ordinary nations do the first, extraordinary nations do the second!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city

quote: For a city to be beautiful, it must have a mysterious air!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city

quote: A city full of art is a city full of wit!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city

quote: You can never make a city as clean as the nature itself. To do this, you must completely demolish the city and convert it into the pure nature.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: city

quote: Laugh represents a fragile glory of the mankind in this cruel and uncertain universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: laugh

quote: A day without laugh is a day without life.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: laugh

quote: If you are close to a precipice, go away a bit; if you are far from it, come close a bit! Enjoy the safety, enjoy the view! Without safety, it is dangerous; without view, it is dull! Life is an art of adjusting the distances!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: safety

quote: You must live in a place where you can walk safely all alone even after midnights!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: safety

quote: If you have ever walked in Paris, you will see that Paris will ever walk in your memoires!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: paris
